item.text: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sras
rgyas pa' po chazhes bya ba////bam po nyi shu gnyis pa//
de nas lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub samA
dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras// ga
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad n byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab
la3 khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhing ngur smrig ga gos 'chang ba de dag gis/
tshas pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod ya/
ba 'di dag las 'das te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de spyi ltar yid la bya/
rnam par bsgoms te/ megs pa bcu rnam par bsgom pa gzhen/'di lta ste/ lus dang lus kyi las dang/ ngag dang ngag
gi las dang/ yid dang yid kyis dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ bslab pa yang dag par blang ba
ga ba ga ba sa
tha gong dus bcu yid la bya'o//
'a@#// dug ste/ mtshos par spyod pa de lus sam/ da lta mos pa'i spyod pa de lus yin nani/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi gtsang bar 'gyur/
tshas pa'i spyod pa chos ma yin par 'gyur/chis pa'i spyod pa 'khrugs par 'gyur/ tshes pa'i spyod pa dri bar 'gyur/ mos pa'i spyod po
gtsang ba ma yin par 'gyur/ tshus pa'i spyod pa smad par 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi mthun par 'gyur/ tshes pa'i spyod pa kun nas nyon
mos par 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa keng rus su 'gyur/ tshes pa'i spyod pa sngon gyi tshong du 'gyur ro// de ste lus kyi las tshos pa'i spyod pa yani
nani 8 nyal ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'ag pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'gying ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'gro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par
'gyur/ bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam par bltas pa chings pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ bskum pa tshogs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/
bskyang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'khor ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ 'gres pa tshangs pa'i dpar 'gyur ro// de sta ngag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin nanaM/ dbyangs tshangs pa'i spyod
par 'gyur/ ngaro tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ sna ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ sos pa tshadas pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ thong kanas rtsol ba tshos
pa' spyod par 'gyur/lu bsgyur ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/mchu sbyarab tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ tshag sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/do sta ngag ga las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yaMzhenan
brjod po tshangs pa'i phyed par 'ogyur/ brdar byas pa tshangs pa' spyod par 'gyur shan tu bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ bstan pas rnam par bstan pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/
legs par brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ ngan du brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod/ ra 'gyur/ rnam par gdags pa tshangs pa' spyod par 'gyur/ rnam par dpa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/yongs su

sIs pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro// des yid tshangs pa' spyod pa yin na/ dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par gyur/ rnam par dpyad pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rtog pa tshadas pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rnam

pa'i rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/zhapa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/phyi dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/segs pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur// rnam panasogasapa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/
skya mtshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ rmi lam tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ deste yid kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin nand 'du shes tshangs ba'i spyod par 'gyur/yid la byed/

tshangs la 'i spyod par 'gyur 2 grang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/dro ba tshangs ba'i spyob par 'gyur/ bde ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ bkres pa tshangs pa'i
spyod bar 'gyur/ skom pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa' 'gyur/ ga' ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur/ zhum pa tshangs ba'i spyod par 'gyur ro// de ste sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin nani/gzugs
a 1 sangs rgyas sam/ 'on tamatshor bsangs rgyas sam/ 'du shes sangs rgyas sam/ 'du byed sangs rgyas sum/ rnam par shes pa sangs rgyas sam/ mtshan rnams sangs rgyus sam mngon
par shes pa sangs rgyas sam/ las sangs rgyas sam/ 'on tam rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas/ de ste legs par bshad pa 'a chos nyid tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin na ni 'gog la gnagasu/
gyur 'o// mya ngan las 'das pa gnas su 'gyur ro// bralaba gnas su 'gyur ro// ma skyes pa gnas su 'gyur ro// ma byung ba gnas su 'gyur ro// grags pamed pa gnas su 'gyur ro//
ga pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro// rgyu ba med pa gnas su 'gyur ro// phrad pa med pa'i gnas ni tshangs pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de ste dge 'dun sdom pa'i nan tan can tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni//
ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun yin nam 'on argyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dga' dun/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i lcer dge 'dunanam/ 'on tam lan cig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dunanam/ 'on tam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam/ 'on ma
dag bcom pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun ( gsum rig pa nyid dge 'dun nam/ drug mngon par shes pa dge 'dun nam/ 'on rtam khong du chud par nan tan du byed la tshangs pa'i spyod pa/ de
bslab pa yang dag par blang ba tshangs ba'i spyod pa yin na ni tha dad du gnas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/yongs su dag pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ slob dpon gyi
tshig bslab pa yang dag par blang ba 'am/ lan gsum du bzlas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba/ma mkhan po bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/ skya bregs pa dang durasmrig gi gos 'chang ba
bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am/ slong mos 'tsho bakhaslab pa yang dag par blangab 'am/ 'on tam de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'am/ zhes de ltar chos de dag la rnam par bsgoms na bdag
gi lus la mngon par chags pa med pa dang/ bsgom pa la zhen pa med pa dang/ chos rnams gnas pa med pa dang/ 'das pa rgyu ba med pa dang/ ma 'ongs pas phyin pa dang/ da ltar byung ba stod pa/
dang mas la byed pa med pa dang/ rnam par smin pa ma tshor ba med pa dang/ 'jig rten 'di 'phos pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pha rol chud mi za ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i sbyod pa
zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin/ gang las byung/ de su'i 1 de ci zhig/ de sus byas/ de yod dam/ de med dam/ de gzugs sam/ de gzugs ma yin nam/ de tshor ba 'amade
ra ba ma yin nam/ de 'du shes sum/ do 'dushes ma yin nam/ de 'du byed dam/ de 'du byed ma yin nam/ de rnam par shes pa 'am/ de rnam par shes pa ma yin nam/ tshangs par
spyod pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ces de ltar mi dmigs shing dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du nam mkha' yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang/ chags pa med par yid la bya ba dang/ sems
bsgribs pa med pa dang/ gnyis su med par shin tu spyod pa dang/ bsgribs pa med pa'i sbyor ba rung/ mtshan ma med pa'i sbyor ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshos gzung ba dang 2 mtshan
nyid med pa'i chos rab tu shis pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang 2 sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cadra la yang dag par sems pas/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par
[F/ ]yid la bya'o// gong du yang chos b.rudang ldan pas yid la bya ste// b.ru gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang//
0 da ltar byung ba'i las dang/ rnam par smin pa shes pa dang ldan pa dad/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang 2 snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs/
pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ rnam par ldang ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus tha dad pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dung/ tham shes pa dang ldan pa dang//
mos pa sgo dang pa dang/ mos pa du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ khams tha dad pa dang khams du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dung ldan pa dang/
lha'i mig thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dang 2 bsgribs pa med la rjes su dran pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang 2 bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ke re la yang rnam par dbye ba shin tu rgya che bar khong du chud par bya'o// thams cad kyang tshad med par blta bar bya'o// thos nas kyang snying rje chen po la ba rtan
par bya'o// sems can rnam par bsgom pa yang mi gtang bar bya'o// chos la shin tu brtag pa yang mi gzhig par bya'o// blan med pa'i chos la yang dag pa'i yi dam ya nga shanatu brtsam par
bya'o/ / rnam par smin pa la'ang re ba med par bya'o// lcuma'irang bzhin yang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// rmilam gyi rang bzhin du'ang yang dag par spyad par bya'o// mig yor gyi 'ad bzhin dang
yang tha mi dad par bya'o// skyabarnyan gyi rang bzhin yang spyod yul du bya'o// sngal pa'i rang bzhin du'ang mos par bya ste/ de de ltar zhugs pas nyon mongs pa rlung bar
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// des chos de dugaganyis su rtsod par rtogs pasasaMms dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis ]banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i gnas yod do// chos thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin du shes pasagazhan gyi phring mi 'jog pa shes rab kyi phung po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
phyi mdo sangs rgyas phal bo che zhes bya ba las/ tshangs par spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po pargya byin gyis/ byang chubusems dbal
chos kyi blo gros la 'di skadangos sbas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig dang ldan n sems dang bo bskyed pa'ibyang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ do skang rjes
snyas pa dang 2 byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gnas 'di ni yid ches par shin tu dka' ste/
nas par dka2/ brtag par dka'o/ man par dad par dka'/ shin tu rtogs par dka'/ kun nas b+hAsgrub par dka'/ mang dag par spyad par dka'/ brjod par dka'o//
bskyed par dka'/ brgyal bar dka'/ khong du chud par dkas kyang/ 'on kyang phyi tshul du sangs rgyas kyi mthus pashang ma' bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/ ba dang
shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can dortag la la zhig gis bskal par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te bslab pa'i tshegalta po dag kyang
'dzin du btsud par gyur la/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ de bzhin du byung shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi
phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs rung/ de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems

na rnams kyang bskal pa 'di ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te// bslab la mi tshe la po dag kyang 'dzin du btsud na/rgyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel
lam/ de skad cesalcas pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ skye rgyal ba'i sras bsod nams 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ma gtogs par gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so/smas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpaSha sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsong nams kyi phung po la ni/ de dag gi bsod
nams snga ma nges brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ steng gi char yang nye ba'am 'gro/ brgya stong gi chu dang/ bye ba'i cha dang/ bya ba brgya'icha dang 2 byab stong gi cha dang/

bya babargya stong gi tshe dang/bya ba khrag khrig brgya'i mngang/ bye ba khrag khrig stong gi cha dang/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong char yabade bar mi 'gro/ gangs dang/ chadang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe
dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dpe snga ma dag lta zhog kye rgyal ba'i sras phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de drag
bskal pa brgyar bad pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ ga ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la yang dag par sbyar bar gyur la 1 gzhung de bzhin du bskal pa stong du bang ba'i yo byad
thams cad kyis rem gror byas te/ bsam gtan bzhi la rab tubakod pa dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi la rag
tu bkod pa dang/ bskal pa bya bar bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod par gyur pa dang/ bskal pa bye bar bde ba'i
yo byad thams cad kyis remagror byas te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ bskal pa bye bstod du bde ba'i yo byang thams cad kyis rim gror byas te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang 2 bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du bde pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te 2 phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag/
khrig tu bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis ram gror byas te/ dgra bcom pa la rab tu bkod pa dang/ bskal pa bye ba bag khrig brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/
rang sangs rgyas kyi byung+ga chub la rab tu bzhug par gyur na kyi rgyal pa'i sras de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel lam 1 lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ni sasu rgyas bam lags kyis mkhyen to// byang chub sems dpal chos kyi blo gros kyis skyas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod

nams kyi phung bo du la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//steng gi chu dang 1 brgya stong gi chu dang/ byakha'i cha dang bye ba brgya'i cha dang/ bye ba stong gi cha dang/
bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang 2 grangs dar 1cha dad/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe dang rgyur yang nyapar mi 'gro'o// dertse'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i dras gar 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams
grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis 'am gror bya zhing bslab pa'i tshig lta la ba zhig pa dang/dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar ba dang/ bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu dgod pa dang/ tshangs pa'i rnam par sbyong pa bzhi dang/ gablugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgrabcom pa dang/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgong pa de tsam gyis na se ya/
rgyus sum 'gyur te de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun migacad pa'i phyir sems skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o//
kha 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyirasaMms skye 'o 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig pa yongs su shes pa'i bya ba'i
spyir sems skye'o//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'i sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems bskye'o[7]'jig rten
wA kyi khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
[F ]yong sa su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o//sems can thams cad gyi 'che 'bo dang skye ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o//sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang sbyor ba yongs su
wa shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye 'o//sems can thams cad kyi sems dang po spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o[7/]sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes/

par bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyisems bskyed pa de ni 'di ltalasangs rgyas thams cad dang yul mnyam pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir sems skye'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dpe lta ma
jug lta zhog gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig byung ste/ de sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' la/ sems bskyed pa de dang 'dra bas shar
phyogs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad zad du 'das par byas kyang ga' phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa zad par a rung nas/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu gnyis pa zhig byung ste/
skyes bu snga ma des bskal pa grangs med pas 'das pa snyed se mas bskyed pa gcig gis 'das te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu gsum pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga ma de gnyis kyis bskal pa
grangs med pa gnyis kyis 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu bzhi pa zhig byung nas snga ma gsum gyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'das pa de rtagasems
bskyed pa gcig gis 'angs la/ de'i 'og tu skyes bulta pa zhig byung ste skyes bu snga ma bzhis bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dgasems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das nas/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu
drug pa zhig byung ste 1skyes su snga ma rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par 'dus pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'dus te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu brten pa zhig skyes la/ skyes
nga snga ma drug gis bskal pa grangasamod par 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'das te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu brgyad pa zhig skyes te/ skyes pa snga ma bdun gyis bskal pa grangs med par
'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'dra' la/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu dgu pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga ma ba rgyud kyis bskal pa grangs med par 'jus pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis
'das par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu bcu pa zhig byung nas skyes bu snga ma dgus bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'dab la/ sems bskyed pa de lta bu s
'da' bas/ shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs med par bgrod kyang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtha' ni shes par mi rung ngo// shar phyogs
su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang 2 nub
byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang seng ge phyogs rnams bcu bo thams cad du yang de bzhin du rgya che bar te 2 skyes bu de dag gis phyogs bcur ji snyed du 'das pa de dag skyes bu re ra
phyogs bcur rnam par dgod pas sems bskyed pa gcig gis bskal pa grangs med pa 'apa' ba'i tshul du/bskal pa grangs med par 'jus pa de dag skyes bu brgya dag gis 'jig rten gyi khamA
yongs su bgrang ba'i tshul ru/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pan mthar rnyed par rung yang srid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bud
chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba tha'amed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kye rgyal pa'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skye ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'gro ba 'am/ glangs
yongs su shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang nub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ da ltar phyogasabasu tshad med par yongs su shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems skye ste/ 'di
ltar 'jig rten gyi khams phra ba ya ngas par yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa phra bar yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams lcel zhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'atshugs su
rgyu bar yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba 'jig rten gyi khams snel zhirayongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams chung du 'jig rten gyi khams chen por yongs su
shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur yongs su shes pa dang 1'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rtog par yongs shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi
khams dog pa 'jig rten gyi khams yangs par yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams brjod da du med par yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten
gyi khams brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yongs su shes pa dang 2 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gzud pa yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten
gyi khams gcig 'ajig rten gyi khams brjod du med par gzud pa yongs sushes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par yongs su shes pa dang/
'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs par yongs su shes pa dang 2 skawertso mo 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi kham
! tshad med pa sku'i rtse mor longs su shes pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bsgrub par yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad lus med pa'i rang
bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa ma lus pa thams cad sems bskyed pa gcig gis thogs pa med par yongs su shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyi sems bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu skye'o// khyargyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' ba'i dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/ kye rgyal ba'i sras skyes bu la la zhig skyes par/
@# gyur te/ de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs kyi 'ju ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa grangs med pabagrang la/ sems bskyed pas bgrang ba 'di'i tshul du shar phyogs su bskal pa grangs med pa
zad zad du bgrangs kyang/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'du ba'i bskal pa dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i matha'ags par mi rung nas/de'i 'og tu skyes bugazhis pazhig skyes te/ skyes
bu snga ma des bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrangs pa de dag thams cad skad cig gcig gis bgrangs te/de'i 'og tu skyes bu gsum pa zhig byung la// skyes bu snga ma gnyis
kyis bskal pa grangasamed par 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa bgrangs pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis babadrangs te de'i 'og tu skyes pa bzhi pa zhig byung nas/ snga ma gsum gyis bskal pa grangs
med par 'du ba dang/'jig pa bgrangs pa de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs te/de'i 'og tu skyes bu la pa zhig byung nas/ skyes bu snga ma ba zhis bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang/ 'jig
pa bgrangs pa de dag skad cig gcig gis bgrangs par gyur la/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu drug pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga malngas bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa bgrangs pa de dag
skad yig gcig gis bgrangs te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu bdun pa zhig phyung nas/ skyes bu snga ma drug gis bskal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa bgrangs pa de dag skad cig gcig gis
bgras pa khyur la/ 'og tu skyes bu brgyad pa zhig byung ste/ skyes bu snga ma bdun gyis bsal pa grangs med par 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa
skyobakras pa de dag skad tsag gtsage/gse bgras par gyur te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu dgu pa zhig skyes la/ skyes bu sngam brgyad kyis bsal bkras med par 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa
bgras pa de dag skad cigegacige gsebagras to de'i 'og tu skyes bu ban pa zhig byung nas/ skyes bu dgu po snga ma rnams kyis bskal pags med pa'i du ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa bgras pa
de dag skad tsagegatsag gse bgras pa/ gyu// kyirgyal ba'i sras skyes bu de dag grangasamed pa'i tshul du phyogs bcur rnam par bkod pa dang/ skad 'gagatsagegs 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang/
'ge pa grasamed par bgrang ba'i tshul du bskal pa grangs med par bgraan/ 'jigarten gyi khams de dag go 'du ba dang/ 'gi pa'i bskal pagatsage nas gtsuge tu brgyud pa na phyogs bsamatha' thug

par rung yang srid kyi/ byang chub sems pa'i sems dang bo bskyod pa'i sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i degaba'i rtse banametha' thug par ma rung ngo// de'i phyir zhen kyi rgyal ba'i sres 'jig rten ga'i
gdub dang 1'dzag pa bgrang ba rab khyushes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumo skye' de 'dzig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/ ]
thams cad kyi 'jig pa dang/ 'du ba'i bskal pa shes par bya ba la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub t+tasems skye ste/ 'di ltar bskal
pa ring po la bskal pa thung dur yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ bskal ba thung ru la bskal pa 'ange por yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba'i phyer/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams blon
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ bsal bgrangs med pa la bskal pa
gtsug tu yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa sas rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang 2 sangs
rgyas med pa'i bskal pa sas rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i bskal pas nags rgyas gatsagakaThesal par yang dag par
'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ sas rgyas gatsag gis bskal pasas rgyas brjod du med pa'i khesal par yang dag par 'jug ba shes par bya ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa rnam pa tha dadab
la bskal pa rnam pa thamo ded par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ bskal pa rnam pa thamo ded pa la bskal pa rnam pa tha dad par yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang 2 bskal
gab zad pa la bskul ba ma zad bar yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ bskal pa ma zad pa la thaskal pa zad pa khong du chud pas yang dag par 'jug pa shes par/
bya ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa brjod du med pa sems bskyed pa gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ sems bskyed pa gcig bskal ba brjod du med par yang dag par 'jug ba
shes par bya pa dang/ 'alta ste/ bskal pa thams cad bskal pa med par ba tu 'jug pa shes par bya ba dang/ bskal bam yan pabaskal bar 'jug pa shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dag
rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// 'di ltaste/ sngon methab mur thug pa'i bskal ba dang/ phyama'amatha' mur thug pa'i bskal pa dang 2 da ltab bya'i
bskal pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa sems bskyod pa gtsagags yos su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i
rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas su sems skye ste/ 'di ltar bskul pa thams cad kyi rkyesa mngon par shes pa'i bya ba'i phyir du thog mar gom chen po mngon par sgrub bo//
kyi rgyalapa gin 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa bgrangaba'i dpe de dag lta zhogagi/ khyargyalaM ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhage skyos par gyur to/ des sems baskyod pa gcig/
gis[︽]ga rten gyi khams grangasamed bgatogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dad pa sna tshogs pa thams cad shes la// tshul de lta buras chas bskyod bde zhing shes pas shar phyogs su bskal
pa gras med pa zad bar byas kyang/ sems can rnams kyimos pa tha dad pa gtsa gnas gtsake tu brgyud pa mtha' zad ba'amarebanas/ gzhung de bzhin du skyes bu bcu pa'i bar du ste/ shar phyogs

su ja lta ba de bzhin du/ stong ga phyogs kyi bar gyi phyogs bcu thamasacad du rgya cher byas na/ de dag gi mos pa tha dad pa gtsa gnas gtsug tu brgyud pa namethar thug b.rung yang sridakyi byang chub
sems dpa' blon mo da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i ba nametha'akhrug pas lung ngo// tsa'i phyir na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can de tsam gyi mos pa
dad ba shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems m skye// 'di ltar 'girten gyi khamasamalus ba thams cad dugartogs pa'i

sems can rnams kyi dad pa sna tshogs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzusems skye'o// 'dilaskye/ mos mtha' dang
dbusamed pa la 'jug pa dang 2 sems can gyi mos patshadad pa la mkhas pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'aphyi'ibyachub sems dpa' rnams blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byatshugaaglu
gu'ud/ skye'o/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig sems can grangs med par yang dag par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ dad pa'i tshul brjod du med pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyis mos pa
garig nas gcig tub nga bam lus pa dang/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla ma med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams skye'o/
'dat+ta ste/ 'dzas pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i dge ba dang mi dag nga la mos pa tshang mad pa la 'jug par bya ba dang/ dus gsum thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi dbang gis
yongs su shes par bya ba dang/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye 'od/

'di lta sti skal ba mnyam pa'i mos pa dang/ skal ba mamanyam pa'i mos shes pa la 'jug pa'i byab dang/ mos pa thamasacad mos ba gcig tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ mos pa gcig mos pa thams cad dang/ mnyam pa nyid
du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la rab tu 'jug pa 'phyir/ byang chub sems dba' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tasams skya'o// 'di lta
ste mos pa bla ma dang bcas pa dang mos pa thanamado ba dang [） ]ltogs dang bcas pa dang/ lhag med ba dang/ mnyam pa dang/ mi mnyam pa'i thos pa'i bye brag shes pa mngon par 'tshang
0 rgyabar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// 'di lta ste/ gnas pa'i mes pa dang/ mi gnas pa'i mos pa/
dang thun mong gi mos pa dang/ thunamong ma yin pa'i mes pa dang/ 'dres pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
mos pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi bye brag shin shas pa'i dzem pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems skya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge ba' zhes pa dang/ yangs pa'i mos pa dang/ mos pa bar ma dang tha dad pa dang/ nges pa'i mos pa ma lus pa thams cad bslabs pa mod pa'i yi
shes dang/ chags pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems
ba mas skya'o// 'di lta ste/ rnam par dag pa'i mos pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mos pa dang/ yangs pa'i mos pa dang/ ngog pa'i mes pa dang/ brab 'amos pa dang/ rgyuchab 'amos
pa dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi mis pa 'tshu la rnam pa tha dad pa la gtu'ajug par bya ba dang/ sems can gcig gi mos pa sna tshogs 'bum kas pa b.ru mngon par 'tshang
'a@#// rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'phyang chu/tusems skya'o// 'di lta ste/ rgyung stug po'i mes pa dang/ sbyor pa'i mos pa dang

kyi yongs su brtags pa'i mes pa dang/ ngang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i mos pa dang/ rgyu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i mes pa dang/ rgyunagyi tshogs las byung ba'i mos pa dang/ mos pa 'dra ba ma lus pa thams cad

mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su dag pa'i shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams blanamangang yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// kye rgyal/

ba'i sras mos pa sna tshogs kyi dngas tha dad pa snga ma dadag lta zhog gi/ kyi rgyal pa'-i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur taM/ de'i sems gcig bskyod pas 'ge Nanagyi khams grangs med par
gtogs da res mtshan rnams kyi dbang po sna tshogs rab tu shis par gyur la/ de ltabu'itshuladun mas bskyed pa re re la shos pas/ shar phyogs logs su bskal ba grangs med pa zad par byas kyang/
shar phyogs kyi sems can rnams kyi dbang po snatshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthar thug par ma rungal tshul de bzhin du mos pa la ji skad du brjod pa bzhin/ dbang po tha dad pa la ya ngashesapar

ba/ de dag gi dbang po sna tshogs gcig nasagacig tu brgyud pa ni/ phyogs garusaM mthar thug par rung yang srid spyi/ byachub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyong chub tu soms/
dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mtha'amad do// de ci'i phul zhin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rtagasems can de tsamu dag gi dbang po sna tshogs shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'ad ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes par bya
ba'i don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed nub tu sems skya'o/ gzhung da bzhin du ji ltar mos pa la brjod pa de bzhin dbang po rnams la ang shes par bya
ste thibs por gyur pa'i dbang po dang/ sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang/ yongs suphags pa'i dabapodang ngang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i dbang po dang/ rgyu'ags dang ldan pa'i dbang po

dang/ rkyen gyi tshogs 'a sa byung ba'i dbang pa dang/ dbang po'i dra ba sdums cad ma lus pa la mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig pa'i rigs pas mngon par 'tshong rgyu bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyo'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dbang po sna tshogs kyi dang snga ma de dag lta zhog gi/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di la
skyes bu la la zhage skyes par gyur to/ de'isaMms bskyang pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangasamed par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su shes par gyur la/
tshul de lta bu ng sems bskyod pa'i rir shes pas/ shar phyogs logs su bskal pa grangs med pa zad par byas kyang/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi mthar
phyin par ma rung la/ gzhungad bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams kyi bsam ba sna tshogs/deshes pa rung yang srid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ba named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu sems dang bo bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mthar thug bar mi rung ngo// da ci'i phyir zhin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems cand tsam dgagi bsam pa sna tshogs yogasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byung ba
sems dpa' rnams blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skya'i/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsamapa sna tshogs

yongs su shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyi'i/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams branabad pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye ste/ gzhung de ltamos dal ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du ste//

gam pa thibs por gyur ba dang/ sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bsam pa dang/ gos su brtags pa'i bsal rung/ rang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam ba dang/ rgyutshogs dang ldan pa'i bsam ba dang/ rkyen gyi tshogs lA

byung ba'i bsam pa'i bar du bsam pa'i dra ba ma lus pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jugang/ losasu'ag parishes pa/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bsam pa sna tshogs kyi de pa snga ma de dag lta zhog gi kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes te/ de'i mams bskyang pa gcig gis 'jig rten

gyi khams graamad par gtogs pa'isaMms can rnams kyi sbyor pa yongs su shesal/ gzhung de ltar mos pa la dza 'a rab rjod pa bzhin du lta/ phyog bcu'i sbyor ba sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de gnam thar

thugapar rung yang srid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams dang po bskyed pa'i reg pa'i rtsa ba mthar thug par mi rung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/kyi rgyal ba'i srasasemanyand tsam

dag gi sbyor ba sna tshog shes pa'i don dun/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chusamasam skye'i/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thamAcad du gtogs pa'i sems

can rnams kyi sbyor bsnatshogs yongs su shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya ba bya ba'i phyire/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rlan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya tshul sams sgyu 'o// gzhung de ltar ms pa laji skad

du brjod pa bzhin te/ sbyor ba'i dre bam lus ba thams cad kyi bar du mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig baTishes pas mngon par 'tshang rgyabar bya ba'i phyi'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// rgyal ba'i lus sbyor bsnatshog sakyi dpe de dag lta zhog gi dang rgyal ba'asras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes to/ de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi
za @#// khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems bskyed pa sna tshogs rab tu shesal/ tshul de lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yongs su shes pas/ gzhung de bzhin du ste/

phyogs bcules mas bskyed pa sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni mthar thug par 'du yasId kyi byang chub sems dpa' bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyang pa'i dag

ba'i rtsa bani mthar thug par mi rung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na dkyi rgyal ba'i sras sems can dag gisoms sna tshogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu sems skya ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyis kyis klas pa/ sems can gyi khams kyis gtugs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sems can gyi
khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems sna tshogs thams cad yongs su shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub
du sems su'o// gzhung de ltar mos pa la ji skad du brjod pa bzhin de/ sems bsnyad pa'i dra ba ma lus pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug cing yongs su rig pa'i shes pas mngon pala'atshang rgya bar

bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems bskyed pa'i dpe snga ma de dag lta zhog gi dkyi rgyal bsras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes
ba7par gyur te/ de'i mas bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med bar gtogs pa ni saMms can rnams kyi las sna tshogs rab tu shesal/sems bskyed bshes pa'i tshul de lta bu s shar/

phyogs logasasu bskal pa grangs med pa zad pa byas kyang/ sems can rnams kyi las sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ba mthar thug par ma rung la/ de bzhin du skyes du bcu ba'i bar du skyes par gyur te/skyes bu dgu po de dag/
gis sems can rnams kyi las sna tshogs gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa yongs su shes bar bya ba'i phyir/ bskal ba grangs mo ba zad par byas pa de dag sogs bskyod pa gcagags shes par gyur kyang/ phyugs par
su shes bar 'abAyer/ bskal ba grangasam da ba zad pa bas ba de dag las bsnyad pa gcig gis shes par gyur kyang/ phyogs bcu

las sna tshogs gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa de dag ni mthar thug par rung nga sring kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang bo bskyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mtha' thug/

par mi rung ngo// deci'iphyi zhe na/ kyi rgyal pa'israsasamasacan de tsam dag gi las sna tshogs yongasasu shes par bya ba'i don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tha na medang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems skyo ba ma yan gyi/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ dus gsum ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las sna tshogs yongs su shes pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i
brag thams cad lamakhasab mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// 'di lta sta/
sems can gcig gras med cing rnam pa tha dad par yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ las kyi tshul brjod pa'i snang ba rab tu 'thob pa dang/ las thams cad ma lus pa gcig nas gcig du brgyud pa dang/
las dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba rgya mtsho mngon par 'tshang rgyu bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// 'di lta ste/
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam pa tha dad pa la rab du 'jug cing/ dus gsum thams cad kyi las sna tshogs dbang gis yongs su/shes par
bya ba dang/ las ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// 'di lta ste/ skal ba mnyam
pa'i las dang/ skal ba mi mnyam pa'ilas shes pa'i mchog thob par bya ba dang/ las thams cad las gcig du yang dag par 'jug pa dang dalas gcig las thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par

lo 'tshang rgya ba'i bya b.riphyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye'o// 'di lta ste/ bla ma dang bcas pa'i las dang/ bla na med pa'i las dang/

lhag ma dang bcas pa'i las dang/ mnyam pa'i las dang/ mi mnyam pa'i las kyi bye brag ye shes kyi rgyud chen pos mngon pa 'tshang rgya zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyung chub tu sems skya'o// 'di lta ste/ gnas pa'i las dang/ mi gnas pa'i las dang/ thun mong gi las dang/ thun mong ma yin pa'i las dang/ mtha' yas
pa'i las dang/ mu med pa'i las dang ma 'dres pa'i las dang/ dge ba'i las dang/ mi dge ba'i las dang/ 'jig rten gyi las dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las dang/ las kyi bye brag

thams cad la ye shes kyi rgyud chen pos mngon palaratshang rgya zhing gnyis par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpar rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o//'di lta ste/ shes
pa'i las dang/ mi shis pa dang/ chen po dang 'bring dang/ tshad med pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad ma lus pa chags pa med pas shes par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mngon pa3
'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems sbya'o// 'di lta ste/ rnam par dag pa'i las dang/ kun nas nyon mos pa'i las dang/
rgya chen bor las dang/ rgya chung ngu'i las dang/ kun tu 'brel ba'i las dang/ kun tu ma 'brel ba'i las dang/ phra ba'i las dang/ sbom pa'i las dang/ las ma lus par sems can gyi khams
kya 'os kyi tshul rnam pa tha dad pa la rab tu la jug pa dar/ sems can gcig gi las sna tshogs 'byam glas pa bcu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byuba' phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnalas 'amed

pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i phying chub tu sems skya'o// 'di lta sta/thabs por gyur pa'i las dang/ sbyor ba can gyi las dang/ chung ba'i les dang/ dran pa dang ldan pa'i lasang rgyu'i tshogs dang ldan pa las dang rkyen gyi tshogs las

byungaba'i las dang/ las kyaDib thams cad n zhusapa ma nyamapa nyid du yongs su'age de shes pa su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'aphyi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub sam
kazhi chargyas pa chag po 'di dobam po nyi shu gsum pa/ dkyi rgyal ba'asgos las sna tshogs kyi bsngal de dag lta zhagag/ kye rgyal ba'asras dil skyes bu la la/

zhag sa ta/de'asim sabaskyad bkacig gas shar phyogs legs su gajagi rten gyi khams grangs med par gtogs pa'i soms can rnams kyi sems bskyod pa shes par gyur la/ tshul de ltar sems baskyang pa re rer yongs
su shes pas/ shar phyogs logs subaskal pa grangs med pa zad par byas kyar/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa stsa tshog sa mthar thug paa ru la/ de bzhin du[︽]'a 'og tu skyes bu gnyis pa zhage skyes

[& ]shes bya nas/ skyes bu pa cu pa zhage skyes pa'i bar du sta 1 skyes bu dgu ba de dag gas bskal pa grangs med pas nyon mos pa sna tshogs rab tu shes pa de dag sems bskyed pa gcig gis yongs su shes pa3
[./]gyur la tshul de 'dra bar sogs bskyod ltar longs su shes pas/ gzhung de dazhazhe dus/ phyogs bcu' nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag mthar thug par rung yang
srad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i regakha'artsa ba na mthar thug par ma rung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen 2 kyi rgyal pa'i sras
sems can de tsam dag gi nyon mongs pa sna tshogs yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyi'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya bas yanak+Sha/ chad ltar
'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du ga togs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa tshad med pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yar
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// 'di lta sta/ nyon mongs pa yang ba dang/ rtsomongs pa lub mngon par 'tshang rgyapa' ye shes rongs su shes par bya ba'i phyi'i/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'od gnad lta sta/ bag la nyal ba'i nyin mongs pa dang/ sems can kun nas 'khor ba'i nyon
gongs pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rang rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yongs su shes pa 'khruba' phyo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams blo med pa yang dag par
tha// rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams skya'o// 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa tshad med pa sna tshogs rang dbang med par byed pa'i nyon mongs ba rnam par bcad pa'i ba shes

pongs su shes pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// 'di lta// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang rnam par dpyod ba rnam pa sna tshogs

shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir 'byung bsams dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// 'dalta sta/ ma rig pa la gnas pa'inyon mongs pa dang/ srid pa dang ldan pa'i nyon

mongs pa dang/ srid pa'i rgyud thamasacad kyi nyon mongs pa kumachu sbyor ba rnam par bcad pa'i ye shes yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dbala rnams bla nam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub
tu sams skya'o// 'di lta sta/ 'dod chags kyis per brjoms pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ zhe sdang gis khong khro ba dang/ gti mug gis mngon par khebs pa dang/ cha mnyam pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/
nyon mongs pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas te rnam pa gcad pa'i ye shes yongs su shes bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'o rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
skya'o 'di lta ste/ bdag tu bu ba shin tubasgoms pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ bdag gir bya ba la mngon bar zhen pa dang/ nga rgyal gyis bsang ba dang/ nga rgyal gyis mngon ba spel ba'i nyon
mos pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus pa khong du chud cing longs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
sbyaro 'di lta sta/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba'i yongs su rtog pa rtsa bar gyur pa nyon mongs pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa'i shugs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i nyon mongs
pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshul sna tshogs dang ldan ba'i nyon mos pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes yongs su

shes pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skya'o// 'di ltasta/ sgrib pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ kun nas sgrib pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
shes pas rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ snying chen pos yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'o rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tusams skya'o// bsam pa dad/ bkal/

nyal ba dang/ kun nas 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i drang thams cad rnam pa ragacad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogasapa'i byang chub cu sogs rgya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras

nyon mongs pastsalcogs kyi dpa de dag lta'ang zhogagi dkyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu la la zhig skyes par gyur la/ de'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams tshangasad par gtogs pa'i sangs
na rnams dang lhan cig pas/ shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad mad pa dag mnab stsal bro ba'i mchog tshad yod pa dang/ bdug spos tshad med pa dang/ na bza' dang/

gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ de don tshad med pa dang/ pho brang tshad med pa dang/ bla re tshad med pa dang/ gzhal med khang tshad mang pa dang/ rin po che'idra ba dpag tu med pa dang/ sa ge'i gdan dpag tu med pa

dang u0f10rin po che'i rgyan dang/ lhab lhub tshad med pa daN/ mchod pa'i rnam ba tshad med pas mnyes par byas te/ bsapa tshad med par bsan bkur la/ rim gro dang bkur sti byas te rjes dang mchod bas bdud cing
phyug mal te/ spyi bos gtugs nas snyan bar brjod de 'khor zhing zhal du lta la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang ma da dang 'gro ba yul 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa de dag gis
shin tu dad pa'i mar mo grangs med ba dgakyang dus te/ skyes bu des ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de dag gis kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams de snyad po de dag nor bu rin po che rnam bar snang ba dang/ yid
bzhan gyi rgyal bo dang/ phyogs thams cad snang bar byed pa dang/ ma'i 'od dang/ brgal dka' ba dang/ chu'i zla ba'i 'od dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ bsod nams kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ nor bu
yid du 'ong ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa rin po che tshad med pas yongs su bkang sta yon du gsol la/ de bzhin du me tog dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ ma bzang

tshadagadugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ pho brang dang/ gnam yol dang/ sil snyan dang/ rol mo brdung ba dang/ glu dang/ rin po che'i dra ba dang/ gsar gyi dra dang/ nor bu'i dra ba dang/ dril
bu'i dra ba dang/ sang gali khri dang/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa brtsam pa rgya cher te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs shing 'tshog zhes pa'i tsho/ mchod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu s mchod
nas mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ma de dang 'gro ba phal 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med par gtogs pa de snyad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang mchod rten 'jig rten gyi khams
tshad med pa dang mnyam pa yangs shing rgya che ba rin po chatshad lad pa las brtsigs te/ rgyan dang ni po che tshad med pas bskrun la/ mchod rten gcig ji lta ba bzhin du mchod rten dpag tu med
pa mang po la yang de bzhin du byas te// thams cad kyi tshad kyang de tsam la mchod rten re re la yang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gzugs mang po tshad med par byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
mang po yang snang bas rgyas par gyur la/ rnam sras de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang

mchod pa bya bas bskal pa tshad med pa zad par gyur te/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang//
rtenub skya phyog sa mtshams dang/ nub byung ga phyogs mtshams dang/ 'ogadung stong ga phyogs dang/ phyogasabcu thams cad du'ang rgya cher ta skyes bu bculo sngon du 'grobs phyogs bcu

re la skyes bu re re zhing yang phyogasabcun byas zha/ kyal ba'i sras de la ji snyam du sags/ s+yas de la sogs pa'i mi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bcu gtogs pa de dag la de'irgyus bsod nams kyiphung bo

chor legs lam/ sAs pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de nas ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud par zad do// sAsab/kye rgyal ba'asras byang chub sems dang sems dang rolaskyod

ba'i bsod nams kyi phung bo jatsem la dbang bsod shams kyi phung po de la bskal pa tshad med pa/mnyes par byas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang/ mi gro las byung pa'i bsod masakyi phung po sngal des brgya'achar yang nye ba'i

gle'o// stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong ga che dang/ bye ba brgya so dgi chags nag dbar 'gro 'o// grangs dang/ cha rang/ bgrang ba dang/ deb dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// kye rgyalakhab sras deb snga ma de dag lta'ang zhog

ga kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di la skyes bu gnyis bzhag nga sku/ de'asimasabaskyadab gcig gis skyes bu snga ma de dar 'gro ba phal 'jig rten gyi khams grangasazhemar gtogs pa rdzas rnams kyi bskal ba tshad med pa sangs

rgyas lamachod pa dang/ rim gro mngon par 'du byas pa de dag somasab skyed pa gcig gis gzhi bar 'du byed la/ tshul de lta bur sabaskyodapa'i lamanyes ba 'byed pas/shar phyogru la phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa

mtho gtogs sems can rnams dang lcatshag pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa ma sad par byas te/ gzhung de bzhazhedu thog ma la jaskad du brjod pa de bzhin du gnyis pa la yagatumed// gsum pakha grangs/

mang pa/ bzhi pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lngab la mtshungs pachod pa/ drug pa la kun tu matha' yas pa/ bdun pa la mu ste dal/ brgyadapa las mtshamasamad pa// dgu pa la gzhal du gang ba'i bar du rgyu/

kyi rgyal ba'i sras deb sngag de dag lta'ang zhog gi dkyi rgyal ba'i sras 'dalaskyes bu bcu pa zhig skyasnya/ spyas bu snga mar gupa de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa bcu gtogs pa'i sems can
thal de dag gso bskal pa dpag tu med par sangs rgyas mchod pa dang/ si gros mnyes par byas pa de tsam dusags bskyod pa gcig gis mnyes par byed cing [7 ]tshul de ltams bsgyur pa ra mnyis
bar byed pas/ shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams brjod byed par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig pas zhal zas bro ba'a mchog brjod dumed pa zhes bya bshus/ gzhan bar rgya cher te/

de lta bu s sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod dumang bamanyes par byas panas/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyang pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la bskal pa brjod du med pa ra gtogs

pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang/ bstanabakur ba las byung ba'i sodazhanas kyakhung po snga ma brgya'achar yang dbam 'gro zhes bya bas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar m 'gro zhes bya ba'i bar du snya kade ci'i phyir zhen/ kyi
rgyal ba'asras don 'di ltar sangs rgyas skyes ba de tsag tshazhig mchod cing bsan bkur ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chodapa' yi khyad de tsam dgag phyir/ byang lcagasams dpa' sagasala'

chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyo'i/den 'i da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad chos de ris kyis klus la/nam mkha'adi'i ris kyi mthas
gtugs pa brjod la dpa' yang brjod du mdab/ phyogs bcu tshad las 'das pa// badras smras pa phyogs bcu nim gras mtha' yas pa'i dzubs khyab pa// mig 'phrul gyi ma pas bsam yas kha/'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad gzhi mnyam pa dang/ 'ag rten gyi khams ma lus par 'dus pa'i tshul shan tubastanab/ 'dushes kya rnam pa la gnas pa'i phyogs kyakhri pa rnam par phye ba la gnas pa thams cad dug togs pa/

g+hagayumed pa' ma lus pa'ijaganyen gyi khams kyi gangs dar tshul shan bstan pa dag spru ston gyi mtha'amur thug pa'i bskal pa 'gas pa'i tshul shan tu bstan par gtogs pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi

tshul gyis mngon par thugs su chud pa dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyidazhub par gyur te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ gang yang ma 'ongs ba 'dug na/ 'jige nyan gyi khags thams cad du dag zhu/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang dang da ltar byung ba'ajusan/ da ltar phyogs kacun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhugs pa'i 'tsho

ma ga zhes ba dang/ chos ston pa de dag thamasacad kachod cing gi go bu ga phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams blashamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chub tus las skye// rags bskyod pa de skyes ma thagazhas/

nga dang der 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs ba sngon gyi chur gyur pa janyidamada bzhi zhi gshegs pa de dag gseman ba thugs su chud pa de dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyid mu ngan las 'das pa de dag gi
dge ba'i rtsa ba ja lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bde nyes so// de bzhazhe gshegs bamakhyonab de dang de'ajusasu gtogs pa phyi ma'amatha'amur bstan pa/ dbag mar pa mtha' dang dbus med
par shan du bstan pa dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang janyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gdeg ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yodis so/ da ltar gyur pa 'di bzhin
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med par bstan// ma lus pa'i mngon bar sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga regaba'artsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa'i
da 'di chos shang longs su 'dzin pa 'byed/ yongs su rgyus par byed/ rab tu'athob par byed/ khong du chudapa'i byed/'gatu3gi par byed/ shin tu sgrugapa' byed/ rgyud gcig tu
gyur bar byer/ sangs rgyas thamasacad kyang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'daltar sems bskyed pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi gnang rgyushagi
ma/ a/ 'char pa'i phyir skye'o// 'jug na gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par du ba 'phyo'i skyago/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gtogs pa'i
sems can yongs su bsgral ba'aphyi'i skya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams thalatshad du 'du ba dang 'jig pa longs sushes par bya ba'i phyir skyago/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i

sems can rnams kyi shanas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba yongs su shes bar bya ba'i phyir skyo go/ 'jig rten gyi khams zamasabacad kyi srid pa gsum yongs su dag pa yongs su shes pa bya ba'i phyir
sprul sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ bag chags thams cad yongs su shes pa bya ba'aphyi'i skye'o// sems can thams cad kyi shi 'pho dang skyob yongs su shes

bar bya ba'i phyi'i skye 'o// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyi'i rgyab// sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang spyod pa yongs su shes par byab 'phyi'i skya go/ sa nas
can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes bar bya ba'i phyi'i spyi sku/ sems bskyed pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dag dang nye bar 'gyurako/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon/

pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sku par 'gro'i dam byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom

wa ldan 'das 'das bak+kamAkyi chos kyang thob par 'gyura'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi tshos kyang thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar byung ba rnams kyi chos kyang
thob par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyad dutabar 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du bar
'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag par 'gyura'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yo shes kyi tshogs kyang
rnam par dgapar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i stobs la sgrub ba med ba shin tu brtan par 'gyur go/ 'asal dang/ mkhyen pa drang
dalta'abyung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgag mi bsnyangs pa rongs su dag pa'i ng yongs su rdzogs par byed dod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyibastan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi

chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su 'thob bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyibastan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas[”]chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogasapar
byed ngo nam mkha'i dbyings kya mthar thug pa chos kyi dbyas kyi mtha' 'dabus med par shin tu bstan pa'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yi shes kyabarjes zhu'athob
po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar de nas ngs rgyas su shog cig ces bya ba'i sams bskyang pa des/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nyab yin/ ma khyon
pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nyab tshan/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'asangs rgyas kyi yul rnams dang mnyam pa yin// 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

tshes rnamadzang nyal pa yazhi'o// ma 'ongs pa der da lta 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul thams cad dang mnyamapa yin/ gcig tu nges pa'i lus gcig tu
[%/]grub pas kyang/ dus gsum dumanyam pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kya ye shes dang 'grogs pa yang thob sta/ yashes de dang 'grogs bar gyur pa'i sems khaspyod pa byung ba de skyes ma thag tu/
phyogs bcun sangs rgyas rnams kyang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// sems bskyed pa de nyid ton du mdzad de/ 'dul ba ji bzhin du chos kyang yang dag par son/ 'dzagi rten gyi khams thams cad
'ang 'dul ba tshadayod pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang sbyang bas rgyas par 'gyur/ 'jig
gyi khams tham sa cad kyi ngan song yang rgyun chad par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang longs su dag par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang yang dag
a par ston bar 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ chos kyadabyangs thams cad la yang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi rtags thams cad kyang yongs su
'dzin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 3ga kyi snang ba thams cad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ dus gsum du gtogasam la sems bskyang pa der sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/
phyang chub sems dpa' 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' chos sam/ rang sangs rgyus sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ 'jag
rtsin pa 'am 'jig rten pa'i chos sam// 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/ sems can nam/ sems can gyi chos kyang rung ste/
ma 'dusab gang yang med de/ thams cad mkhyen pa khyed nam gtogs so// de ltar n sems bskyed pa der ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'dus so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i
phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rjelashin tu thu ba snyad rnam pa drug tu g.yosapar gyur/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g yos so// 'gul to//
rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// legago/ btug go/ kun tu ldeg go cham cham/ rab chuchom chom/ zha tu chamachem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/
kun tu 'u zhu'o// shag dge/ gtu shig shig na tushag shig go gnas gangs rgyas kyamathudang/ sems bskyod pa de'i yon tan yang dag par brjod/
gla pa'i chos nyade'ab tu thob pasu'i/lha rdzas kyam tog ga chen yang mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi sras kyan la yang mngon pa la khab bo// lha rdzas kyaphu mal cher yang mngon par khabalo//
lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i char yang mngon par bab go lha rdzas kyi gos kya cher yang mngon par bab ga/ lha rdzas kyi zhi bo 'char yang mngon pa bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyur yang mngon par
bab bo lha rdzas kyi ri mo rnams kyang mngon bar sgra 'byin par gyur to// lha rdzas kyi snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo// lha rdzas kyi 'od kyang rab tu byung ngo/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhangag rdzul shani takhra ba gdab das pa'i l rolanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros sumtshan btags pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul shani ngayu ba snyad kyis zhal mngon
bstan tagasung brjod pa// chos kyi blo gros legs so legs so// phyogs bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdulangashan tuphra kha snyad kyis chos bstan pa de la ched du brjod pa mdzad
do dad kyis kyang chos bstan pa 'dinyid shan tu rnam par phye ste/ ngod kyis ji ltar shani tu rnamakhar khyab de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gzhi ra rnam par phye'o// khang tedi du ]

tsa0/ yang khyod kyi chos khastan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong ga rtse shan tu phra ba snyad kyis byang chub tu sems khaskyod de// de dag kyang nged kyis lung bstan to/ de dag nam
'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa stong phrag brjod du med pa'i mthar thams cad kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mnge tha dad pa dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gcig pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur
te/ 'di ltar sems rnam par dag pa zhes byab sha stag tu 'gyur ro// nged kyis chos bstan pa 'di yang jaltar ma 'ongs ba'ajus na/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma thes pa rnams
kyis thos par bya ba dang/ jaltar 'jigarten gyi khamasamA mjed 'di'i sems can rnams kyis shos shang gling bzhapa 'di'i 'i rdzob kyatse me la dza ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de bzhin du
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khamAkhyob ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshadamadapa/ grangs med pa// bsam gyis ma khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa// kun tu tha 'a yas ra/ dbag tume dra ba/
sa mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa// chos kyi dbyangs kyis klus ba/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag tu yang/ sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir byin gyis
brlab bo// thams cad na yang chos bstan pa 'di nyid byang chub sags dba' chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi sAn lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi
chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pa dang/ ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu gsal bar bya bdar/ don gyis gdulakha' snang ba thob pa dang/ chos nyid bab chu 'thob pa' bya ba
kladang byang chub sems dpa'i rnamar shan tu dga' bar khadang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyu'ang dag par bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas chos mnyam pa nyid du bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyangs
gnyis sumed pa la 'jug ba'i bya ba 'phyi 'gatuston to// danas byang chub sems ba 'chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogasabcur bltas te/ 'khor thams cad la rnam par bstasazhas/
nam mkha' khams la na mkha' spyod// sems can gyi khams mings su smin par byed/ las dang rnam par sman ba'akhems na 'galab 'byed/ nam mkha'i khams na yongs su dag/
bkyed/ kun nas nyon mongs pa las byung banashib tusal/ mos pa yangs pa lasabyung bzhashin tu 'phel bar byed/ somasatsa nargyadabang bo tha dad pa lana'ib tu 'jug/ dus gsum n
mnyam par byed/mngan las 'das pa de nges lanayeng dag par rtog ri/ rang gtog ba'i rtsi ba'i stobs longs su dag par bya ba la gzholakha'aphyir/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi ni khrusatshigs/
( su bcad pa 'di rigasAs so// gang zhigakhyogs rnams bcu po ma lus rgyas byas ngashang// sems can zhing dang chos gsum dag kyang rtogs gyur/ sangs rgyas mtsha mchog byang chub sems dba'
re bzhaneta// dadag 'jig rtan yan lu sems kyi rim pa spyad// nam mkha'adebanges kyis klas pa'i sa dbyangs jabazhin dang/ 'ji ltar sangs rgyas chos rnams 'gro kun rjes song dang//
sangs rgyas thamasacad kun tu khyab pas jibazhi rgya// 'gro ba ma ldog don du phan pa rab tu zhugs/ da' jag rten rnams la byams pas rtag pa la rab gnas shing// 'tshe ba med par 'gro la
phan tshu'i su zhugs te// snangabam zer 'od byed gnas su gyur pa'i snyems// bsam gyis ma khyab stobs bcu mnga' bas byin gyis brlabs// den zhing rnams tha dad pa yin tshul yang 'ad/
de na lus zhes pa kun la'ab tu zhugs// bsod nams ye shes de yang sangs rgyas byang chub bzhin// den chags med gzhol ba ye shes rgyur skyes so// spyi'i tshugs rgyu ba'i 'gro ba sna tshogs
ma lus pa// gzhan yang zhing rnams 'khyam klus chags medamatha' phrug pa// dadag phra sbom rgyu cha yangs pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems mchog de na gcig pu kun tu 'gro/ brjod
dukhyedapa shin tu phra zhang la gnas pagi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i mchog la rtag zhugs shang// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas chos mthong mngoms pa// de dag chos rnams rgya mtsho'i snyem
par chud pa bani// 'jig rten lam rgyud kun la su zhag snyade brtse zhing// 'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar rtag tu zhugs pa'i snyems// phyi ma'i mthar thug sangs rgyas gdung gi rgyun mi gcod/
de ni dud kyi khyim yang rab tu 'joms kha ya// sa gsum rgyal ba rnams dang rgyud gcig dngos gyur cing// shan tu phra ba'i tshul gyase lam la rtag brtson te/ su zhig
sangs rgyas yul la dadasams pa// denachags med thub pa kun gyis dbang yang bskur// rdo rje lta bur sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa// rkang gnyis gtso bos mdzad pa rtagatudran shes shing//
'dren pa'i spyod yul snang 'bashan rnyed pa'i rnams// gzhan gyi drung la ma rgyug byang chub sems kyang sku// 'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rnam ba mang shes shing// de bzhazhe las dang 'bras bu
sams kyi rnams kyang ste// gzhan yang dbang po'i mthu dang khams rnams dum dag/ kun kyang byang chub sems la sdod yul gcig yin no// gang zhig chos kyi dburjes bzhan byang chub sems
gdas shing// rtag tu chos la mi gnas nam mkha' ji'i zhan ba// chags med sems ldan de dag sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs/ de dag rtog med chos can yang dag mtha' la gnas//
sems can bsam ba rnam 'byed sems can 'du shes med// chos kyi rnam rtog khrag khrig pha mthar rab tu phyin// de dag rtog la mos shing rnam par mi rtog sku// derag zhing rnams skye ba khrag
khrag rjes su zhugs// gang zhig sas rgyas bye ba khrag khrag rjes sams shing// gang zhig chos dbyangs tshul gyi mdzod du zhugs gyur la// gang zhig sems can dabang bo zhim pa'i
tsas/ mtha' thun ba// de dag sems can gtsosazhani chos nyid shes pa yin// ltag pa'i bsam pa dge dang rtag par mngon ldan zhing/ da skyes bu'i sang ge' bsun bkur phyir ldog mi 'gyur la//
'jig rten gtso bris mkhas pa thong bsam ngoms ba// de dag sangs rgyas khrag khrag bye bas khyan gyis brlabs// zab mo'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed kyang chags pa med// gnas pa med
bas sems kyi dmapa rtag tu dag/ de dag bskal pa mtha' yas skyes bu seng ge 'i sogs// dus gsum chags pa med pa' rtogs pa'i yid dang ldan// ma bregs thub par ma nus yod kyi
dbang lo dang// gsum pa rjes su so nga rang rtag tu ldan gyur cing// chos rnams 'byam klas shin tu bslabs pas rmongs med pa/ gang dag chos dbyangs 'gangs kyang nam yang ma ngoms
so// tshig ga la ma 'das bzhin mkhas pa zhi ba shes// de bzhin nyid 'dzum yang rnam par ma 'byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas thams cang yul la rjes sems ngashade/ (dus gsum
chags pa med pa rtogs pa'i lade ldan 'gyur/ mkhas pa gang zhig sems bskyed 'byam klas chos kyidabyanges// 'gengs shing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhang du 'gro ba na/ de dag khrag
khrag tshul rnams brjod duld pa la// snang ba rad par gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras yin no// chos rab mu stags snying rje'i tshul gyi rjes song zhing// byams pa'i pha rol phyin pa bar snang ji
/ @#// bzhan te// sems can khams la rnams kyang yongs su rtog mang// de dag rnam rtog med la brtson zhing 'jig rten spyod// phyogs bcu dag tu bden pas 'gro ba yod
'bebs par// 'dong bas sems nyan gtso bo de dag kun tu rgyu// bden pa'i tshig brtson rtag tures pa'i sems ldan pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i mi yi mchog gsan gyis brlabs//
'das par gyur pa'i dus kyang de dag rjes su dran// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus 'jug pa rnam par bsgom// de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na mi gnas te// sems can phan dang dgrol
phyi'i kun tu nam par rgyu/ du shes 'od mchog dam pas chags pa med gyur pa// sgyulany+dzil ba chos 'bazhem nur med brtan rnams// de dgaze tshom thams cad rnamalar zlogapa byed///
chos kyi dedus 'dirinamazhur med par rab tu 'jug dgang zhag bdun mas kun gyi gnas rnams 'joms byed dang// gang yang sems can rab 'bi shin tu sa la khyed rang// gang rnams
rtog pa 'dzag cing rnam rtog ma 'grogs pa// sems can gtso bo de dag yul la the tshom med// dus gsum ma lus chos rnag bar bzlog byas shing// bsam pa mchog gis de bzhin
gshegs pa'i drung 'gros// dad pa'i stobasadang ldan zhing blo brtan rodapa' rnams/ de dag don rtogs khong du chud cing blo yang dag/ mkhas pa 'gro ba'an duphyi ma'i mtha' so sta
sems can don du rnam thar 'byam klas yongs su tshol// mun 'ang dus su skye pamad cing zhum pa med// sems can dmyal ba sdug bsngal mang po zlog par byed/ gad rag bso danams/
zad ye shes ldan// 'gro ba'i debang mo snatshogs bsam la rab tu 'jug/ skye dgu' las kyi rgyud kyang shin tu shes byas shing// bsam pa ji bzhazhe tshul 'dra'i chos rnams mtha' yas
brjod// 'gro la byams pa'i sa rnams kun dang rjes su ldan// bdag med de rtogs 'on kyang btang snyoms bye ba bzhi/ de dag snying brtse gcig tu gsal bar chos kyang brjod//
'on kyang dmigs bar ma gnas de dag 'jig rten rgyu// de dag 'od zer dra ba sna tshogs mdog bkye zhing// 'gro pa' mun pa bsal to kun tu snang byas nas// 'od zer sgo ya pad+mo dag la
rgyal sras rnams// kun tu bstan te rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyang ston//sprugatsag rtse la zhang rnams rgyal bas brgyan pa dang// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras kyis brgyan pa mngon bar mthong//
'khor rnams blo sems gzhan dang gzhan can depa med pa// 'gro ba de dag sems zhes rmongs mang ston pa byed// soms 'jug gcig gis phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad kyi//
brjod du med pa khrag khrig zhange rnams kun bgrod cing// song ste sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don du cho byas nas// dri ba khrag khrag don dang ldan pa sna tshogs 'dra// bde gshegs rnams la pha
pa 'du shes 15bzhag cing/ dachos kyi gtor mkhas rtag tu shes rab rnon po can// khe shes 'byung gnasagakhas pas sangs rgyas chags med pa'i// 'gro ba'i don
'dabyang chub mchog gi spyodab sgrug/ gang rnams chos dbyas rnam par bya zhange ba ma byas kyang// bskal ba mang po 'das byos zad bar ma gyur to// chos nyid gnas med gang la 'du chud par
ma gyur kyang// chags med go shes can rnams kyis da bar yod/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i rigs su rigs dang ldan gyur cing// bde gshegs kun gyi sku las mang dag byung gyur pas//
chos kyi lus can de dag 'gro la gzugs lus ston// sgyu mkhan mkhas pa 'di 'ong sgyu ma ston pa bzhin// mkhas pa de dag la lar skyod pa mchog red snang// la lar mkhas pa skya

zhung mya ngan 'das par snang// byang chub dmapa'o mchog kyang rnam par 'tshang rgyu snang// mya ngan 'da' bskyon pa'i ng de bzhan la lar snang// rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos rgyal ba'i sa man pa'i//
chos tad de la dza ltar rab tu gnas ba ltos// lus dang sgra medabasama med 'du shes ldan pa yin/ 'on kyang bya ba sna tshogs dus te bar ston ]'gro bar chos rnams rnamakha'abyed nang skyar
'gyur te// 'jig rten gtso bo mi bzhugs phyin rgyal sras rnams// chags med mthar phyin pa la ye shes gnas bcas te// sangs rgyas she cha bas rnam bar 'phrul ba dag kyang ston//
'jige nyan 'dazhi de dag 'dra ba gang yang med// de dag pas kyang 'thags pa lha go ci zhig sbos// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashes yangs pa ma thob pas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thabs su rnam
'khrul mchog kyang thob// gang rnams chos ba 'a pags par rtag tu 'jug byed pa/ byed dgachos rab dam pa mchog ga theg pa la// 'jagi rten dus dang dus mni tshod kyang shes byas shing/
da dag 'gro la phan phyir rnam par 'phrul bstan// dpa'i ba gang rnams zhang kun badag ga lus 'gengs shang// gang rnams 'gan 'od zer dra ba mchog gtong ba//mun pa bsal rang snang bas 'jig
na rgyas par byed// klu yi dbang po bzhin du chos kyachar pa 'bogs// rma lam lta bu lag pa'i sgyum 'dra ba la// 'du byed rab tu shes nas lam rnams sbyor 'jug cing/ 'gro ba thams cad
sAng chen pos khyab tus nas// ngagazhani dag pa thar lam khu bamedal ston// gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ji bzhan tshadamed dang// gang rnams mkha' ltar 'grob kun tu mtha' yas sharin
gang rnams sems can khams kun yongs su dgrol brtson pa// de dag bskal pa bye ba grangs med spyad pa spyod/ de las mchog na med pa ni tu sbyangs pa las// yon tan dum ba sna tshogs rnams
kyang kun sems shing/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod pa mchog ma mthong// thams cad mkhyen pa 'a la shes 'byung ba rnam par lta// sems 'byung gcig gse 'a jig rten bsam gyis
na khyab ba/ 'bum kyis bdunatu rgyu'ang 'gro ba 'a 'gatusnang// rtog dang rnam rtog ma 'byed dag pa 'asams dang ldan// de dag gcig man lus la lus gcig ston ba byed/
( bu dag 'jig rten kun la rtog pa'i m byed d// mgon po kun gyi chos nyid yongs sum rtog go/ de dag chos kun rnam 'byed 'dod chags bral gyur kyang// 'gro ba thar par bya ba yongs su mi gtong
ngo// 'jig rten kun gya'adu shes rnam pa gang yodapa// bzad ngan 'phrang dang de bzhag chung dang sna tshogs kyi// 'du shes thabs bo dag dang rab rgal rnam bya ste// de dag blo'i brlubs nas par
'khrul ba shin tu ston// jaltar sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs tshadamed pa// de 'dra'a rnam par 'phrul pas chos dbyangs 'di dag 'gangs// zhum ma kha'i dbyangs kyi mthas klas lus kyi bye brag gis//
'gro ba rnams kyi chos pa ji bzhazhi ston pa byed/ de dag gang la' ngam chags rtog dang rnam rtog yod// dog pa med cing nyon mongs de bzhin rlom sems med// dadag sangs rgyas chags pa'i blo yod
thar la mni// 'gro ba kun la'ang bde ba'i 'du shes rab tu skyed/ 'dzagaten kun na shes la mkhas na ba ma 'jigs pa// 'jig rten 'du shes gnas la 'jug par m byed de// de dag chos
kun 'di'i 'du shesakhang zhes rtog/ de ltar ga zhagisan dus gsum gang lang dmigs ba med/ sngon gyi mthar thug 'das pa'i dus la rab zhugs te// phyi ma'i mthar thug ma 'ongs pa 'kho
a( zhugs nas// zhi rnams kun na ci yod kun kyang de bzhazhedu/ khakan tu shes kyang rtag par gang yang mi dmigs so// mya ngan 'das pa'i debungs la'ang brtson bar de bzhazhe gnas// nyon sayod/
pa'i tshul gyi rjes song gi gnas te/ de dag yang dag mtha' 'dra de la 'dra ba med// byang bstod pa las kyang dpa' bo ma ldog go/ gang rnams byang chub brtan pa' ra ba bzhi gnasashang//
sas rgyas rgyal sras mkhas bas chos dbyas thams cad dang// 'gro ba kun tu shin tu gang byas pa// 'a ni dpa' bo rnams kyi sbyong pa'i mchog yin// blo mchog Dam pa gang zhage thams cad
mkhyen pa la// rnam grol mdzes pa 'tshula mchog yangs pa 'dod pa na// des na gang las zag zad srid gsum khade 'byung ba'i// byang chub sems la rnam pa med par 'jug par gyis/ gang gi
sam ba rdul khral byang chub sa mas gnas pa// de drag yon tan legs ba zad par brjod ma nus// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don du bde gshegs legs brjod pa'i// yon tan ldan pa de la spyod pa'i
mchog kyang nyon// gangags zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rtul byas te// phyogs rnams re'i kun tu bkang sta bgrang byas share// de ya rjes su dpag pas snum 'dren zad byed na// 'du shes rnams
mthar thug zad pa'i m 'gyur ro// gang zhig sems can grangs mkhas sems can 'du shes med// spyod pa tsam dugazhol zhing sgra la ma chags par// gang zhig 'jig rten khams 'geng chags/
ba med pa' semag/ de dag ldang dang grangs mkhas grangs dmagamed pa yani// pad kyisazhag ma ba 'di byas kyi mtha' yas rgya che dang/ dus rnams 'jig rtan kun tu
ba rtogs pa'i mkhas pa gang/ sbar mos thal gtor bzhan du the tshom rnam gtor ba// de dag sangs rgyas chos rtogs mde can chags pa med// gang dag phyogs rnams mtha' yas zhing la rab/
'jug cing// sems bskyod gcig gsablo nyams med par 'dong byed pa// de dag tha dad grangs la rtags pas der zhugs1/ 1skya ba med pa'i chos la yang dag skatha' ltar mkhas// gang la
glu zhage sa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig pasam las pagi 'khor du skyabaratshun tu zhim rang 'khor gnas kang// gtso bo dag la 'dra min thog mar gang 'gro ga/ spyod yul mchog can de la smon
lam mchog 'ad yin// gang zhig phyogs rnams kun gyi mgon po kun dran zhing// chos nyid de la nam yang gnas bar ma gyur pa// khams gsum dge ba gang yod kun gyi rgyu bzhi te// da rag
'de rnams thams cad yongs su dag par sbyong//gang rnams skyo ba'i rgyud du sridi gsum sna tshogs rnams// 'jig rten kun na yod la ma chags mag gyur pa// de dag bag chags mkhas shing
dbazhi'i dbang po mkhas/ mos pa bye ba khrag khrag bsam yas de bzhazhi mkhas// 'gro ba'i bsam 'jiTazhan gang gis shes gyur cing// shes rab chen po de dag de bzhin chos ston pa//
tsha/de ngas da nas nyon mongs rnam ga tshul lamakhas// sems can mang po rnam par sbyor ba'i lam ldan no// gang zhig nge 'dzan bye ba khrag khrig brjod byas rnams// sems kyi rgyu ba gcig gas
rjes su zhugs gyur pa// de dag mtshan ma sna tshogs gnas pa ba shes// ldang ba'irgyus la mkhas shari blo gros spyod yul shes// chags med byang chub de la mngon du gang zhugs dang//
'gro laphan pa'i don du blo yangs su zhugs pa// ga shes 'dug klasad dngade dag ldan pa yin// de phyir de dag skyo bu mchog ga gsung yang sgrog/ gang zhig bsgral par ng dang bskal pa bung
mkhas shing/ nyin zhag mkhas shang de bzhin zla ba zla phyed mkhas// gang yang 'jig rten rtag tu sku bamakhas gyur pa// zhang ga rnam pa mkhas sharinam phu'i chos med pa'o// gang rnams
phyogs la zhugs te phyogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing// phyogs kun tshad ni rjesasu shes par ma gyur pa// de dag dbu mas phyogs kyi rjes su 'gro byed cing/ zhang rnams sbyong yang yongs su rag rtog
chags pa med// stobs la 'jug pas rgyal ba rnams kyi stobs shes bas// 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas dang gnas gzhi bsag byas na// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba'i las kyis//
gang dag rtogs byas las kyi rnam bar snyan la gnas// 'jig rten kun khams sna tshogs tha dad ja'i zhan du// srid gsum rnam par rgyu ba'i tshul yang ji bzhin dang// dbang po rnon po'abrange
ma/ dang dbang po tha mar yang// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi debang po rnam par 'byed// mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang ma dge dang// bzang ngan de bzhin 'brang la rnam bar/
sa las byed cing// 'gro ba' kun tu 'gro ba brtan pa rnam par 'byed/ gsang gsum rgya yi rgyud kyang de dag rab tu shes// bsam gtan rnam thar nyon mongs ja dezha rnamtshan ma mthong//
nyonaongs mtshams sbyor rnam byung bas 'gyur dang// sngon chad gnas kyabade dang sdug bsngalo rgyud rnams kyang// brtan pa rnams na sems rgyas stobs rnams sbyong ba byed// ji ltar 'gro ba'i
ra lam rgyud nyon mongs las 'jug dang// 'gro rgyud thams cad 'jig cang zhar 'gyur thams cad dang// zlog pa sna tshogs rnams kyang ji ltar skyar 'gyur pa// bag chags mtshams sbyor
ji bzhin de bzhi zhi rab tu 'jug/ jaltar 'jagatan nyon mongs zad tsang dag 'gyur ba// de la skyes bu khyu mchog spyod pa'i blo dang ldan/ stobs 'chang dugan stobs bcu rnams kya 'od snar
su dargyalaba'astobs kyang thob min the tshom yod pa mni// spu rtsa gcig la gang rnams rnam par soms byed cing// la 'anyon mo sa la la dag dang 5das pa yaki/ sna tshogs
zhang rnams tshad las 'das ma kubu masheng nas// las dang bya ba sna tshogs rgyud du rab tu shes// gang rnams rdul gcig rtse la rnam sems brjod med pa'// zhing dang bdag 'gA
sras rnams sems can gtso mthong yang// zhing rnams 'khrugs shing 'dres pa'i nyes pa gang yang med// gcig la 'jug pas rnal 'byor ldan pa kun la 'jug/ spu gnyag rtsa la phyogs
bcu thams cad rnam phye sta/ nam mkha'i dbyangs sbug 'jig rten khams rnams kun shugs shang/ phyogs 'ga' tsam yang rgyal bas stong par mthong ba med// de bzhazhi zhange dang 'jig
rgyun 'byam klas de dag sbyong// shan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo bam po tishu bzhapa// de ltar brtan pas rgyal bas stong man zhing shesazhas//
'jig rten kun kyang spyi tsho gcig la yod par 'jug/ dus gsum rgyu rnams mtshan nyid tha dad khams kun dang// nyin zhag dus dang zla phyed rgyud kya rnam thar 'jug/ de ltar rgyal sras 'jigs
gad byang chub sems dpa' rnams// skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes rgyal srid thob zhugs la// de dag 'di 'dra shes nas rjes su sems byed cing// bde gshegs rnams la dga' ba
mtha' las yangs pa 'thob// gang rnams bye ba khrag khrag sna tshogs lus bsgyur cing// phyogs b+hacu'i rgyal ba thams cad mngon par mchod pa'i phyir// rnam 'phrul ngam pa bzang po
kun tu ston byed pa// de dgamagon po rnams kyi spyod yul ba la zhugs// gang rnams sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rlung bslabs shang// gang rnams chos kyamadzong rtogs yadi la ngoms
gam dad gang dgamagon po khyu mchog rnams la dga' soms// de dag chos kyi spyan yan spyod pamar la spyod/ g.ye shes 'phar bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi go gnas
mkhas pa// de dag sangs rgyas 'byung gnas ting 'dzin thog pa yi// ri rgyal lta bu de dag dad pa'i 'byung gnas rten/ bal shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba'i yon tan 'byung gnas so// gnas ba
med pa dam pa shin tu yangs pa dang// thams cad mkhyen la man gyur myang n med pa dang// sems can skyob cing nyon mongs rog pa mad zhugs pa// byams pa'i bsam pas 'gro kun kyang
