lagengs// de dag snyade rje'i blo yang shin tu yangs pa yani// bdag la car soms de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la// gzhan du nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid med pa'i jug nyams par
gyur pa'i sogs can rnams mthong phyir zhange rtsom/ byang chub sogs la mkhas pa dag ga tshod dga'// bskal pa bye ba'i mthas kyang brjod par zhus te// ci phyir zhen de las sangs rgyas thams
cad byung// dbang bdes rim gror byas dang rang rgyal kun kyang byung// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams grangs bcur nu bgrangs gyur pa' ]/sems can thams cad bskal pa gcig tu bder bkod/
cing/ bslab bcu dang dge bcu bsam gtan 'thob pa dang// tshangs pa dag dang rnam grol zhiba'i gnas bkod cing// de dgabaskal pa bye bar bde bar rab bkod do// dgra bcom nyon mongs
bzhi/ zha la rab tudagod byas kyang// bya chub sems dpa' rig pa'i tshogs kyi chir ma rung/ byang chub sems dpa' zhugs ma thag tu tshogs chen sogs/ ]/nyon mongs med cing shin tu thu ma rtogs
pa la nga rgyal sags can bye ba khrag khrig bkod gyur kyang// bsod namasabasags pa des n byang chub sems ltag lag dgrangs dang chadang bgrang ba'i rnam par shes ma 'gro// zhing ga rdul
nitshad kyis shes pa rung yang srid// skad cig sems kyis zhange mang yongs su 'das byas shing// de ltar bskal pa brjod byas zad par 'gro byas na// zhang mtha' thug gang sid byang chub semA
mchog yin/ de mtha' rnams kun tu bskal pa mang po'i mtha' mdad// sngon gya mthar gyur bskal pa nga bzhi'i ma 'ongs dang// da ltar byuba' bskal bzang dang thug med par// bskal pa
de dag zad sred khyad chub samasam yani// ci phyir zhe na 'ad ltar phyogs rnams kun bakang zhing// rtog dang rnam rtog yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyi'i// skad cig gcag gas dus gsum rtogs
par byadon du/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dod cing sems mchog razhe chen spyo/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams stong mang kun tu mtha' yas pagi/ 'gro ba rnams kyi mis pa bsam pa ci 'dra dang
sbyor ba gang dang sams dang spyod pa de bzhin te/ mthar thug rung srid mkha' 'dra'i byang chub sogs mtha' man// de ni 'od ltar phyogs bcu byams dang snyade rje dang// bsam pa chen pos 'gro ba
]thams cad rgyas byas shing// thar pa'i don du sangs rgyas yon tan kun sbyar phyir// shin sems kyi stobs tshad med rab tu skyes/ mos dang bsam pa yar bzhan yang
dag sbyor ba dang// 'gro ba' debang po sbyor ba sems dang sdod pa'i rnyems// skad cig gcig gis ja bzhi'i rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// thams cad gakhyen pa'i ye shes lta bu'i sems skyes
so/ 'gro ba'i las dang nyosangasasnyatshogs 'byas klasapa// gang gas khams gsum 'ad reg tun sbyor 'gyur ba// de dag mtha'an phyogs bcur red par chung srid kyi// byang chub sems
shar kyi mchog la kun tu matha'amed do// ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar nyon mongs las bral ba'i// sems n de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i don du skya// nyon mongs klol byed de bzhazhe las kyi rgyud gyur
gcod/ dus gsum mun pa sol cing ma zad sArirjes byung// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas ma lus thams cad dang// sems can mang po thams cad sems gcig bskyod pa las
spos daram tog 'phreng ba byug pa ma pa dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bza' btung na bzas mchod par byed// gzhan yang gdan gyi rnam pa 'chags dam pa dang// pho brang mang po sna tshogs
! tsan dana mchog bsangs pa// nor bu rani chezha rnam par snang bas brgyan pa dang// yade bzha nyer bu yang 'ong brgyan pasumachod dus te/ de ltar bde gshegs sems can mngon par mchod byed
pas bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med pa zang byas kyang// byang chub sems dpa' sed bsags mtha' phyi'i bde ba nyid// gang bsgrubs byang chub sems la mnyam par nyer ma 'gro// sdig da
dpar brjod byas pa 'di dag thams cad kyang// yang dag skyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi cher ma rung// de yang 'di ltar dus gsum bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i mchog/ thams cad byang chub semU
mchog de las byung ba la// byang chub sogs chags pa med pa'i mthar phyanye ta// thams cad tshad la gnas kyang de la tshad yod man// thams cad mkhyen ba'i ye shes gzhol zhing tshad de da
stobs sems can rang bzhi d bzhi zhi byang chub mthar lang phyin// byang chub snyams 'dazhem mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste// chos rnams kun la khyab pachos dbyangs rnga bzhazhe'o// tshad med de bsha
nyid kun de yi spyod yul gyur// des kun tu khyab pa sogs can gatso bzhazhino// den bebam klas chos rnams kun la rjes su zhugs/ dngosan zhing rnams ma lus 'phyam gyis kun tu khyab/ ngesan shes pa
'byamaklus thams cad rtogasabar chud// de sangs rgyas 'khyam klas kun dang 'gal yod thob// rtag tu bsod namasablonamad pa dag dang ldan// de bzhin rtag tu tshul khrims rnam dag gnas ldan// dag tu

kun gtong rtag par rab tudag ba ste//ldog ba med pa'i brtson 'grus mchog dang rab tu ldan// bsam gtan mdzod la rtag par bsam gtan 'jug pa byed/ shes pa shin tu yangs pa dang yang rtag tu ldan// rgyal sras
rnams kyis rabod pa gang yod pa// de dag don du ye shes kun tu bzang po byung// 'gro ba kun n skyes bu'i seng ge gang bzhugs pa// de dag gsan byang chub sems rab nyid gyis babs

ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyarem pas rab tu brgyan// da bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul rdzu 'phrul rnam pas brgyan// 'jig rten kun ngang 'grob rnams kyang tshe tshad// nam mkha' tshed kyang phyogs bcu dag

tu jatsem pa// da dug pas kyang byang chub sogs bad tshang ma de// de las skyes bu'i sang ga kun kyang skyes shing byung// byang chub sems 'di stobs bcu rnams kyi rtsa ba ste// brtan pa bzha'i ya gnas
sgyur yin so sor shes pa'i rtsa// rgyal ba'i chos rnams bco brgyad yang dag 'bazhi pa sta/ skyes bu'i gtso bos mkhyen par bya ba'i chos kun 'bya'i// gzugs kyin mtshan rab rnams kyis
bsags pa dang// chos sku mnyam nyid rtog pa ma mnga' brnyes pa dang// 'gro bsaachod pa'i ya shes chags med gang byung ba// kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems 'di yin//
rang rgyal the ga pa 'byung zhing nyan thos theg pa'i ng 'byung// bsam gtan ting 'a yi bde ba gzugs kyi khams rnams dang// gzugs med khamasa rnams tang nge 'dzazhi gya bde ba dag/ kun
tshe gya rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems mchog 'dayasego/ ma dang de bzhin lha ya dbang po'i bde ba dang/ lam rgyud sna tshogs kun kyang 'di la bzhi tusrungs// brtson 'grus stobs dang
dbang po'i bde ba gang yod pa/ kun gyi rtsa ba dang bo byang chub sems 'ad pa'i// ca phyir zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems bskyed cing// pha rol phyin drug brtson par sbyod pa rab tu spyad//
sems can rnamA la 'ang spyod pa yang dag rab tu ston// des na khams gsum 'gro ba'i bde ba kun kyang 'byung// sangs rgyas chagasamed thugs chud don dam mkhyenapo'i rnyems// chos
kyi rim pa mchoga rnams yang dag kun ston cing// rgya chen nyon mongs las las sems can ragrol mdzad de// mya ngan 'das paNa rnam pa mchog la dgong mdzad pa// ye shes 'od zer 'od
yangs nyi ma lta bu ste// 'gro bar spyod pa dkar pos yongs rgyas zla ba bzhin// yon tan shin tu bsags pa tshang med chu zla lta bu ste// dramang chags pa mi mnga' tshad med mkha' dbyings
'dra/ gang zhagi yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems yangs pa// nyan tu che zhing bde skyid tshad med snyazhi byed cing// phyi mtha' mu'athug sbyod par mos pas su brtson pa// de dag
sems can 'dul ba'i don phyir rtag tu brtson// 'jig rtan 'byam klas thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// smon lam bye ba khrag khrige bsam gyis ma khyab dang// stong pa mtshan ma med pa/
smonamadam gnas pa' ]/smon lamakhyepa brgyas na sems ngo dag par 'gyur// chos kyang bzhazhinam mkha' lta bu sus rtogs shing// zhi dang rab zhi nyer zhwa'i thams cad mnyam gzhog pa/
[©/ ]de dag chos grangs khrag khrag bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i// grangs su 'gro la ston kyang de na gnas pa med// phyogs bcu kun gyi 'o jage rten gtso bo ji snyed 8/de dag kun/
gyis byang chub sems mchog 'di bsngags te/ yon tan brgya phrag bsam gyis ma khyab pas kyang brgyan// sems can gtso bzhi'i yongs dug pha rol phyin pa yani// bskal pa sems can
snyad du gal te legs brjod kyang// byang chub sems rab de la mthar thug gang yang med// rgyal ba 'byung ba'i 'ogs chen der na gang skyes pa// de yapa na khams gsum grongs kyang gang yang
ra mad dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyase gang zhig rnam bsags pa'/ byang chub sems rab de la smon lam kun gyis gyis// byang chub sems rab ngom pa de na bsod nams gter// des
na rgyal sras chags pamed par rab tu 'thob// 'gro ba'i soms dang spyod pa shes shing mthong rung srid/ dazhang rnams rdul du rlags ta bgrang bar nus kyang srid// bor byung skra yas mnyam
par gzhal 22nus sud kyi// byang chub sems mchog yon tan mthar phyin mnus so// 'di las dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu byung/ 'di las 'jig rten 'gro ba kun gyi
[$ ]bde ba 'byung// 'di las rgyal bas bsngags pa' legs pa thams cad 'byung/ 'dasan sems can gtso la the tshom med par 'gyug 'dis na 'o jig rten kun gyi bsgribs pa zad par
'gyur 'dis na zheng nas yongs su dag pa'i mchog tu 'gyur 'ad las 'a jag rten dam pa shes dang ldan pa 'byung// gang zhage phyogs bcu'i rgyal blta bar 'dod pa dang/
gang zhag byan dang bsod namasamaze mdzod 'dod dang// gang zhagi 'gro ba kun gyi sprugabasngal zloka 'dod pa/// ngesan yon mtha' yas byang chub sems bskyed bya// sha turgyas pa chen po'i
mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa' sod nams kyaphung po'i de yang dag par bsags pa tshigs su bcad pa' le'u zhes bya ba sgyu cha shu
gnyis pa 'od// de nas byang chub sems pa'i brtson 'grus blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sags bskyod pa po tu thob pa soms dang po brgyad pa la gnas pa/ de ltar tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya chen po la yang dag par 'dzag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par shin tu chud pa/ 'jig rten kun tu khrid pa'i byed pa// rnam par bzlog pa/ rdzogs pa'i sadas/
rgyas kyi 'jage rgyun las 'das pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ 'das pa par/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyis bun gyis babs pa/byang chub sems
a ga/ dpa' rnam par dgodapa la shan tu nges pa/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gtugazhol ba de dag gas/ d bzhi zhe gshags pa'i bstan pa la ji ltar brtson par byas pa'i rnam pa gang
klu/ gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa las 'das par 'gyur ba dang// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su dag/
par 'gyur ba dang/ smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gater chen po rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams la snod ji bzhin du sbyin par byed pa/2
ra 'gyur ba dang/ rdzol tu phyin pa'i phyogs yongasum gtong bar 'gyur ba dang/ jaltar m bcas ra'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang 2 chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi gdung
mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dmagos pa thams cad du sbyor ba don med pa ma 'gyur bo dAr/ kyi rgyal ba' sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de la brtson par byusanas/ chos kyi
yul 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar ji ltar brtsam par bu ba de legs par bshad pa mdzod cig/ 'khor 'di dag thams cad na nyes par 'dod do// sems can chen po de dag gi khertson pa'i
! rnam pa ji lta bu s/ ma rag pa'i mun nag thams cad bsal te/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma' 'khor thams cad las shani tu rgyal bar byas nas/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyisan te
wa/ sams kyangum kun s nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad kun s bsal nas/ dag kha'artse ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad shin tu bsgrubs te/ ma khom pa dang/ na song dang/ na 'gra
lam thams cad rnam par bzlog nas/ mngashes kya dekyil 'khor chen po rnam par byang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzani par
mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ ma 'a ges pa longs su dag pa rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par dag pa dang/ mtshan dang/ deb kyang
byad bzang po dang/ sku dang/ gsud dang/ thugs kyi rkyen mngon par bsgrub pa longs su rgyus nga na byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs dad/ ma 'jigs pa dang/
sangs rgyus kyi chos ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song sta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i lo shos kyi yul rtogs par 'gyur ba dang/ de ltar mngon par byang chub nas kyang/ bsam pa'i
tshul bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su grub par gyur ba dgatu/ jaltar yongs su smazhi par bya ba'i sems can dag la/ dus dang dbang po'i rgyung ji lta babazhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi
mdzad pa mtha' yas pa 'byon par 'gyur bde legs pa shod cig 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni nyan par 'dod do// jaltar yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems
dpa' yon tan 'di ded/ gzhan dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi yul rnams
yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ myur du de bzhin gshag pa'i manyam pa nyid 'thob pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bskal pa
brgya stong grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di yang yang dag par srung zhing/ byang chub sems dapa' spyod pa la gnas shang ston pa dang 'chad pa'i tsho/ bdud dam bdud
kya 'os su gtogs pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang skyab gad pa 'dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang/
de yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis ram gror bya ba dang/ gzhung de bzhin du klu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang/ dra ba'i debang po dang/ lha ma yin gyi
gyi dbang po dar/ nam mkha' lding ga bang po dang/ mi 'am ca'i dbang po dang/ lto 'phya chen po' dbang po dang/ ma'idabang po dang/ tshangs pa'i debang pos mi grol bya ba rab tu 'thob
pa dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang pos 'chi gror bya ba rab tu 'thob pa dang/ de ltar rim gror byas nas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag khyab// 'jig rten thams cad kyis
mngon pa mchod pa// 'jagen thams cad kyis dbang skur ba/ de bzhazhe gshegs pa thams cad kyis shan tungagongs pa/ byang chub sems rong 'a tshogs kyis shin tu bsrungs//
nga ga reg pa'i rtsa ba dang smon lam rab tu thob pa// chos dkar po na po yang dag par sprul ba'a rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyi chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'byed par 'gyur ba dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'azhi ba rgya chen po rang chu 'byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dapa' romi rgyas spyod pa yongs su bsgrub pa shin tu ston/
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas dag yang dag par bstan pa mdzod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyas ngon 'di nyid ngonan tabarjod pa'i phyi'i/ byang chub
sems dpa' chos kya blo gros la tshogs su bcad de gas pa/ spyod la 'jug pa mtha' yas yangs pa dag/ rang byung ye shes sgrub pa dge ba'i rnams// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
dba' yon tan can// grags pa chen po rnams la legs pa na med// byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams sems thob cing/ bsod nams ldan pa'i ye shes thob pa rnams//
skyon med zhugs pa 'ge rtan rnam bzlog cing// yang dag sangs rgyas chos mnyam nyid thob rnams// de dag gsan bed gshegs bstan pa la// brtson 'grus brtan pas ji ltar brtson
ka da pa rubya gang gas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes bya zhang// mar dag sangs rgyas su yang gzhan kya dang// spyod pa dag dang smon lamalongs dag dang// ye shes
zla gtararman rdab tu 'thob 'gyur zhing// tho gnas de dag 'gro kun ma gnas pas// yongs su blangs pa rtag tu gtong byed dang// gang yang pha rol phyin pa mchog gi lam gang dag ma gtong
rab tu spyod pa dang// sems can dzaltar sgrol byed dam bcas shing// yang dag sangs rgyas bsam pamanyam 'dzin ngang// mag gdem gas pa brtan pa thams cad kyi// 'byung ba smon/
@# can la stobs 'gyur zhing// skyes bu khyuachog de dag brtson 'gyur ba'i// rnam dag lam de khyu mchog khyod kyis snyon// ja ltar de dag mun pa kun bsal cing// 'khrug pa'i 'khor
rnams thams cad phan byas nas// drim bral ba'adege ldan makhasapa rnams// skyes bu khyu mchog la shes ldan 'gyur dang/ ma khom ngan song ma rnams yongs sbyangs shing// ya
shes chen po'i rikyil 'khor mchog spong dang// yon tan bzang po thamasacad ldan gyur cing// rgyal ba'i ye shes stobs kyang 'thob 'gyur dang// skyes bu khyugachog ye shes zhugs nasakya[Ky]
tshe sems can bsam pa japezhan ston byed cing// mtha' yas yangs pa'i zhing rnams bsam yas su// ston pa chen po'i las kyang byed pa dang// nas de dag spyod pa mchog thob nas//
ma yi khyu mchog mdzod rnams ston byed de// thal rgyas mtshon gzhan rgyas ma 'tham par// rgyal ba'i chos nyid rtag tu 'dzin byed ston/ de sang ge bzhin du ji ltar 'jigs pa med// ja ltar
zla bzhin dag pa'i mdog tu spyod// tshul pad+mobazhin du chags yod pa// de dag rgyal ba' yin na ji ltar sbyong// de skad ces sAs pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' chos
kyi blo gros kyis 1 byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo rgyas la 'di skad ces sAsaso// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyed na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skya bo mangs la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten
lasnying brtse bar d 1 lha dang ma rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ kye rgyalaba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs shang/ rnam pa
dag pa brtsams te 'dra zhing/ de ltar rgyalaba' sras khyong de bzhin gshags padri'i/ chos mang po la rab tu gnas pa/ ban 'grusanapos gzhi chu bsags pa// brtson 'grus
ldog pa med pas shani tu byung ba 'dra bar byed pan/kyi rgyal ba'i sras legasaso legs so// kye rgyal ba' sras de'i phyi'i shan tu legs par nyon la yad la zung zhage par 1 sangs rgyas
kyi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyisabarlabs kyis phyogs tsam bstan par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa thob pa rnams
kyisathog mar sems bskyod pa de ma nyams par yongs su bsrung ba dang/ rami gror bu ba'aphyir bag yod par bya'o dkya rgyal ba'i sras de la rnam pa bcusan/ byang
[>chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ste bcu gang zhen/ tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu bsrungs pa dang/ byang chub kya/mas ma nyams shing kun tu sbyangs ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i bsam pa g.yo dang sgyu med par blta ba dang/ dgo ba'i rtsa ba sbyob phyir mi ldog pa dang/ rang ga sogs bskyod pa shin tu rtogs pa dang/ phyogs khyim pa dang/ so so'i skyo bo dang
ma 'dres pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba las 'jig rten gyi 'du shes dang/ 'dod pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lam nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thegapa sbyangs pa rab
u0fc4 tu thob pa dang ]dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam panan tan rgyun chad pa yodapa dang/ bdag gi rgyud kyi stobs kyi shugasashan tubatags pa dag sta/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa bcu po 'di reg nga ldan
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' n bag yod pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa// rnam pa bcusan yongs su dag par 'gyur
ti bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' jaltar sas pa de ltar byed pa yin/ shes bzhan gyi rngon pa can yani/ khongs pa med tsang g.yeng
bamur de bsam gtan zab mo la patu gnas pa yazhi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo btsal ba la nan tan byed 'di rgyun ma gcod pa lan/ lhag mthong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shaji/
ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du rtog par zhugs pa yazhe/ bsam gtan gyi rjes su song ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba zab mo'i rjes su song ba yin/
sa dganyan zhang mtho dman dad bralab yan/ sbyor ba bzang sha dang bam lasems nyams pa med pa yone/ mams can kun gyan na chung dus thams cad mkhyen pa [”]da du sams gcig
bskyadang la'ang ston pa'ibasam pa thob pa yan/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dad/ chos sku pa rnams la rim gro dang
bkur sti'i ngang tshul can du gnas pa yin te/ kyargyalaba'i sras rnam pa bcu po de dag gas byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa la gnas pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
de la byang chub sems dpa' bakagong pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ na pa dbar gzhag pa/ mos pa tsheg/ rnal 'byor rgyunam bcad pa/ chos thams cad la ma gnas pa/ chos thams
cad la brtson pa/ togongs pamed pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/ sems yangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa mtha' dang dbus yod pa'i rjes su song ba rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par 'gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas chos bcus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams manyes
par bya'o// bcu gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thams cad la phyir ma ldog pa dang/ lus dang srog la ma lta ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang/ 'tsho ba'i rgyan la don du
gnya' ba 'dapa dang 2 chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pasazham mkha' dang mnyam pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs la yang dag par gzhol ba'i lhag mthong la mkhasapa dang/ mi gnas pa'i chos rnam
par bsgom pa'i phyag rgya dang/ rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam chen po dang/ longs su sbyos pa'i bzod pa shes pa'i snang ba dang/ rang gi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang/
ma bsags pa shin tu brtags pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgo gzhi rkubya ba sta/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya'o/ kya rgyal ba'i sras de
labyang chub sems dpa' chos bcu la gnas pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba yin ta/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ bag yod pa la gnas par ng/ ma skya
ba'i bzod pa la gnas pa'i ng/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas pa dang/ spyod pa yongs su rdzogasapar bya ba la gnas pa dang/ smon lam
mngon par bsgrub pa gnas ba dang/ thabs mkhas pa la gnas pa dang/ brtasha pa'i stobs kyi shugs la gnas pa dang/ chos thams cad nyamamakha' renga bzhi zhe lta bu la rab tu gnas pa dang 1/
len pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyisan di bzhan gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro/ kakyi rgyal ba' sras de la chos bcu
dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams na/ sa rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yin te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa dang/
ma'ol tu'un pa rnam par lta ba tshad med pa'i lam gzhan gyi deng ga 'jog pa'i yongashes sbyang ba dang/ dag ba'abashes gnyen dang 'grogasal rgyun ma chad pa dang/ brtson 'grus zhag pa med pa dang/
d bzhi n gshegs pa' byon gyi rlabs kyis legs par brlabs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bsaa skyo ba dang/ thog pa'i rgyasha bshams pa dang/ ye shes kyi bsam pa rab tuno ba dang/

sa dang sa ma yin pa'i chos kyi spo la m gnas pa dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang/ dge ba' rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur ba dag
sta kyi rgyal ba'i sras chos bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa nas sar rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yazhin/ dkyargyal ba' sras byang chub sems dpa' de d gzhu thog mnas sa
rnam par dgod pa thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par sbyod pa yazhe/ chos kyi sgo gang gis gang khong dud par 'gyur ba dang/ ma shes kyi sgo gang gis thob par 'gyul ba dar/ bsgrub

ba gang yin pa dang/ rgyu 'thun pa gang zhan pa dang 2 sbyod yul gang yin pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul ba gang yan pa dang/ yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa dang/ chos kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba'i khyed pa gang
man pa dang/ jaltar thob par bya ba thams cad kyang rnam bar spyod do// de dag la shin tu rnam par sbyang pas chos thams cad la mi gnas shang/ sems kyang gzhan gyis chos thams cad khong du chud
pas byang chub sems dpa' sa yang dag par 'da' 'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'du ltar bdag cag gis zhes kyang myur du 'da' ba' bya'o snyam du ma soms te/
de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag 'ad snyam du sems ta/ bdag cag sanasas la rnam par gnas pas ji lta ji ltar lang dag par gnas pa de lta de ltar ba sod nyams kyi tshogs ches che ba skye bar
'gyu' to/ ji lta ji ltar bsonams kyi tshogs chen po skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song zhang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tsha med pas nye bar gnas pa
'gyu'are snyam ste/ de dag sbyor ba rgyun ma chad cing skyo bamed pa' yade dang ldan pa dang/ tshogs kyi rgyashachen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa las yang dag par 'da' 'o/ kye rgyal
ca ]ba'asras de labyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa gcus sprod pa'i dkyil 'khor longs su sbyang bar bya ste/ bcu gang 'an/ yokhyad yongs su gzung ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad tsham
par byed pa dang/ tshul khrims yadag par blangs pa khan ma thob yod pa dang/ bzod pa dang des pa ma bzad pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa phu ma ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa
dang/ dran pa'i stobs kyashugs dngas pa med pa dang/ gcig las rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa dang/ gnasamad pa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' thams cad la sems
ra'i rgyal po lta bu dang/ mas can thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'i mu stags su gyur pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu rgyu bsta/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
rnam pa bcu po de dag gas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa 'dekyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// de dag babyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa rnam pa bcus1 tu
dag par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhen/ sems can rgyagetso'i 'jagi rten gyi khams gzhan bzhugs pas yang dag pa'i dgongs pa dang/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grogs kyis jag cha'i
rtsa ba bskyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyakhyen gyi rlabs yabadag par gzung ba la mkhas pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang dag par rten pa dang/ mos pa dang/ brtso 'grus dang/
@#// bag yod pa la rab tu gnas pa dang/ chos tha dad pa thams cad la tham red par rtogs ba dang/ snyang rdzo' byin gyis brlabs shin tu tshab dang/ chos thams cad yang dag pa
jalta ba bzhin ngu rnam bar lta ba' shes rab pha rol tu phyi'i ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa rnamapar sbyod pa'i sbyor ba dang/ sbyor ba thams cad la de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs
kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i srasa rnam pa bcu bo de dag gas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i srasade la/
byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'ad lta sta/ skyo ba med par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam dang/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pas 'jag rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba' smon lam dad/ lus dang srog gso bsngo zhing dam pa' chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam rang/ ye shes
kyisgo rnam par sbyang pa khong du chud pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa'i smon lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gnyis su med las tshul gcig gi rgyud du 'gro ba'i smon lam
ts+tsha dang de bzhin gshegs pa' sgo la 'dzug pas chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i smon lam dang/ mos pa rnam par sbyangs pas bltan don yod pa'i smon lam dang/ phyi ma'agaza' byin
gyis brlabs pas bskal bar gnas pa'i smon lam dang/ byang chub sems dba' kun tu bzang po'i thig pa'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam par sbyangs pa'i smon lam dag stu/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams n di ltar smon lam rnam par sbyong do// de ga rnam pa bcus smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byang de/ bcu gang zhezha/ yongs su skyo
ba med pa dang/ rgyan chen po mngon pa'i basgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa rnams rjes su 'jug pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan n bzhug
pa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thos nas/ rang gi smon lam du mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ bsam pa phyama'i mtha'i mur thug pa ra/ soms can gyi khams thams
cad yongs su snyan par bya bar gtugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pa dang/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas ma 'jigs pa ra/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis rje'i
snyam pa dang/ bde ba thams cad la la ma brngam pa dang/ bsam pa mnyam pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bsrung ba dag sta/ de dag smon lam chen po de ltar yongs su sbyong zhing/
yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter zad m shes pa yang pa tu'athob bo// gzungs 'khrul pa med pa'i gter zad m shes pa'i ng rab tu 'thob po/
dasmon lam zad ma shes pas chos thams cad shAn tu rtogs pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu 'thob po// snyade rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i gter zad tshashas
ba'ang rab tu 'thob po// tang nge 'dzin gyi rgyud kyi gtor thad ma shes pa'i ng rab tu 'thob po// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par bya ba'abisonams kyagater bad ma shes pa'i ng rab tu 'thob go/
chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtagapa' ye shes kyi gtor zad ma shes pa'i ng rab tu 'thob po// rnam par smin pa la gnas pa mngon par bsgrub pa' gter zang ma shes pa'i ng
sna rab tu 'thob po// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mtha' yas pa'i gatar zad mashis pa'i dzad gtubathob go/ 'jig rten gyi khamasamatha' dang dbus med par gtogs pa la 'jug pa'i
gtan zad m shes pa'i ng rab tu 'thob bo// de ltar gtan rab tu thobacade bsonams dang ye shes kyi tshogs zad ma shes pa dang ldan pa de dag ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag
pas/ sems can rnams la bsam pa dzalta ba bzhazhi du chos[”]gtan rgyas klazhib byed do// de la rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyibasam ma ji lta ba bzhin du ji
ltar 'jug na/ sbyor ba ja lta khur rgyu ba dang/ rgyudang rkyenajalta ba dang/ soms dang sems las byung ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba las/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug
bab/ sa de dag de ltar bsam pa la zhugs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam ba jalta ba bzhin du shesangashade chos yang dag par ston te/ de dag 'dod chags kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog
pa'i phyir/ ma sdug pa yang dgapar ston to// zhe sdang gabasam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba yang dag par ston to// gtamug ga bsam pa rnam par bzlog
pa'i phyi'i/ chos rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yang dag par ston to// chamanyam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ mengashes kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag pa ston to// 'kho
ba'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan pa yang dag par ston to// gnas kyashesam pa rnam bar bzlog pa'i phyir/ gnasaed pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag
bar ston to// zhum pa'i bsamapa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ rgyan chen po' yul yang dgapar ston to// bdag ga nga rgyal gyis bcom pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/
chos kyae1ma pa 1 de yang dag par ston to// g.yo dang sgyus ba mnyam pa' khasam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang zhi ba'i gnas kyi bsam pa
mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par ston to// de dgan do ltar sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhi du chos kyageter yang dag par ston te/ de yang don dbyer mang pa la yang dag par
ston to yi ge'i mtshams sbyor bas sbyar bas yang dag par ston to// shes pa rnam par dbye bas yang dag par ston to// bstan pa snga phyi ma 'dres pas yang dag/
par ston to// chos kyi tshul dang tshul ma yazhi pa'i bye brag dbye mad pas yang dag par ston to// mtshan nyid kya phyag rgya rnam pa ma 'khrugs pas yang dag par ston to// chos rab tu dge
pa rgyun chad pa yod pas yang dag par ston to// mtha' yas pa lhung bas yang dag par ston to// the tsom thams cad shin tu gcad ba'i phyir yang dag par ston to// dbang po'i rgyud la 'jug
pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa' phyag rgya la dgod par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to// yang dag pa'i matha' mtshan nyid med pa rnam par ma 'khrugs pas yang dag par
ston to// chos kyadabyangs la mang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to/ 3chos kyarje yang dag par brdungs pas yang dag par ston to/ gnas thams cad yang dag par sbyang bas yang
dag par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa ma gtong bas yang dag par ston to// tshig dang/ skad dang/ sgra dang/ ngag ga lam mas cad mnyam pa nyid la ma
! gnas pas yang dag par ston to// rnam par m rtog pa'i debunges kyi rjes su 'gro bas yang dag par ston to// deb thams cad rnam par dgod pas rgyud dang ma 'gal bar brtan par bya bas yang dag
par ston to// de bzhin gshags bo thams cad kyi kha shas kyi dkya'i 'khor nang ga lus su sams pa la yang dag par gzhol khasamang dag par ston to// de ltar sems can la chos yang
dag par ston nyang rtag tu rgyunam 'char par chos kyanan tan gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ rang ga na gting tshugs par byed pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ma gtong bas
rgyan chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa mang dag par sgrubs po// de la yang sems can thams cad tsham par bya ba dang/ yo byad kyis longs su sdud pa dang/ sbyor ba mnyam par
yongs su gtong bas/ spyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong ba dang/ gnas pa yod pa dang/ nga rgyal med pas tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do/ gnyis pa thams cad khyad du gsod pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyis ma 'khrugs pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba dang/ mtho
dman med pa dang/ zad ma shes pa' sa ma nyams par 'azhi pas de bzod pa' pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// brtsam pa chen por rtsom pa dang/ brtsam pa thams
cad la zhum pa med pa dang/ sbyor ba phyir ma ldog pa dang/ yare la byed pa phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ mthu mtha' yas pa dang/ stobs la thub pa yod pa dang/ sngon du 'dor
ba ma 'phrogs pa dang/ dad pa' mthu chen po dang/ blang ba dang dor ba yod pa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nyams
bamed pa la yang dag par 'jug las/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa los su dag par byed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi bdu 'a dza yongs su sbyongs dang ma 'bral ba dang//
ram gyis bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzan mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ gnas nad cing blang ba mang ba shin tu rtogs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tusal ba dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi
sgomatha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul ba'i rjes su 'gro ba dang/ i rgyas rnam par spong ba'i tade nga 'a ni gya sgo la rab tu 'jug pa dang//
ting de 'azhi gcag la sgo mtha' yas par rab tu'ajug pa dang/ tade de 'azhi gyi spyod yul thams cad shes pa dang/ de' yul gyi rjes su rab tu zhugs pa dang/ tang ngo 'dzin dang
soms par 'jug pa thams cad ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma 'khrugs pa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyizhi pa yongs su dag par byed do//
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa dang/ gzung ba dang/ blang ba dang/ bsang ba dang/ dge ba' bshes gnyen thams cad la bsnyan baka' bas yongs su ma skyo ba dang/
thos pa thams cad kyis ma ngoms pa dang/ jaltar thos pa la tshul bzhin du rtog pa dang/ de la mngon sum du mnyam par gzhag pa dang/ sgro 'dogs pa'i lta ba thams cad dang bral
ba dang chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya tha ma red pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo nas lhun gyis grub par sgom zhing/ rnam par sgrom/
pa ra stobs la 'jug pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashes la 'jug pa rgyun ma 'chad pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo kun dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
sgor 'jug pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphun pa yongs su dag par byed do// 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i rgyud thams cad ston pa dang/ sems can gyayongs su smin pas yongs sum skyo ba
dang/ bsam pa bzhin du bya ba ston pa dang/ bya ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang/ byas pa'i spyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhan du ston
pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa dang/ sbyor ba thams cad shAn tu brtags pas rgyu ba dang/ rgyan thams cad bstan pa gnas med pa dang/ 'gro ba
thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhang rjes su 'brang ba dang/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i spyod pas thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su phyung ngo// sems can gyi khams
mthar thug par yongs su sAn par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyang ba dang/ de bzhi gshegs pa mthar thug par mchod pa dang/ chos

[D ]chags pa med pa'i mthar thug par rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyadabyangs kyis mthar thug par spyod pa'i dekyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par rab tu
gnas pa dang/sams bskyod pa'i mthar thug pa'i stobs la 'jug pa dang/ 'gro ba dang ldog pa mthar thug par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang zhing ga gegs kyi mthar thug par thams cad mthong
ba dang/ re bzhin gshegs pa'i yu shes kyi mthar thug par rab tu thob par bya bas/ smon lam gyi pa zol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// bsam pa'i stobs kun nas nyon mongs pa
mad pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dbang du gyur cing thug pamed pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i stobs skyo ba med pa dang/ byams pachen po'i stobs snyoms pa'i sbyor ba can dang/ gzungs
gyi stobs don thams cad kyi sbyor ba la bsgribs pa chod pa dang/ spobs pa'i stobs 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang/ pha rol tuphyin pa'i stobs theg pa thams cad kyi rgyan byed pa drang/
! smon lam gyi stobs gcad du ma rung kho dang/ mngon par shes pa'i stobs tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kar gyis bskabs la mos pa dam pa'i stobs rab tu 'dzin pas/
bas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// 'dod chags kyi spyi pa khong du chud pa dang/ zhe sdang ga sbyong pa rjes su rtogs pa dang/ gzhug ga sbyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang//
chamanyam pa'i spyod pa rjes su shes pa par/ slob pa'i sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang/ skad cig gcig gsasems can mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par rtog pa dang/ sems nga
bsam pa mtha' yas pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang/ chos thams cad la yang dag pa jalta ba bzhin du rtogs pa par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi
dbyaris kyi sgo thams cad dang ldan pa khor du chud pas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do// (shan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo bam po nyi shu lnga pa/
de ltar de dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su sbyong zhang pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed la dar/ pha rol gyi phyogs ma gter ba dang/ byang chub sems pa'i
theg pa rgyan chen po'i rkyen dang ldan pa la gnas shang/ sems can gyi khams jaltar dam bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrol le// de dag rtag ba'i las shin tu bsags pa ston pas ngan song
du 'gro ba'i sems can sgrol lo// ba rtsam pa chen po la gzud pas sems can gyi khams ma khom par 'gro ba sgrol// lhag mthong nya bar bstabs pas/ gzugs kyi khams na 'khong
pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol la// phra pa'i yashes nya bar bstabs pas 1 gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgrol le//zha ba'i tshul
nye bar bstabs pas 1na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo// stobs bcu'i rgyan brgyan chen bo dang ldan pa bstan pas/ theg pa chen po la
mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol la// de ltar n sngon las dang po pa' sa la gnas pa'i tshe/ sems can g.yang sa chen po nas ltung ba rnam pa tha dad par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes
te[0f10 ]sgo sna tshogs nas gzud par bya'o zhes sar go' sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin du ye shes thob pa'i rnams sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yi ne'o/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
byang chub sems dpa' ye shesare lta bu la zhugs pan/ rtagatu rgyun ma gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang/ chos kyi rigs dang/ dge 'dun gyi rogis mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin
ta/ de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gyi sams kyi rgyud la gzhog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mgacod pa yan/ chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'grol pas/ chos kyi rigs ma gcod pa/
tsho yan/ bstan pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar mi byed pas/ dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin/ smon lam chen po yang dag par brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs ma gced pa yin/
wa/ rtan tsang 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul yang dag par ston pas/ chos kya2gis ma gcod pa yin/ snyade po theb par byed pa'i chos la brtson pas/ dge 'dun gyi 'gas ma gcod pa ya'i
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas/ sangs rgyus kyi 'gisam gcod pa yani/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzhi pas/ chos kyi rigs ma gcod pa yin
tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa ma skyo bas/ dge 'dun gyi rigs ma gsod pa yan/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
pa pos sa gsam gtsagis ma gnang pa'i lu'e zhugs pas/ rtsam pa zagasacad la kha nag ze ba med pa yin te/ brtsam pa gang brtsam sa nga rung/ dadag thams cad du thog/

mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ma gtong bas/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi rigs ma gcod pa ya'i/ dag de ltar skyabs gsum gyi 'gas ma gcad pa'i phyir zhugs r
ba med par thags cangamkhyen pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob par byed do// de dag de ltar lus kyi las khanam ze ba med pa dang/ ngag ga las/kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ yad kyi las khanam tho ba mang
pa la gnas bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa don yod par rtsom pa yin te/ sems can gyi ljon sbyor ba don yod par rtsom mo// sems can don yod par 'dul bar byed do// chos ngon/
yod par ston to// de'i chos bstan pa thams cad kyang sems can gyi bsamar tshim par bya ba lathogs pamed pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro/
[D] gcig tsam yang log par ma 'gyur te/ sams bskyod pa gzhan thabs dang shes rab kyas yongs su zin pa thams cad kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o// de de ltar
chos dkar po bsags pa don yod pa de lta bu la gnas pas/ rgyan rnam par phye ba bcus sams bskyod pa thams cad yongs su bsdo sku/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus kyi rgyun sems
can 'dulab ji bzhi n du yang dag par ston pa dang/ ngag gi rgyan the tshom thams cad gcod pa dang/ sams kyi rgyan skad cig gcig gas tade nge 'dzani rjes su rtogs par byed pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi rgyan kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ 'od kyi rgyan 'od zer gyi ldebamatha' dang dbus yod pa bkye bas/ 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa dang/ 'khor gyi rekyal
zla 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnamapatshad med ba'i tshogs yongs sumagu bar byed pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i rkyen sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam
bar 'thul ba dang/ bstan pa'i rgyan mkhas pa'i kho thamasacad kyis yongs su gzung ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyan mngon par sangs rgyas pa gcig gis phyogs b.rum lus pa ra
rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ chos byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyan yul dang/ dus dang/ snod ji lta ba bzhin du sdod pa dag ste de dag rgyan de lta bu s sems bskyed pa thams car du mngon par bsgrub pas//
lus dang/ ngag dang/ lad kyi las don yodapa dang 1 yashes chen po don yod pa rab tu 'thob sta/ de dag mthong bas kyang 'di ltar blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
su smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can rnams la don yod pa yin te/ thos pa dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ 'grogs pa dang/ rjes su dran pa dang/ rjes su rab tu byung ba dang//
chos ston pa dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su a'eng ba dang/ dad cing mos pa dang/chung du na mang brjod pa tsam yang 'dra ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
smin pa'i phyir sems can rnams la don du 'gyur ba yani/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/ dpor na rtsi 'o mang mthong na bde ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu goms can rnams kyi lus
la zhen pa 'og/ ltor zos ba'ajug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams
kyi nyon mongs pa'i jug thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ chos dkar po'i stobs kyi shugs kyang skya bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
ubya// chen po chos nyare de lta bu dang ldan zhang chos de dag la gnas te// shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rag pa'i mun pa bsalanas/ bdud kyi dkrugasama' 'i khor thams
cad byams pa dang snyang rje chen po'i stobs kyis pham par byas te/ ye shes dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyangeshugs kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zal gyis mnananas/ doN+Dalta bu'i
tang de 'dzazhe la 'jug pas/ sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang khyonamongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsalanas/ skyo ba med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum
tshogs pa thams cad rab tu bsgrubs te/ sngan chad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par spyad pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis ma khom pa drang/ ngan song dang/ na 'gro'i lam thams
cad rnam par bzlag naas/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis ye shes kyadekyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te/ 'am gyis thabs dang shes rab kyi stobs dang/
shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' se dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ ma 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa mngon par
bsgrubs nas/ chos dkar po thams cad kyi stobs dang shugs kyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyamtshan dang/ yo byad bzang po dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi
rgyan yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrub pa rab tu rgyas par byas te/ ye shes kyis shes par bya ba'i debang dang/ byan gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyir khong du chud par byas nas/ blanamang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
kyayul yang smon lam gyi khyad par jawa bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi
bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sas rgyas kyi zhing bstan te 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor cing/ mtha' yas pa'i sogs can rnam par 'dul
la kyi rgyal pa'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos de lta bu dang ldan pa dgan/ tshul de lta bu s sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur te/ byang
sams dpa'i spyod pa thob nas kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa'i chos de ngas su 'dzin cing chos sAb chen por byed do// de ltar chos sA ba byed pa'i tsha/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag chos kyi mdzod chen po gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir/ so so yang dag pa dag pas chos kyi tshul
rab tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag ga lus kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs te bstan pa
mngon par bsgrub pa rnam pa'i mchogathams cad dang ldan pa dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa'i makhas pa mtha' yas pa dang/ ye shes ma zad pa'i sgor 'jugapa dang/ byangs kyi dkyil 'khor
shin tu rnam par phye ba'abyin gyi rlabs dang/ dbyangs gcig bsgrags pas/ 'khor bya dekyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i byangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang/
ba bag la nyal ba dang/ shes pa 'is ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang/ lus kyi byin gyis brlabs 'khor gyi dkyil khor thams cad kyi nang du phyin kyang thal
gyis mnan pa dar/ lus kyi rgyan sgo thams cad du rnam pa bstan pa dang/ 'khor gyadakyil 'khor thams cad kyisoms dang bsam pa khong du chudapas rab tu rtogs pa dang/ tshagi grol ba'i
byin gyi rlabs kyi bstan pa dang/ chos 'dra ba 'byon gyi rlabs la mkhas pas chos kyi gtam chen po byed de/ stobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa med pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa dbang
zhum pa med pa dang/ chos kyarebangaN+Dal rgyas mnan pa dang/ ye shes kyi dbang gzhan gyis ma thub pa dang/ shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa'i debang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pamed pa dang/
so so yang dag par rig pa'i debang mtshams sbyor ba rgyun chadapa yod par bsam pa shin tu rtogs pa dang/ gzungs kyi dbang chos thams cad rnam par gdon mazo ba la 'jug pa dang/ smon

lam gyi dbang dpa sna tshog sakyis bstan pa'i tshul nye bar bsgrub pa shin tu bstan pa dang/ sAre rjechen po'i debang phyir mi ldog cing rgyun ma chad pa dang/ byams pa chen po'i debang sngon shan du bskyod
pas bsam pa thams cad tshim par byed cad 'od zer gyi dri ba chen po gtor bas sa kyi gtam chen po byed do// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangaga'agron la bzhugs shing chos kyi gas/
gsung pe dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang smon lam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa ma gtogs par soms can gyi ras na byang chub sams dpa' de la phyir bskal ba 'am/ spyi gtsug blta
ba 'ag zil gyis mnon pa 'am/ dri ba'i tshogs yongs su dri bas thub par bya bar sa pa' sems can gang yang med de/ ngan gnas med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te byang chub
sams dpa' dbang de lta bu thob pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khod cig yod la/ 'khor rgya dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsum rgya
bdag po'i gza brjodi thobapa sha stag gas gang ba zhag yanan yang/ dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ma thag tulus bstan pa'i dbang gis zal gyis/
mnan te byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi gsha tshim par byas nas/ ye shes chen po'i dbang gas sems dang bsam pa rnam par shes par byas te/ mi 'jigs
blo pa'i bsam pa chen pos chos ston pa byed cing/ spobs pa chen po'i dbang gas sems can tshim par byed do// kyi rgyal ba'i sras/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar byung chub sems dpa'
den ye shes kya dekyil 'khor tshad med pa dang ldan/ chos rnam par 'byed pa shashig tu rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan/ dran pa'i stobs rang shugasam nyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan//
chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par gdon mi za bar bzung zhang blangs pas rtogs par mkhas pa dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa'i thebs mkhas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan/ chos kyi
mtshan nyid bsgrubs pa med pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang ldan/ mos pa la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis blangs pa dang ldan/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
pa' dekyil 'khor du yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kya byin gyis brlabs la mkhas pa dang ldan/ sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba rnams
dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i bsam pa bzang po rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos sA ba chen po byed cing/ de bzhin gshags pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod kyang rnam
par 'byed do// 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kya ye shes kyi byan gyisabarlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yade kya sAn lam dang/
yashes 'bum klas pas dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'a zhi to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ yang byang chub sems dpa' 'am gyis lang dag pa
'byung pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u yang dag par bstan pa'i phyi'i/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de' tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// bsod nams tshogs bsags
byang chub sems la gnas pa' rnams// rtag tu bag yod blo brtan mthu chen bdog pa dag/ dran dang ldan zhadi byang chub sems rab la gtad bas// phyogs rnams bcu por bde/
gshags rnams na mes par byed// brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran ldan mos pa brtan pa can// 'jig rten kun la rtag tum gnas ma ldog pa// thab pa'i chos zhugs mu
mad pa'i tshul mkhas rnams// phyogs rnams bcu porab de gshegs rnams na mnyes par byed// brtson 'grus brtan pas bde gshagasamanyes par byas zhus kyang// dus
gsum bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes ldan pa rnams// sa rnams gnon byed sbyoda mchog nyams pa med par byed// thub pa'i smon lam rdzogs byed ston pa'i ng de bzhin byed//
u@#// ye shes ga cig la zhugs pa de dag thob khyab// thob nas 'gro ba kun la spyan pa rab tu gtong// bsam pa dag dang khams dar sbyor ba shes byas nas/
dbang po ji bzhanAmakhas pa de ltar chos kyang ston// pha rol phyin la brtson pa mthu chen ldan pa'i rnams// 'gro ba rnams la chos ston bdag ga don ma gtong// pha rol phyin
rdzogs grol ba'i mthu chen ldan pa'i rnams// khyu mchog mthu yas 'khor ba'i mtsho las sems can sgrol// da ltar na mtshan skyo bsad par brtson byed cing// drang srong
rgyal ba chos rags ma gcod zhugs pa yis// dkar po' spyod pa gang yang rung sta sbyad pa' rnams// thams cad don yong rgyal ba rnams kyi sara'agrogo/ de dag
spyod thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yang// rnam smane don yod nyon mongs dris sbyong bar 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mun pa bsalabyas shange// bdud 'khrugs
'khor 'bo pham byas byang chub thob par byed// de ltar brtson zhing ye shes thob pa'i bed gshegs sras// bde gshegs rnams kyachos rab mdzod kyang rab tu ston// de dgachos
rgyu sA'akhyu ba kun kyang shani tu byed bdud rtsi mchog zham spyan rgya cher yang mngon par 'bebs// de dag snying rdzabyams pas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing// bstan pa de rnams
'a ra gyi bsam pa shes byas nas// gang gsesam pa blo gros sams rgyud pa 'dra// de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos na stong phrag du ma ston// glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang
'gros su 'gro ba'i rnams// sang ga'i rtsa ba ltar rtag tu sus kyang ma thub cing// ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu nararab bzhin gzhas pa// snga'i lta 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs
zhi ba' byed// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de skad ces smras pa dang// de la ston pas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do// shin tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo sangs
rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ chos snang ba' li'u zhes bya ba stanyishu gsum mgo ga de nas sangs rgyas kyamathus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad dang/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtan rgyu khams thams cad dang/ gzhung de bzhin du steng ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar thams cad na/
glang bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gla bzhi pare re na de bzhin gshegs pa mang bo bzhugs par snang ngo// byang chub sams dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyisabarlabs
kyis chos ston to// bdag cag kyang da bzhan gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phula mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma bshag ma gtar
bar byang chub kyashang drung yong ma sbyangs par 'ib kyi rtsa nas mtshama' gnas kyi lha'abu rab matshama' kharu pa nor bu sna tshogs gang na ba der gshegs par/
snang ngo ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dani bcom ldan 'das rab mtshama'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbang rab mtshama'i
gnas su gshegs par snang// byin kya rlabs snga ma rnams kyang de bzhin ma 'khrugs par snang ngo// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshams[） ]bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po/
nas khang panor bu sna tshogs legs su mngon par gshegs pa muthong nas/ 'dris pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gangasha rdzu 'phrul gyis
zla bsgrubs pa'i seng ge 'i khri pad+mo'i snying patsan/ lha rdzas kyi ren po che las byas 2/ bog tre brgya stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gsar gya dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas mngon
par khres pa/ ma tog gi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu khyab par byas pa/ 'phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu brgyus la/ spos kyi bla'i brgya stong phrag bcus spos thamA
rgyu cad kun tu 'thul bar bdugs pa// rin po che'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa/ ma tog gi gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung bo/ 'phur ba'i gdugs brgya
stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba/ rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba/ 'od zer brgya stong phrag bcus snang bar byas pa/ rab matshama' lha'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag/
bcus rab tu btud pa/ tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bcusaman par phyag byas pa/ 2 byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ rol mo brdung ba brgya stong
phrag bcu'i sgra phyung ba/ chos kyi glu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcu glu'adabyang sadar ldan pa/ cha tog ga sbyan gya cher brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phapa pa/ 'phreng ba'i sngon gyi chen
brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa/ gos kyi sprin gyi chur brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pas sun nas g.yogs pa// nor bu ni po che'i
spyan brgya stong phrag bcu'achar 2ba tu phab pas kun tu snang bar byas pa dgu ba'artsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag bcus byan gyis brlabs pa
bsod zhams rgya stong phrag bcus bsags shing bsgrubs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shan phyungs pa// smon lam brgya stong phrag sus rnam par dag par byas pa
spyod pa brgya stong phragabcus kun nas bslang ba/ chos brgya stong phragabcusarab tu bstan pa/ rnam par 'phrul ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa/ yon tan brgya stong phrag bcus shan
@#// ga'aphags pa/ brjod pa brgya stong phrag bcu shan tu brjod pa'i ms so// ji ltar klung bzhi pa 'di rab matshoma'i gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab maa'i de khang panor bu
sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bde bzhazhi du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi klong bzhi pa dag ga rebamatshema'i gnas su yar/ khang panor bu sna tshogs su lha'i
rgyal po rab matsho ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rgyan 'ad 'dra ba dang 2 bshams pa'i tshul 'di 'dra ba dag kyang bting bar gyur to// dpas lha'i rgyalapo ba mtshums bcos/
ldan 'das kyi gdan bting nas zhe sa dang me gror bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das gshegs su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/
de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab mtshogs spyan drangs pa bzhin du khang panor bu sbatshogs su gshegs so// jaltar glang bzhi po 'di'i rab mtshama' gnas su lha' rgyal po rabs
tshema' khang pa nyo bu sna tshogs su gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang rab mtshama'i gnas kyakhang panor bu sna tshogs su gshegs par snang ngo// de nas
[y]'a rgyal po rab mtshos lha' debang po'i gnas thams cad du sgra bsgrags/ lha'i rgyal po rab latshams/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab go
rgyal po rab mtshams sngon gyi dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyod pa de rjes su dran nas/ sangs rgyus kyi byin rgyas
brlabs kyis/ de'atshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bkra shas ram pa gang zhig gsog/ sangs rgyas grags pa'i nges par mtshan btags mtshan gsol pa/ gnor
bu'i gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar// des n be da'i yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten sgron ma blo zhes mtshan btags pa// sbya
pa'i lam du gshegs pa ltar// des n 'di yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkangashasadam ba gang zhage gas// bsgrubs yod gzags pa 'dzum pa'i spyan du batshan btags pa/
rgyan gcig ldan par gshegs pa ltar// des na 'di'i yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhigags/ de 'jagi rten sgron ma nya'atsho mdzad ces mtshan btags
ba/ rnam par rgyal bar gshegs pa ltar// des na'i da'i lang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shasadam pa gang zhig gis// bde gshegs yang dag don gzigs pa zhes
gamtshan btags pa// med rtse mo2kashegs pa ltar// des n 'di'i yang bkra shis mchog gyur cage/ bkra shas drag pa gang zhag gsi// de bzhazhe gshegA
bar rang byung mchogaces mtshan btags pa// rAn chen spos su gshegs pa ltar// des na 'di yang bkra shas mchog gyur cig/ bkra shas ran pa gang zhig gis//
'jage nyon sgron ma rubyag ga lha zhes mtshan btags pa// dramad sna tshogs gshegs pa ltar/ des ni 'di'i yang bkrags mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang
zhig gis// 'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stag ces mtshan btags pa// thams cad tshul du gshegs pa ltar// dus 'di yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig/ bkra shis
a pa gang zhag gse// na tan kun mnga'i dpal gyis rgyas par mtshan btags pa// dga' ba'i rgyan du gshegs pa ltar// des na 'di'i yang bkra shes mchog gyur
tsag bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// 'jig rten phan brtson dka ra thub drug por mtshan btags pa// kun nus mdog chu gshegs pa ltar// des na 'dir yang
bkra shas mchog gyurag/ ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab mtshom sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis// sngon gyi rgyal ba' gshegs pa brjod de man par bstod pa de bzhin du/
[2 ]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po rab mtshamu rnams kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs pa brjod 'di/
glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do// denus bcom ldan 'das khar pa nor bu sna tshog su gshegs nas gdan bting ba la stsali mo krung bcas te bzhugs
so dzaltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par bzhani du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du langag na bting ba de dgu la bzhugs par snang ngo// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
ma khag tu khang pa nor bu sna tshogs de 'ang lta sta/ dparan rab mtshoma' lha' 3si thamasacad tsam du rtsabar gyur par snang ste/ 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin 'jag rten gyi khams thams
cad na'ang de bzhin go/ nyan tu rgyas pa thonapo' mdo sangs rgyas pa la po che zhes bya ba las/ ba mtshama'i gnas na rnam par 'phrul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba so nyi'u bzhi 'o//
gdonas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcunas byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags par gyur te/ byang chub sogs pa'i rtser zhang yang 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phyag
stong garjel shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rer yang yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul shan tu phra ba snyad dang lhacig tu phyin to//
byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang mang 'di zhes bya ba ngag ste/ 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ blo gro dang ldan pa dang/ dpal dang ldan pa dang
dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ khrel dang ldan pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/ rig pa dang ldan pa dang/ blo dang ldan pa dang/ ma shes/
dang ldan pa dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mang 'di zhes bya ba dgayas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gnyen dang ldan pa dang de me tog
dang ldan pa ra/ nor dang ldan pa dang/ dpal dang ldan pa dang 2 sgronamangar ldan pa dang/ rdo rje dang ldan pa dang 2 bde ba dang ldan pa dar/ nyim dang ldan pa dang/ dge ba dang
ldan pa dar/ tshangs pa dang ldan dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag ga zhama'adzin tshangs bar spyod pa dag sto/
'ang ltar nyams pa med pa'i spyan ra/ gzhan ma min pa'i spyan dang/ ma g.yo ba'i spyan dang/ mabaskyod pa'i sprin dang chu'i spun dang/ bcaris pa mod pa'i spyashadang/ kun tu spyod pa'i sprul dad
'od kyi spyan dang 2 dam pa'i spyan dang/ mthon mthing ga spyan ngag go/ de nas byang chub soms dpa' de dgabcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalas/ sangs rgyas kyamathus phyogs
cur rgyas par byas te/ gnasa'ongs pa'i phyogs su bstanazhas/ sang ga' khri rin po che' snyade po can dag bshams te skyal mo krung bcasanas 'khod do// ji lta glang bzha pa 'di'i
bamatsho ma'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'ongs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kya gleng bzhi pa kun tu yang rab mtshoma'i gzhas kyi khang pa nor bu sna tshogs
su'ar lhags bar gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' yong yang de skad ces bya ba sha stag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kyang de skad ces bya ba'i zham ridzin tshangs par spyod pa sha stagago/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi bo la gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong brgya lta/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan te//
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gas 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad kya gling bzhi po kun gyi rab gatshoma'i gnasathams cad na yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yodapa
mthong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyamathus phyogs bcur rnam pa las te/ de'atshigs su bcad pa 'di dgasnas
so// sangs rgyas 'od zer 'od snang bas// phyogasa rnams thams cad rnam par snang// des na rab tu gsal byas pas/ mag la rab 'ab gang yang med// mtshom rab kyi
' gnas 'don// gang zag dam pa sangs rgyas bzhugs// de bzhazhi kun na'ang gsal bar snang// den 'jig rten ngo mtshar to// sems can gtso bo bcu yi
rnams/ gshegs par gyur pas mngon par bstod// de dag 'khor yad ca 'dra ba// de bzhin kun na'ang rab tu snang// phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad na// chos kyi dam pa rab
tu ston// de kun mang yang 'di bzhin te// bdag cag rnams kyis kun brjod cing// 'jig rten khams kyi ma dag kyang// de zhes bya ba kun nas 'os/
gang zag dam pa de dgan/ ]tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i ng de na spyod// bdag cag rnams la gang btags pa// kun gyi mong yang dre dang 'phyan// sangs rgyas 'dre rnams phun ldan pa/ bad dag/
sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul ba'o/ ma ya 'jug rten gzhan mang// 'don rgyal ba bzhugs par shes// gzhan gyis de la rgyalapo yi// gnas ni de bzhin bzhugs pa mthong//'gi
nams rnams thams cad na// gang zag dam ba de bzhugs kyang// rgyal ba mt shes rab gnas ni// bzhugs par bdag cag kun kyang sems// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
tsho sangs rgyas ga' bdabasamam khyab// de dag smon lam bskul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten khams su rab tu bkye// sems can gtso bo rnam 'phrul ba// 'dareg re rnams kun
sa mthong// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// 'jig rten zang zad thub pas spangs// phyogs rnams thams cad kun tu rgyu// chags pa med pa nam mkha' bzhi// den/
gcig las shin tu 'o dos// mang po dag tu'ang mi dmags so// mtha' yas 'gas mnga' sangs rgyas rnams// de dag shes par ji ltar rung/ gnas pa med cing lan ra mod//
chos rubyangs rtogs par thugs su chud// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas///
da' tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di ngeg sAs so// 'jig rten mgon po 'phrul chen rnams// rdzul mar gang zag dam pa dag/'dus dang tshogs pa bsam yas pa'i//bskal la/
dag tushan tu dkon// de dag thams cad kun gzigs pa// sems can gtso bo 'od mdzad de// srogs chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// sems can rnams la chos ston to/
'jig rten mun nag 'di dag tu// 'jig rten mgon po byung gyur pa// 'gi rten sgronam de dag na// blta ba'agan tu dka' ba yin// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa'i rab// brtson
'grus bsam gtan bsgom pa dang// shes rab sngan chad spyad pas// 'gro la thams cad snang bar mdzad// sangs rgyas 'dra ba gang yang med// de phyir de dang mnyam pa med
[j, ]/chos rnams yod pa ma yin pas// skyes bu'i dem pa mthong ba med// sangs rgyas shes rab chen po rnams// mtshan gyi tshogs bsam mi khyab// sku la/
tshogs kyis shan tu 'phags// chos rnams kun gyis yang dag byung// 'jiganyen grags chon rig pa'i rnams// dpa' bo chen po de dag snang// de dag mtshan tsam thos pas kyang//
ngan song thams cad sbyangs par 'gyur// bskal pa rnams nabarjod med pan// byang chub don du 'khor byas kyang// 'di yi tshul nam shes na// byang chub don du zhugs pa mnyid// sangs
rgyas bsam gyis ma khyab pa// bskal pa bye ba ru bkur ba dang/ dgang gas tshul 'di bsam pa gnyis// 'dan de las khyad du 'phags// gang gas brjod yas zhing ga rnams//
rane na bkad su thub gsol kyang// 'di yi tshul na ma shes// sangs rgyas byang chub de la rang// da nas byung chub sems dparapal dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi bya
gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcura rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshitshogs su bcad pa 'di deg smras so// nam mkha' dram med pa la// nyama' 'od zeramatha' yas pa// dpyad kyi zla ba tham
la phyogs bcu dag tu rab tu snang// de tshasAg rgyu 'dra ba// de dag bgrang bar mi nusato// mag can rnams kyang de la rmongs// long ba rnams kyi spyod yul mazhi// de bzhazhi
[s/ ]sems can gtso bo yi// yon tan mtha' dang dbus med pa// bskal pa bsam gyis ma khyab par// sus kyang shes pa'i manus so// de dag gang nas drungs pa med// de bzhin
sus kyang byas pa med// den pa las rgyas pa med// rnam par bsgoms nas yong pa ma'i// 'ongs pa med pa'i ngos rnams la// 'gro ba de bzhin ma remags te/ de phyi'i de dag
rgyu yang med// de bzhin 'jig pa'i ng yod pa man// 'jig pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/rang bzhan gang gis shes pa na// gang la skya ba med pa yi// yang dag sangs
rgyas mthong ba 5na// skyes pa gad pa'i chos rnams kyi// rang bzhazhi dngos po ma demags te// de 'dra'i don du shes pasadangamags pa med pa shes pa yin/ de'ang la shes
byed gang yang med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// chos nyid 'dan shes gyur na// yongs su shes pa gang yang med// skye ba dga' brjod pa ste// de phyir zhing rnams
rab tubarjod// zhang garang bzhan shes gyur na// 'khrug pa med pa rab tu shes// gang tshe'ajig rten zhing yan par// tshul bzhazhe dun rtog byed na// de tsho thams cad ngon bstan
pa byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthusa phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/
de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sus so// gnas 'di shAn tu rgya che sta// chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa yin// rtapag tu kun tu song ba ts+tsha/ 5re
du'od zhung gnas kyang med// de la yang dag rtagabyas shing// rim gro yod par dad byed na// sdug bsngal nam yang ma mthong sta/ ]ngan song rnams kyang ma thong ngo//
tshad med de bzhin grangasamed pa'i// 'jagen khams su su 'gro bas// gang rnams 'di ni snang ba yi// sangs rgyas byani rlabs thos par gyur/ drang srong chen po'akhyi'i
gyis brlabs// gang gis thos par gyu2nas kyang// 'di 'dra sangs rgyas chos so zhes// rtog med bla med byang chub bo// gang rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/
chos nyid lan yang ches pa// da kun 'jage rtan sgron ma ste// rkang gnyis ldan pa'i dim par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba 'di/ la la zhag gis thos gyur
cur/ thos nas dad par byed rgyu'an/ dortagam ya dram par 'gyur// bstan pa gang rnams da ltar yang/ sangs rgyas chos la dad byed pa// de dag don gzags
ma 'ojags pa ]/de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin// bskal pa bsam gyis ma khyab par// 'ang 'dra thos pa shin turakog/ spro na lam dbang na ma gtogs par//
blo gros 'ad 'drar 'gyur ba man// sangs rgyas dam chos 'du las kyang// legs par bshad pa zung byas shing// gzhan la ston par su byed pa// de dag bsam gyis mi
khyab 'gyur// de la brtson 'grus bskyodabyas shing// yare la go cha bgo byas te// gang la sangs rgyas brjod pa la// shes pa 'di 'dra a1na par bya// rje
nas byang chub sems dpa' khrel dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'atsho tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang zhig thos nas 'di
'dra ba'i// dga' ba yangs pa skyo ba dang// the tsom rnam par 'chad pan// 'jig rtenanan ngomatshar che// 'di ltar thams cad gzigs pa'i rnams// nyid kyis 'gro la/
bka' stsalan/ sangs rgyas mkhyen gang yang med// de ltar sangs rgyas bsalamakhye// ma shes pa pa rgyu las// ye shes 'jug par ma 'gyur te// mun pa'i ma
dang snang ba gnyis// lhan cig 'byung bar mi 'gyur bstan// dzaltar gzugs dang gzugs med pa// skal bo mnyam pa med par shar// de ltarogs dang ma shes pa//
'grogs par shani tum 'gyur ro// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag/ ji ltar med las brtags pa lta'i// de bzhin gshegs dang mareshes pa// mtshan ra bzhin du dmags pa cher
[n/ ]@#// ji ltar 'jig rten 'jog pa dang// 'du bar 'gyur ba range ba stu// phan tshun 'grogs par ma 'gyur ga/ shes dang ma shes de bzhazhe ne/ja ltar byang chub sems/
dpa' ya// theg ma' soms dang tha ma'i sems// lhan ca ga ma gnas byung ba ltar// shes dang ma shes de bzhin no// ji ltar lus dang rnam
shes/ gzhan dang gzhan las 'byung 'gyur ba// de bzhin shes dang ma shes gnyis// 'grogs par 'gyur ba nam yang med// ji ltar dug la phan pa'i rtso// 'phral dug
dukaman byed// de ltar shes pa ma yin s pa// shin tu sal ba byed par brjod//sangs rgyas ban gang yang med// de dang 'dra ba'ang yod pa ma'i/ de las gzhan du 'gyur ba med//
de bas rgyal ba shin tu dkon/ gdonas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu8nyam par paltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su gcad
de sbas pa/ chos rnams 'dareg 'gal med par// mkhyen nas sangs rgyas thugs su chud// des na'i mkhyen gang yang med// ye shes kyi yang pha rol phyizhi// ji ltar gas par
sa le sAm// ngo bo nyid kyis 'gal ba med// de ltar chos mni de bzhazhi chos// de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig/sams nyan sas can ma yin pa/ 'do pa de kyis rang
bzhanemed// gdags su med las byung ba ltar// chos rnams rang bzhin de bzhazhen// ma 'ongs dusan ji lta bur// 'das pas brjod par bya ba ste// de la mtshan nyid yod pa yin/
de bzhin chos la mtshan nyid yod// 'brel ba'i skya dang 'gog pa dang/ rang bzhin med rang bzhan dag/ rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ltar// sangs rgyas rang bzhan de bzhin no// mya ngan
'das pa gzung med pa// gnyis kyi dusan brjod par byas// de la bye brag gang yang med// de bzhin gzugs la rnam rtog pa'o// jaltar ji zhan bgrod byas shing// bgrang bar
byed ces brjod pa yang// de la tha dang gang yang med// de bzhi'i gzugs kyirang bzhazhe'o// ji ltar gcig nas gcig ga blar/ dmar po' rnyil du bgrang ba yas/ dngos por
grangs med 'gyur ba yang// blo a rnam pacharud bstan// 'jig rten khams rnams la la dgu/ bsam gyis ma khyab tshag gyur kyang// nam mkha' 'jig par 'gyur ba med//
rang byung ye shes de bzhin no// jalter 'jig rten phyogs bcu ya ]/nam mkha' so sor brtags pa lta// de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams mthong ste// sangs rgyas rnams la/
rtog ma mnga'/de nas byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi mekyus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas deta da da'i tshi tshegs su ngacad de sbas pa//
ji ltar dus rnams gsum po las// mas can khams rnams brjod par gyur// sems can de dag thams cad kyang// phung po lnga las ni tubatsho/
nga rnams las kyi phung chen yin// las kyi rtsa ba 'ang sems yun te// sams na sgyu ma bzhin du bshad// sgyu mar gyur pa 'gro 'dra 'o/ gangan 'jig rtan 'dabyung zhing//
yang n ldog par 'gyur rda ya/ 'jig rten 'jig rten mi byed de// gzhan gyi rgyus kyang byas pa min// 'jig rtan 'dan 'byung ba 'byung/ 'jigarten 'di'i yang ldog par 'gyur/
'byung zhes brjod par bya ste/ de na ba jig rten shes pa yin/ gang la 'jug rten snang ba zhes// 'du shes rnam par brtags pa yi// 'jig rten zhes bya gang zhig yani//
sUng ba zhes bya 'dra na zhig yin// dus gsum dag tu rgyu pa la// phung po 'dazhi 'jig rten yin// da dug 'gog pa snang ba zhes// 'gro ba dag tu'ang 'du shes gyur/ dpu
po zhes bu 'di tsa ]/phung po'i rang bzhin ji ltabu/ phung po rnams zha ma 'jig phyir// dngos po yod ces rab tu brjod gaphung po 'di dag rnam brtags ron de ngag rang
pazhan stong pa yazhi// ma 'jag donan stong pa ste/ dngos po yod ces bya ba'o/ 'jig rten ja bzhin sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhazhan/ sangs rgyasos/
dang sangs rgyas rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhizhe med// mnon yang dag ja bzhi zhi pa'i// chos nyid 'di ni rtogs rgyu'ags// kun gabags thams cad mkhyen pa yi//
sangs rgyas kun n rab tusang//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rig pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs b+hacur rnam par bltas nas/ de'adzitshags su/ donas byang tshubasams dpa' 'ag
bcad de smras pa// rang bzhin dngos po med pa la// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// sa ya khams rnams ji bzhin te// sas rgyas rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar che//
de ya rang bzhin 'ad yan la// brjod tsang bsngags pa mtha' yas kyi// 'das pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// sus kyang brjod pa ma yan no//gzhan du mas
las kyisan// gni tu bstan par brjod pa ste// sems can rnams nam gtogs par// las shes bya ba tsam de migs// de bzhin stong pa'i las kyis kyang//
kharjod pa rnams na tshad med pas// sems can kun gyi lus su gyur// de la 'ongs pa gang yar mud// ji ltar kha dog dbyibs kyi rnams// las kyi rgyun bsamam khyab//
snang yang de dag don med// rnam par ragi pa'i dngos nyid 'dra// de bzhin mas can gtso bo ya// sku na bsam gyis ma khyab pa// brjod pa rnams kyang tshad med pa//
skus na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas rnams la sku ma mapa'i// dpa' bo chen po chos sku sku//
tshes kun rtogs par thugs su chud// gang gis rang byung rnams kyi sku/ yang dag rdza bzhi zhe mthong ba na// sangs rgyas chos n rnam kun dang// chos rnams la yang
dungs pa med// 'das par gyur pa'i chos rnams kukun// mya ngan 'das par shes gyur na// de dag shin tu ma gnas nga 'a// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba na
yang dag sangs rgyas sus mthong yong// dran pa nya tu bsgom byas te/ mtshan mad tha dad med pa' rnams// de dgachos kyi rgyal po'i bus/ gdegs bur
tshon rnams su tshogs kun 'du ba/ chub sems dpa' blo dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyan thus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'atshi tshegs su bcad de sus pa/ ja ltar ra mo' lasarnalas la//
kun kyang 'byung ba chen ba'amanyam/ khams mang// khams rnams ma gtogs gzhan na yang// tshon ces bya ba gang yang med/
ma gtogs gzhan du yang// 'a mo gang na ngam dmags so// sams de rtag pa ma yin pa// bsamany+tsas khyab tshad med cing// phan tshu shes pa med pa la/ gzugs
rnams thams cad ston par byed// ji ltar 'tsho mkhan gya rnams// sems na gang gas ra mo8[） ]'bras pa'i ms kyang m shes pa/ de bzhanye chos kyi rang bzhin no/
sams na 'o mo mkhan dang 'dra// nyams phud pa byed pa sta// 'jig rten khams na rjesnyad pa'i ('jig rten 'di dag sogs kyis bus// sems dang 'dra ba sangs
rgyas ni// sangs rgyas ji bzhin 'gro ba'o// soms dang sangs rgyas dag la yang// ngo bo nyang kyis thad pa mad// sams kyi rgyun rnams ci 'dral/ de rag sangs rgyas 'ab
tumkhyen desmyan sangs rgyas rang bzhan gyis// 'grol sgyu tshogs gyur bar snang// lus kyi rnams sems mad de// sams la'ang lus rnams yod pa min//
sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i ng rab tu byed/ de ltar sbyod pa ngomtshani// gang zhig dus gsum thams cad kyi// rgyal ba thams cad shes 'dod na// sangs rgyas thams cad
sams kyi dngos/ chos kyi dbyings su blta bar gyis/ bde nas byang chub sems dpa' yashes dad ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par
@#// bltas te de'i tshatshigs su bcad de sAs pa/ gzung du med la 'dzashices bya// snang ba med pa snang ba sta//mnyan du 'u dpar ma1na par byed// sems
med pa ya soms dang ldan// tshad med pa la tshad ma yas//gang zhag 'dzazhi par ma 'dod pa// den tshod med tshad ma yis// nag yang 'dzan par mi bu rgyu 'o// brjod du med pa
sa byed pa// bdag la sha tu slu ba ste// de ya don yang rdzogs byed// srog chags rnams kyang tsham ma 'gyur// de ba zhazhi mtha' yas brjod ldan pa'i// brjod pa kar zhag
smra 'dod pa// bskal pa grangs med zad byas kyang// rang byung rnams kyis brjod ma zad/ de yang pazhin nor bu rtag par// kha dog kun tu rab tu snang// de la kha dog yod pa gzhi/
sangs rgyas yon tan de bzhin no// ji ltar nam mkha' dri modatsang// gzugs med bstan du med gzhi yang// gzugs rnams thams cad ston par byed/ nam mkha' snang ba
gang yang med// de bzhazhi thams cad gzagesapa' rnams// yon tan dang ldan ston kyang// de na sus kyang mthong bamed// sams la'ang don la gnas so// sangs
rgyas sku na grog mod kyi// de pazhin gshegs pa sgras yin// sgra na ma gtogs gzhan du yang//sangs rgyas shes par ma rung ngo// ja ltar bdag gas mthong tshul du// 'di
shes bya'i gnas ma yin// sangs rgyas byang chub blang du med// de la rnam par rtog pa med// sangs rgyas chos rnams gang dag kyang/ su la'ang sangs rgyas gsung gamed// sa lan
can bsam pa ji bzhin du// de la de 'dra ston pa mdzad// shAn tu rgyas pa chen po' do sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 2ba na tshe ma'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba snya shulnga pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po' mde bam po nyi shu drug pa/ deshas de'i tshe byang chung
sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyis khrus byang chub sus dpa'i ting nge 'dza' shan tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag pa gyu'ato/ de lta'abu
chub sags dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa// byang chub sems pa'i ting nge 'dzan rnam par phye ba'i rnam par 'byed pa de la mnyam par bzhagam thag tu/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu mnan yang 'jug
rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kya zhing stong phrag bcu'arjel sha chu phra ba snyad 'dus pa'i pha rol nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yon tan dang ldan pa zhes byang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong
phrag bcu'i rdul shanitu phra ba snyad kyis zhal bstan pa mthong sto/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsade la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// yon tan dang ldan pa de ltar byed byang ya
k+kha/ @#// sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par phu pa brnyes par 'byed pa la mnyam par bzhag pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la ni de bzhin gshegs pa sangs

rgyus kyi zhang stong phrag bcu'i rdul shazhi tu phra ba skad thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis 'di ltar com ldan 'das de bzhazhi gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang/
sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bsashin tu brtan pas// 'di ltar chos bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shosa rnam par 'phal ba'i bya ba dang/
'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug par bya ba dang/ sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang/ chags pa mod pa la 'jug par bya ba dang/ bsgraces pa med pa'i spyod yul dang/ kun s
rab tu sbyor ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa rab tubasgrub pa dang cho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang/ dbang po thams cad yongs su sa par bya ba dang/ chos bstashapa
thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya ba dad/ 'ad lta'abyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu brtsam pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyi'i byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyis/ 'gos[”] du (spyod
kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyabyan gyi rmogs kya byon gyis brlabs kyis chos 'di bstan pa la spobs par gyis shag/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gas
0 byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa la chags pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// bsgrubs pa med pa nyid da bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// byin gyis ba rlubs pa/de nye bar
bsgrub pa mdzad do// slob dpon med pa nyare da bar bsgrub pa mdzad do/ rmongs pa med pa nyidan bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tho dad pa med pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// khan ma
tho bo med pa nyung nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tshad med pa nyid nyabar bsgrub pa mdzad do// rjel rgyas mazhin pa nyid stabar bslab pa mdzad do// zhum pa med pa red bar bsgrub pa
mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzazhi 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de deg gas phyag g.yas pa brkyang sku/ byang chub sems dpa'/
yon tan dang ldan pa'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gas re ltar reg ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pa ting nge 'the de las
langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' las na bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ don 'di ltar chos kyi dbyangs ka
klas so/ nam mkha' dbyings kyis mthaMr thug go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyi'i zhe na/ deb 'di ltar byang chub mas dpa' de las dpal chen po rnams ni 'ongs pa'i
[©]/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa la yang slob bo/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bathom ldan 'das rnams kyi sbyod pa la'ang slob bo// de ltar
