'dra 'i gang zhig ting 'dzan gcig pu la/ ting nge 'dzanyin khrag khrig brjod du med pa ya/ sa gnas su zhugs gyu'al/ de ba'i zla ba de dag spyod 'di 'i// bzod pa'i stobs kyis thag phyin pa// de dag
chos rnams thams cad zhi labazod pa yani// ma sgul ams dang mnyam pa' rnams// mtha' yas shes can de dag spyod 'di 'o// 'jig rten khams gcig nas kyang// de dag lus ni g.yo zhing
'bo bar mid par// 'gro ba kun 'ang snang ba 'a rnams// mtha' yas lus can de dag stod 'ad yan/gang zhig zhing ga tshul rnams kun// rjes su 'jug pa shin tu phra ba shes kyang//
yongasasu rgyas bya'i blo tshad pa/ ]mtha' yas sogs pa de dag stod 'ad 'o// gnas dang gnas ma shes gyur cing// stobs la 'jug pa dag tu shin tuwug pa rnams// stobs kyi dam pa 'dzan pa
dag/ stobs kyis stobs che de dag spyod 'di 'o// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang// da ltar byung ba'i las rnams shin tu 'khyag klas la// rtag tu shes pa 'jug gyur pa// tshul shes de dag spyod pa//
00 'du lani// 'gro ba'i dus dang dus man pa// ji ltar sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhi shes// sa la khebs par mkhas pa' rnams// shes pa de dag sdud pa 'di yazhin//
chos la spyod pa kun srung zhing/ lus dar ngag yad kya rnams kyang srung byed pa/ bdud kyi lam du ma zhugs pa/ shes pa'i blo can de dag spyod bde 'o// rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyus mkhas pa//
chos rnams lan ji ltar skyabs par 'jug pa rnams// de bzhin 1re dang yul ma ga pa// bde gshegs spyod pa dadag kyang 'ad yin// chags med mdzod la[︽]rtson pa dag/ gzungs kyisgomo'i
dkyil 'khor rab tu shis pa'i rnams// chos kya buras la 'jug pa ya ]tas su zhugs pa de dgang bdo ya'i// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// ji snyang bzhugs pa kun dang gcig
sags yade ldan pa// rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pa'i rnams// chags med 'gas can de dag spyod 'di 'o// bsgrubasamed ye shes tshul shes shing// bsgribasad ye shes phyag rgya dag la zhugs
pa'i rnams// bsgribs mar mag kyang bdogakhyedapa/ mag can de dag spyod pa 'di yazhin// gnyis su med la sbyong pa ya ]/rdzu'aphrul rnam par gzhag pa'i magon po thams cad kun// rnam par 'phrul
ba mkhyen pa rnams// gnyis su med spyod de dag sbyang 'dago/ chos kyi spyani yitha' yas pa' }]char chen rab tu 'bobs shang shang rnams langs bar rgyu// don rnams thams cad rtogs gyur pa//
chos spyan de dag spyod yul 'ad yago/ dbaphyi'i lcog ma 'gyur zhing// rtsa ba shin tu tshugs shing dad pa rnam dag pa// rnam tharashes pa thams cad la// bslabs pa
rnams kyi skyod lan ma1na par bya// 'grob 'dareg rdzasidapa// ma lus thams cad sems bsgyur gtsag tu chud byas te// sems kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i rnams// rang bzhin gang pa de dag bod 'di
tshan zhing rnams bsam gyis ma khyab pa// chos kyi rab nges rnams kun tu gang gas sprul byas shing// mnyan pa med par der spyod pa// dbamed 'gro ldan de dag spyoda'adi// sangs rgyas zhing
rnams mtha' yas te// de dag kun na 'jig rten mgon po gang bzhugs pa// de rnams dang ngon sum du// sangs rgyas zhabs kyi drung na 'khod 'gyur pa// de dag lus ni gcig pur yang// ting nge
'dzan lamanyam par gzhag pa 'batubyon// lus n stong phrag mtha' yas pa// ting nge 'dzin las ldangan shan tu snang// spyod pa zab dang ldan byas nas// spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dag lab spyod pa
dga' ba'i lo de dang ldan pa'i rnams// sems can kun la dga' bar byed pa yin// dbang po tha dad tshul rnags la// blo gros gzhas shang shes pa rab tu thob pa rnams// dbang po rag na mi gnas
gam dul rul ba 'di dag spyod 'ad yeni// tha dad chos kyatshul rnams la// chos rnams thams cad kun la dbang bas shesAgyur pa// kun kyang sangs rgyas mdzad pa la// dmags pa'i tshogs
rab tu snyad pa yin// hachu langs pa'i rdzogs mnga' ba// de dag dbang po rnams dang legs pa'i spyod theban// su yi samangashage dad ma 'gyu11/ nam mkha' lta bu da ngag sbyod 'ad yon/ 15
cu mtha' yas shes ldan zhing// chos rnams kun la kun du mkhag ma lage yod pa// ye shes maNa' yas tshul ldan pa// mtha' yas shas can de dag spyod 'di yazhi/ gzad mnyis pa zad byed t+taM
bsoshams 'dus klas yod pas bsod nams ma zad pa// 'gro ba dag pa'i mthar phyin rnams// 'dra med de dag spyod pa 'ad bzhi'o// tshogs dang ldan zhing 'jig rten dang// de dag chos kyi lam la
rab tu 'jugabyas kyang// de dag sems can 'dushes mod/ dam can bye ba khrag khrig 'bad sku'agrol// nyon mongs med pa rtogs shesangang// spyod pa mngon par shes pa thams cad mthong ba'i
rnams// bdepa'i lam rnams ston byed pa/ mig can de dag tshulana'adalen no// sangs rgyas ye shes spyod pa dang// tshad med yon tan ma ba thob par rgyu'apa' mas// ma 'dzags pa na 'od
gyug shesacan de dag tshulan 'di lo'i go// 'jug pa kun la rab zhugs shang// 'di la 'juganar chos kyi dbang la zhugs rgyu la// sems can zhugs la gnas byas nas/ gsas/
can ma la sogs can 'grol bar byed// phyogs rnams kun tu chos kyang//bsdus shing 'jig rten 'di dag ston byed pa'i// chos 'baspyan pa'i bdag po rnams// nyams ma togs khyed
khan/ @#// de dag spyod 'di lani// skyil mo krung 'dug gcagi gas kyang// zhing yangs brjod du med pa kun tu rgyas byed kyar/ gsu pa lus la gnodakhyedapa// chos skuldan pa de dag spyod
'di yin// don dang yo ga gcig la yang// shan tu bstan pa bye ba khrag khri rjes su 'brang// de dag mtha' na rid ma nus// mnyam med shes ldand dag spyod 'di ya'i// bsgrubs pa med pa
tshul shes pa// sangs rgyas rnam thar tshul shin tu bslabs pa'i rnams// 'jigs pa med par gyur pa dag/ tshad med de dag tshul na 'od yazhin// de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtshodang/ zhadi
gas rgya mtsho mtha' ma dag dang dbus med par// shes pa rgya mtsho ldan pa yi// chos rnams rgya mtshos 'jig rten tsham pa la khyed// gang rnams gshags shing skyar 'gyur dang// byang chub rnam par

'tshar rgya 'gro ba kun dag tu// su zhig gangon par snang gyur/// mtha' dbus med pa 'daregasod 'di lo ni// mya ngan 'da' ba dum mang// mang rnams byab khrag khrig dgan langon par snang//'on kyang smra
ba' seng ge rnams// mya ngan ma 'da' smon lam@rim ldog/ chos rnams lhaganagacig gyur cig sems can kun dar lus kyang gcig tugyur pa'i rnams// rgyalakha rag la rtog med pas// lus gzhi
gyur pa spyod 'ad leni// tshig dang don rnams tha dad pas// 'jagirten khams rnams mtha' dang dbus yod ma mni par// gong bzhazhi gcig la mos pa dag dus gsum shes pa de dag spyod 'di yanye/ k]

sems can dag dang rgyal pa dang// chos kyi tshul rnams kun la zad pa med rnyed pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhi la thos ba dag/ rgyalabs byazhi brlabs de dug sbyod bad yi// chags pa med da' sku 'dra zhing// chags pa med pa'i
mig ga la rol phyin pa'i rnams/ chags med na kha mkhas ba dang// chags med pad can de dag spyodabad yazhi// mngon shes thams car ted pa dang/ dmed shes mngon par shes pa'i rjes su song ba'i rnams//
ye shes kun gyi dpal ldan pa// shes pa bzang can de dag spyod 'di lane/ shan tulanyam gzhag sags ldan yang// ye shes mtha' yas shes kab shin chags rnams// kun tu spyod yul ldan pa dag
thams cad gzigs pa de dag spyod 'di yin// yon tan kun gyamatha'abyashi ba// sems can mangs pagatsa gnas gcig brgyud sgrol ba' rnams// mden yongs su nyams med pa// rtag tubartson pa de dag
spyod bad ni// kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs pa dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad dus gsum gshegs pa mgon po la// lags dang brgyud du de sa pa'i rnams// rgyal sras de dag spyod pa 'daene/
rjes su bstan la brtson byed pa// phas kyi rgol ba'amAmal 'jigs med spyod ba dag/ mtha' yas blo la spyod pa dang// sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su zhugs pa'i rnams// mtha' dbus med pa'i
zhang ga rnams// thams cad kun tu snang pa gcig gis gsal bar byed/ kaThamasacad snang bar byed pa'i rnams// mun pasal ba'i spyod pa'i in/ dgang du rgyal bas mdzad 'os pa//
@#// de ran sogs casha khrag khrag shazhi tu 'dulabyed cing// sangs rgyas sku dang sangs rgyas zhing// sangs rgyas rgyan na khrag khrag snang bar byed/ spyod pa dag ni mi thar pas 'ag
su gnas brtan pa de dag shes pa ji ltar rung// spyod pa thams cad gzhi tu ston// 'gro bar yod pa thams cad mthar thug byed// chos kyi radungs dang mnyam pa yin// bdag gi lus zhi brjod du med pa'
gyur pa las// de dag legs par brjod byas kyang// bskal pa khrag khrig dag gsal zar do// yon tan kun yumatha' yas shing// yon tan mchog rnams thams cad mtha' yas pa'i// yon Sha
kun n brjod yas te// thub pas bskal par gsungs kyang zad ma 'gyur// rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos la// gzhol bar gyur pa'i 'jig rtan gzhan gyi rnams kyis lta// bskal pa brjod pas brjod/
zi dus kyang// byed par ma nus de nasIs[“]degos// shan tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po chazhes bya ba las// yon tan gyi me tog gi lubasagasapa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa
bstan pa'i le'u sku nyi shu drug pa'o/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas// da byang chub mams dpa' de dgal gas pa// kya rgyalaba'i sras dag/
bcu po 'di rigs byed chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter yan ta/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang// da ltar byungar rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar/
[4]'gyu'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dang pa' getar dar/ tshul khrims kyag tor dang/ ngo tsha shes pa'i gter dang/ khrel yod pa'i gtor dang/ thos pa'i gtor dang/ gar ba'agater dang/
dam 'cha' ba'i gter dang/ rtogs pa'i gter dang/ blo gros kyi gter dang/ blo'i gtor to/ kye rgyal ba'i srasarag gabyar chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' gter bcu po de dag
ni 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo// bgasung bar 'gyur ro/ dkya rgyal ba'i sras dug/ de la dad pa'i
gter gang zhen/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la khyang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar dad pa byed do/ chos thamasacad mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed do// chos

thams cad smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dud par byed do// chos thamasacad ma byas pa zhes bya bar dad pa' byed do// chos thams cad ma rtogs pa zhes khyakhar dad par byed do// chos thams cad gnas pa zer/

pa zhes byakhar dad pa 'byed do// chos thams cad tshad med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do// chos thams cad blayod pa zhes bya bar dad pa byed do// chos thams cad 'da' ma rung pa zhes bya ba dad pa byed/
do chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya bar da par byed do// de na chos dang 'thun pa'i ded pa dang ldan pa yan te/ chos thams cad bsam gyis ma khyabab zhes bas zhus par 'gyur 'od
[6 ]u// sangs rgyas thams cad bsam gyis ma khyab po zhes bya bas zhum pa'i m begyur// sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gyis ma khyab ze zhes bya bas zhum par ma 'gyur ro// chos
kyi dbyangs bsam gyis ma khyab bo zhes bya bas zhum partag 'gyur 'o/ kham mkha' dbyings bsam gyis ma khyab 'o zhes bya bas zhum par ma 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab bo/
zhes bya bas zhum par ma 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus bsam gyis ma khyab ro zhes bya bas zhum par ma'i gyur do/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus bsam gyis ma khyab po zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro// da ltar byung
ba'i rjes bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes khyakhos zhum par ma 'gruba'o/bskal pa thams cad la 'jug pa bsam gyis ma khyab bo zhes bya bas zhum par ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deb ded pa na sangs/
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhi n du gcig tu nges par gyur ba man te sangs rgyas yegs kyi mtha' yang zad ma shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyar zad ga shes to/
zla 'jig rten gyi khams der yang mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bran chad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par
'tshang rgya bar 'gyu'aro// yang dag parubyung ngo// yang dag par 'byung ngo// yang dgakhar 'byung bar 'gyu 'o// yongs su mya ngan la 'das so// yongs su mya ngan las 'dag go/ yongs su mya ngan las
[d/]'dzub bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de na 'olub 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 2 'gag pa 'am/ 'pho ba 'am/ 'grol 'am/ takha'abyed ba 'am/ rangeban byed pa 'am/ shes
bar byed pa 'am/ 'byon par byed pa ma yin te/ de na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang dag par gnas pas/ zad pa med cing mtha' yas pa'i dad pa'i gter dang ldan pa yin// kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag/ dad pa 'dazhimaTha' yas pa// kun tu mtha' yas pa/mi zad pa/ phyir ma ldog pa/ myu gu'i rgyun pam yazhe pa/ tha dad pa ma yin pa// ma'adres pa/ rtsa la brtan pa/ 'phags pa der
'thun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rog kyi brgyud du gyur ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yar dag par 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mos pa yang dag par bsgyur pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song pa 1 nges par rtogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'ogs la mkhas bar myur pa la to/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gyur chub
sags dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dad pa'i gter te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos par gyub shakhasngon bar khong du chud de 1 sogs
can thams cad la rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir zha sha byed par 'gyur ro/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dba' rnams kyi tshul khramisakya ge 'a gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
@#/// sus dag 'du la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma' phun sumatshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa lazhi/ mi gnas pa'i

kyi tshul khrims dang ldan pa yazhi/ lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yazhi/ 'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan ba lani/ gzhan la ma gnod ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan ba mAn/ ma 'dres

pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ lta ba'i nyon mongs pa gad pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan ba yazhi/kha namatheb mad pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba' sras rtag/ 'dra la khyung chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde

yi[” ]bar sems so// kye rgyalaba'i sras dag/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhen/ mu stegs can gyi gnas pa dang mi 'dra ba'i tshul khrims gzhi to/ de ni
'di ltar 'ang bzhan gyis dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du go cha bgos shadi spyod pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'du la 'dod pa'i khams
la na gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yani/ gzugs kyi khams la cha gnas apa'i tshul khrims can mAn/ gzugs med pa'i khams la ma gnas pa'i tshul khrims can la// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor ba

dag la khag ga'i bya ba med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras rtag/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims

ra ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa med pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'o de ltar mtshams med pa las man par 'du ma byed do/ tshul khrims lhod pa lagazhol

kha ma bzhi'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lcag par ltang med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yazhe'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'de la byang
chub sems ma'am bcas pa na de cha' bar ma byed/ bcas pa nagacod par ma byed de/ denamu na las 'das pa'i mthar thug sbug cu ji ltar 'thun pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no// gang gis pha rol gyi sdug
bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba dang/ pha rol 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims de lta bu mabaca' ba la dam bcas shang ya gnas te/ de na 'od ltar pha rol gyisoms dad par bya ba'i phyi'i tshul khrims yar
dag par len pa'i byed do// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la ma gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gtseba'i phyi'i tshul khrims
kyi rig sngags dang/ gsar sngags dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba de lta bu mi sgrub kyi/ de nasoms can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so// ji lta'an byung
chub sems dpa' m 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chad par lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang/ 'dres pa'i tshul khrims yang drag

par len par ma byed de/ de na'i da ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len to// ji ltar mkhyang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin

zhen/ yon tan med pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi sogs la lta zhing rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba ma yin no// den 'dra ltar chos kyis ngoms pa dang ldan pa yin te/ khyung pa'i lam tsho' zhare

sbyor ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khragis ngar leg pa'i tshul
khrims nye bar bzung// gang gis pha rol po dma' ba'i tshul can du gyur par bdag la ma bstod gzhan lam sId do// de na 'di ltar g.yeng ba med panya par bzung ste/ tshul khrims yang dag par
blangs shing gnas so// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kha nam tho ba med ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srog gcod pa yongs su sbyangs pa yin taM ma bzhi par
len pa ra/ 'dod pas log par galam pa dar/ brdzun du sba ba dang/ phrama'i tshog dang/ dgabaslab dang/ tshagi 'al ba dang/ chagasasamasarar/ gnod sems dang/ lag pa lta ba yongs
gu sbyangs ba yan ta/ dag ba danu'i las kyi ma yang dag par blangs te gnas so// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lanam the ba chad pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni/de 'di snyam du sems bskya da

gang ji snyam du sams tsanarnags tshul khrims nganang can la ya dem 'cha' zhing spyod pa thams cad nastson ci legag rgyu las byung bsta/ de ltar sangs rgyas gathom ldan 'das rnams kyis shugasasu chudar zhi

tsha lebad[p]nar 'aso/ can rnams tshul khrims log ba la sred kyis/bdag gisatsazhis kyang sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed tshubatuman par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin nyid kyi don duchos ston par 'gyur ba de
bya'o snyam 'o// rgyal ba'asus dag/ 'dun bying chub sems pa'i rnams kyi tshul khrims gtan tags pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dog/ de labyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i gtar

gang zhes/ rgyargyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sogs dpa' sngon gyi mtha' spyod pa lu blta bzung// gang 'di tshibabs kyi 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa rgyas par ya rang 'grogs pa dang/ pha dang 'grogs pa dang/ zhang po dang 'grogs

pa dang/ sang me dang 'grogs pa dang/ spun dang 'grogs pa dang/ bu dang 'grogs pa dang/ bu mo dang 'grogs par gyur kyang/ gcig la gcig 'tshob dang/ gcig la gcig kyalaka byed r dang/ gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa dang/ gcig la
gcig 'khrig pa dang/ gcig la gcige sde ba dang/ gcig la gcig 'jug pa dang/gcage lagacig 'bod pa dang/ gcig la gcig za ba dang/ gcig la gcig dbang ba dang/ gcig la gcig 'khor bar gyur pa de yang 'dod/
chags kyi dbang dang/ zhe sdang gi debang dang/ gzhug gang bang dang/ rgyags pa dbang dang/ nga rgyal gyi dpang dang/ 'chab khab dbang dang/ gnya' phrag ga debang dang/ phrag dog gi debang dang/
'jungs pa'i dbang dang/ g.yo' bang nga/ sbya'ajig pa dang/ mdage ba'i lasa'ada rnams shan tungs pa'i phyir/ sems can dag gcig la gcig 'di lta bu'i rnam pa ldan bdag nyams su myong bar 'gyur
ta thams cad kyang ma shes pa' ribang gsigyur banas/g.yo dang skyabar gyi dbang gsi grub to/ gtsapel gtsagabagam byid/'ame gromad/ gcig la gcig bkurastiram byed/ gcig gcig
phu dud dum byed/ gcig la gcig khatsam pa med pa dang/ gtsageg la gcig gamakhas pa dang/ gcig la gcig gnod pa dang/ gage la gcig gsod pa dang/ gcig la gcag dgrar byed par gyur te/

zhes ngo tsha skyed do// ltar 'das pa'i dus na bdag dang sems can rnams kyi rnam pa ngan pa 'di lta bu'i tshul byung ba de bzhin du daltar byung ba'ajus na yang bdag dang sems can thams cad la rnam pa/
ngan pa de lta bu dag yod do// ltard ltar byung ba'adusan bdag dang sems can rnams lam pa na ba de lta bu d yod pa de bzhi/ ma 'ongasala'adusan lang bdag dang sems can thams cad la rnam pa ngan
pa da lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur to/ de na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyar zug su chud do// de ltar bdagags ngo med cing mi bze
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa/ma byon ba dang/ daltar byung ba rnams kyis thugs su chud pazhan du rnam pa sha ba 'di lta bu la gnas pa rnami rigs/ ma chas/ ngan khidag cag gis ci nas kyang sman/
med pa yang dag par rdzogasala'i byer chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi don du gams can rnams la chos bstan par 'gyur ba de ltar khyago kyi rgyalakha'i sras dag/ 'di ni byed chub
sems dpa' rnams kyang tsha shes pa'i gtan tu gsum pa/ kakyi rgyal bsras dag gdulakhyad chub sags dba' rnams kyi khral yod pa'i gtar gang zhen/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/
'dolaphyang chub sogs dpo'an mtha' chad par tshol bas khrelar 'dzazhi pa yin te/ gzugs btsal ba dang/ sladang/dradang/ ro dang/ reg btsal ba dang/ bu dang bumo'idon dubatsal ba dang//
nor dang/ ban po dang/ branamor/ g.yog mdi du ba song ba patsam ba'aphur/ bdag gis kyang ma tshul mchab ' gcam bya bar 'gyur ro zhes/zhatsholaba'i dbang du chags pa bar mi lin to//
zhe sdang ta bar ma le to// gti mug nye bar mi len to// de bzhin du nga rgyal dang/ 'chab l dang/ phrag dog rang/ 'jungs pa dang/ g.yo rang/ sbyadang/ gnod par bya ba nye bar ma len to//
'dazhi 'id ltar dran pa skyes te/ gang yang rung sta/ sems can rnams rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu byed par 'dzazhi pa thams cad na ma rag pa'i dban gnas / g.yo dang/ sgyu dang/ gnod par byed ba'i
dbang gter rgyas byung ba ste/ de dag gcig la gtsag thags byed/ ma gro byed/ bsti stang du ma byed/ phu dud du mi phyed cing gtsam pa med de/ grogs por ma shes
shang gcige la gcag nyam rab rang/gcag lagacig gsod pa dang/ gcig la gcig dgrar len pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa ngan pa dag lta bar len to// mngon par dga' do/ mngon par zhen to//
tshol lo// kun tu tshol la/ d kun tu btsal nAs mngon bar sman to// 'jal 'do/ kun tu 'jal do/ de ltar yang ma ga nyams pa de dag lam gang dang gang nas mngal gyi dri mas gos te
byung ba de nyid du 'a 'gapa'i chos la brten te/ mi gtsang ba 'byung bas na kun gyis kyang shes so// de bas de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasapa 'byang chub tu smon la/ khrel med
pa'i dbang du gyur nas 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ dal byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku slu ba byed 'dan ma 'gis kyis/dan bdagagasacan s kyang bla na med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bastan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ zheng chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khril lopar
gtar bzhapa'o/ gakyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thosaba'agator gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sags dpa' thos pa dang
ldanub ban te/ 'du yid n bad 'byung ngo// bdeyod na 'di ni 'byung ngo// bdukhyung bas 'di skyo'o//bad 'gags pas 'di 'gag go/ 'direg na 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di regan be jag rten las
'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'daregan 'i dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag lung bstan pa'i chos so// 'ad rig na lung ma bstan pa'i chos so// de la cayod pas gang
'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ ma rag pa yod pas 'du byed rnams 'byung ngo// ci med pas gang med par 'gyur zhen/ rnam par shes pa med pas mde dang gzugs chod par ba gyur ro/ sa skyos pas gang skya
bar 'gyur zhen/ srid pa skyes pas sdug bsngal skya'o// ci'i gags pas gang 'gag par 'gyur zhe na/ srid pa 'gags pas skyab 'gagago/ de la 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang zhen/
gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ tshul khrims phung bo ra/ tade re
'dzazhig phung bo dag/ shesa'ab kyaphung po dang/ rnam par grol ba' phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yi shes mthong ba'i phung po sta/ 'ad gan 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'dus
byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams rang/ gzugs med pan khams dang/sems can kyi khams te 'di dag 'dus byas kyi chos so//
[p]/ 1las ma byas kyis rnam gang zhe na/ nam mkha' dang/mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ so sor brtags te 'grogapa dang/so so' mkhartags par 'gog pa dang/ rtan pa'i
grel bar 'byung ba dang/ chos kyi gis nyid// bdag gi dus ma byas pa'i chos so// lung bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ galags ba'i bden pa bzhi dang/ dge sbyor ga 'phras bu bzhi
dar so so yang dag ba'age pa bzhi ring Da ma 'i jags pa bzhadang/ dran pa 3bar gzhug kha bzhing/ yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang//
po stobs lta rung/ byang chub[”] yan laga'adun dang/ 'phags pa sha lam yan lag brgyad do/ 'dira gzhu lung bstan pa'i chos so// lung ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'jig rten mtha'
yod ba dang/ 'jig rten mtha' yod pa dang/ mtha' yod pa lang ma yin/ mkha'amed pa'i ng ma yazhi pa zhes bya ba 'dage lung dum bstan bgro/ 'jig rten rtag pa dang/ 'jage rtan ma rtag pa dang/
rtag pa yar lan la/ ma rtog pa'i ng lan ba dang/ rtagakha' nga ma lan la/ma rtagala'angs pa'i zhes bya ba 'di zholung du mkhastan pago/ de bzhin gshegs pa sha lon chad yod pa dang/ de bzhazhig

bgaphan chadamed pa dang/ de bzhazhe gshegs pa shabashachad yod kyang yod la med kyang yod pa dang/ de bzhan gshegs pa sha'achad yod pa la ngo ma yin med pa'i ng ma yan zhes khyakhan lung ma bstan pa'o/ ]
bdag dang sems can rnams yod pa dang/ bdag rang sems tsan rnams chedapa dang/ bdag dang sems0na rnams yod pa yang yan la/ med dab yang yin pa dang/ bdag dang sems can rnams yod pa yang ma yin//

mad pa yang ga la'i zhes bya pa 'dan lung ma bstan pago/ sangs rgyas rjesnyad cag yongs su myuran las 'das/nga sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yongasasumya zan las 'das/ nyan thos ji snyid cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/

sas rgyas ji snyed cag mo// 'ang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byon/sha thos jasIdatsagem byon/byang chub sems dpa' dzanyid cig skyo bar gyur/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig zhugs/rang sangs rgyas rjesid cig bzhugs/nyan thes/

ngesnyed cig bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cigakhazhugs/sangs rgyas dag pas susdu/ra sangs rgyas dag las su lnga/nyan thos dag pasasu sda/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pas su sda/ sas rgyas drag pas
su 'phyi rang sangs rgyas dag pas su 'phyi/ nyan thos dgalas su 'phyi/ sems can dag las su 'dza/ chos dag pas su snga/ 'jig rten gang nas 'ongs/ 'jig rten gang du 'gro/ 'jig rten gyi khamA
janyid cage tsheg bar gyur/ 'jag rten gyi khams ji snyed cig gnas pa yin/ brtag rten gyi khams gang nas 'os/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdon gyi
mtha' na ger/ 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'a' gang zhes bya ba ba tsho du dum wastan pago/ de 'di ltar ldan pa skyes te/ sems can gang su yang rung ste kun tu rgyug pa dang/ kun tu 'khor ba thams
cad n chos 'dadegam shes pa'i phyi'i te/ de ltar thos pa dang ma ldan pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams kun tu rgyug go/ kun tu 'khor ro// de bas na de bdag gser zhes kyang bsam pa
thamasacan thos pa'i mdzod bzung ste/ blan med pa mang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba 'dazhi/ kyargyal ba' sus
ga byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi wes pa'i gater te lnga pa'o// kye rgyalaba' sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba' gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras

dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa yan te/yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa la// nang ga gtong ba dang ldan pa yazhi/ phyi rol gyi gtong ba dang ldan pa yani/ phyi nang gi gtor ba dang ldan

pa gzhi/ thams cad gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ 'das pa gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ da ltar byung ba gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ sha du gtong ba dang ldan pa an te//

kyi rgyalaba'i sras dag/ ja ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa yazhe zhe na/ kye rgyalal sras rag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyi bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can ma'i dkye rgyal
ba'i sras rag/ de rtag tu bgo bsha' byas sha/ bdag kyang shas kyis spyod pa yin de// bdag bde bar bya ba dang/ bdag yongs su sbyang ba dang/ bdag mi gror bya ba'i phyir/yo khyad ji snyid du bsags pa

de dag thams cad kyang ngagongasha'abyas shang spyod kyi ]mkhagos par n ma yin no// de dag stod pa'i tsho yang sems 'di snyam du skyod de/ lus 'di la srin bu'a'ogis rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad gnas te/de dag kyang
bdag ga lus 'bade bsan bde bar 'gyur/ bdagag lus 'di sdug bsngal bsam sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes/ da gang sa la spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang myong ba med pa'i sems kyis de dag ma'i rmi
ba dang/ de dag bde bar bya'i phyir gtong ngo// gzhan yang re 'dasum du sems ta/ kun dang po nas zas rang lus bde ba la chags par gyur kyis/ dazhabadag galus la chags pa las/ rnam par 'da'
bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'dazhi gtong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la zas sam/ skom mam/ bza' ba 'am/ bca' ba 'am/
ba ldag pa 'am/ btung ba 'ag 2 gzhape pa 'am 1 myang ba bam/ gos sam/ 'phrar ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ rgyan tam/ ci yang rung ste/ gang spyad n na 'tsho'/ ma sbyang na na
'bar 'gyur ba zhig tapar gnas par gyural/ de'i tshe slong ba zhig 'ongs te/ de la de tsazhes kyang zad par 'gyur ba dang/ lhag ma chod par blangs kyang/de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam

du sems te/ sngon gyi mtha' da ngag tu bdag bkres pas 'bar gyur pa yar dmigs pas ma stsalas te/ su la yang phan par ma gyur to// da 'di ltar rim pas sngan chad myong ba'i chos can dang mnyam pa nyid kyis dus
bya bar gyur la/ sems can de dag kyang bde bar gyur na/ bdag gis bathobal khyab legs pachog go/ bdag gas 'di dag kyang zad kyang bar/'a ba'i mthar thug bar yar
rung sta sems can rnams 'tsholar bya'o zhes gtong ba 'dani bodasu gtor ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i nang ga getong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sams dpa' dar zhing bzang bor gnas pa/
'tsha gzugs mdzes la/ blta na sdug pa/mdog rgyas pa/ rtsazhom pa dang ldan pa/ khrus dang byug pa legs par byas pa/ 'phur ba dang rgyan legs par btags pa/gos gsar ba ma bab pa bgosal
glang bzhi ba 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal por dbang bskur pas bskurab/ rin po che snabadun dang ldan b/ de lta bu 'adring du slong pa dag cig 'ongs te// 'di skad du bdag cagayazhis gze go/rgyas so//
'khogasaso// sdug bsngal gyis mnar to// nad tshabs che// nad g.yog med de 'chi la thug go/ gal te khyod kyi lus las lag pa 'am/ rkang pa 'am// sha 'am/khrag gam/mgo 'am/glud pa/
zla 'amarus pa baa/ rkang chag/ su la tsaregos pa de dag khye'acig ces/ rgyal po thags thogs med par rang ga lus bdagacag la phyin na/ lus 'das bdag cagashad 'di las ldabar 'gyur ro zhes zer na//
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dasem du sems te/ lus 'di lta zhig chos kyis de 'dra bar gyur yang su la yang phan par ma gyurakyis/ da na de lta bu'i chos can gyi lus 'di'i
[nj]sems can 'ad dregababar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes nas/ de lasams bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med pa 'dra gnang ga getong ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sums pa'i phyi rol gyi
gtong ba gang zhen/ 'ad labyang chub sems pa'i gzhung de bzhan du rgya chen bang bskur ba dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sride la gnas pa/ gling bzhi la dbang ba/2na po che bdun dang bde bar yo
byad thams cad dang ldan pa// thog mar mngon par dbang bskul/ de lta bu'i drung du slong ba dag cig lhags te/ 'di skad du bdag cagan ba kren no// dbul lo/ shan tu sdug bsngal lo/nor

dang ma ldan no// khyod nabed ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan na/ 'dzam bu gling bzhi'i 'i khor les sbyar ba'i rgyal sridi bdag cag la byashe to/ phyis 'dra labang a sgyur bar byas na des na bdag cag bde
bar 'gyul ro zhes zeran/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ phun sum tshog sal thams cad na zad pa' mtharu'agyur te/ 'tshan su'i bsam pa pad yongs su mgukhar bya bam/
nus kyis/ bdag gas dan 'i phral du sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su tsham par bya'o zhes nas/ de'i rgyus sems bskyod pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par gtod ba 'ani phyi

dol rgyagatong ba zhes r+ya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i phyo ming ga gtong ba gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i srod la de ltar dbang bskur ba/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
dang ldan pa bsags par bya ba/ rnam par basags pa de lta bu'i drung du slong ba dag cag 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du khyod kyisan 'khoralas sbyar ba'i rgyal po sngan chad kyang myong//
bdag cagan deg bam myong ba yazhin/ byan bu 'khor las sbyar ba' sade bdag cag la khyi'i la/ khyod kyis bdag caga'am gror bya ba dza bsnyazhabakur bar gyisishage nyes zer na/ de la byang
chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus kyi chos ra dang/ srid kyi chos nyade de dag thams cad kyang bla ma 'amed par 'gyur ba sto/ lus kyang rjes su 'brang bar gnas la/
srid kyang che zhing slong ba rnams kyang mngon du gyur pa de'i tshe/ sAnge po med pa las sang po blang bar bya'o zhes nas/ de'i rgyus sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med pa rim
gro byed tsang gtong ba 'dra'i byi chub sems dpa' phyi nang ga gtong ba zhes bya// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gtong ba gang zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'khor
las sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la de ltar dbang bskur zhing bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu ' drung du slong ba dag cig lhags to/'di skad du bdag cag khyod kyi legs pa dang yon tan snyan pa

thos nasaM/grod dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs dang/ khams dang/rgyalapo'i gnas du mnas khyodazhi gesha ma za ba bdag cag gisang ba yongs su tshim par byed par 'gyur snyam ste/ 'di'i phunan bum bu khyer/
kyis bdag cag gabasam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas shagecesanas/ la la shing gcig la rin po che sna bdun dgos so zhes zer/ la lan bdag cag la gling bzhadegos so zhes zer/ la la ni bdag cag
rgyal po'abu dgos so zhes ze'/ la lan bdag cag la rgyal po'i mig gnyis dgos so zhes zer la la nabe dag cag la rgyal po'i lag pa gnyis dgos so zhes zer/la lanangedag cag la rgyal po'i skad
pa gnyis dgos so zhes zer 1 la la bdag cag la rgyal po'angeg rngagos so zhes zer/ la larnale gcig la rgyal po'i khrag dgos so zhes zer/la la bdag cag la rgyal po'amego dgos so zhes zer/
la la khegacag la rgyal po'i snyingedagos so zhes zer/ de la byang chub sems dpar 'ad snyam du sems te sdug po dang yud du 'ong ba thams cad dang bral zhing bye bar yang 'gyur te/ sems can gang ga
bsam pa yang yongs su tsham par ma gyur kyas/dazhu be ga ga lus 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i chos can 'dasesems can de dag gi chags sems rtse zale bar bya ba'i phyi de bsam pa yongs su tsham par bya'o//
pa tsal ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gnas sun sums bskyed par m bye zhes nas/de dag thams cad gtong yang de'i phyir de la se/mas bslad pa gcagatsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba ched da/ sems
can gang la yang mi gro med par ma byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gtong ba'o// de la byang chub sems pa'i 'das pa gtong ba gang zhen/ 'di la byang chubs mas dpa'
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dag/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyaphun sum tshogs pa
thams cad nyan thos nas/ de dag thams cad la chags par mkhyod/ 'bral ba'am khyed/ dmagis sumed pas rab tu'ajug ste/ rtog par ma byed/ rnam par rtog par ma byed/ yongs su
rtog pa'i m byed/ smon par mkhyod/ chags par ma byed/ zhezhu pa'i mkhyud/ rten pa'i sems kyas gnas par ma byed de/ rmi lam gyi chos rdo 'bu thob pa' byed kyang/ dge ba'i rtse ba'ang reg la sung po'i

'du shes ma skyid do// dgekha' rtsa ba de dag la rten pa'i 'du shes sumabyed do/ 'on kyang rten pa'i sems can rnams gzud pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yongs su snyanepar bya ba'i phyi'i brjod do//
'chad do// ston to//'dasapa' chos la brtags na/ shar phyogs su rjes sum mthong ngo// lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs su rjes su mu mthong ngo// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/
shar lho'a phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kya phyogs mtshams dang ]nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang star ga phyogs su rjes su aeklong te/ de 'ad sum du gang ca med rung sku//
tshe ma gtar ba de nabatang ba'o snyam du sems te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'dan byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa gtong ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' m 'das pa gtong ba gang zhen/
'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas Nacom ldan 'das mon pa rnams kyi spyod pa nyazhan/ mtshan ma'i tshul dang dngos por 'dzazhi pas ma 'dzani/'ge rten gyi khams gzhan la brtson ra/
mi byed pa yazhi/ tshol ba ma mnga' ba yane/ 'dod chags pa'i sams kyis mo sen pa yane de la sems ma sdud pa yin te/ myong ba ma byed do// sod par mi byed do/ gdodag tu dgakha'i
rtsal rnams ma gtong ro// de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jug pa'i m byed de/ spyod pa yang rgyun gcod par ma byed do// 'on kyang dmigs pa des sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'grub par bya ba'i phyir
ta sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang tshogs sdud par byed cing/ chos nyid kyang rab tu stad do// chos de na yul na yang ma gnas/ phyogs na yang ma gnas/ nang na yod ma yin/ phyi rol
yang m ni/ rgyang 'di po na yang ga yani/ drung na'ang ma yin no zhes bdasImaru soms te/ gang du nam yang spyad pa med par bya'o snyam pa 'dazho ma 'ongs pa gtong ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
da la byang chub sems dpa' da ltar byung ba'i gtong ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi'i risakyi lha rnams dar/ sum cu rtsa
gsum pa dang/ mtsho ma dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang 2 gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dad/ tshangs pa dang/ tshangs 3sa dang/ tshangs lha nye phan dang/
tshangs pa kun 'khor dang/ ngas chen dang/ snang ba dang/ 'ong chung dang/ tshadamad snang ba dang/ shan tu snang ba dang/ dge ba dang chung dag dang/tshad med dag kha dang/ ge rgyas
nga chab dang/ chung che dang/ tshad med chab dang/ khrus buche ba dang/ sa chab dang/ mgadung ba dang/ shin tu'athor ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ 'og man gyi lha rnams nas/ nyan thos kyaphun sum

'a tshogs pa dar cangasangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang nyan to/ des de dag thos nas kyang rmongs pa'i m 'gyu'o/ shin tu rmongs par zhi 'gyur/rab tu rmongs blta mi 'gyur/zhumakha' ma'i rgyun/
kun nas zhum bar ba 'gyur/ rnam par zhum par ma 'gyur/ shan tu zhum par ma 'gyur/ dma' bar ma 'gyur te/ 'di ltar de shes pas 'du byed du gtogasar thams cad rmi lam lta bur mngon du

khyed do// de na 'od sAm du gang sbyar bar byakha 'dazhe su' yang ma yin na snyam sta/ ngan song ga ma nya bar gnas pa bzlog par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chagasacad bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon du gyur phyi'ade lasagasargyub mad de/ 'din de ltar khyung ba gcod pa zhes bya'o// delabyang chub samasadapa' shazhetugatong ba gang zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sems can mge dang ma ldan pa dang//rna ba dang ma ldan pa dang/ sna dang ma ldan pa dang/ lce dang ma ldan pa dang/ lus dang ma ldan pa grongasald pa zhag gsi 'daskadadu/bdag cag la cachad pa de khyod kyi
[j]byin lared ma ldan pamed par gyi shag/ khyod nakhasal pa grangs med par ma ldan par 'dug cig ces zezha/ byang chub sems dpa' nadi thos ma thag tu sams cade dag ma ldan pa med par sgrub ste/

bskal pa grangs med par dbang po rang ma ldan pa de yang nyams su len to// dga' lton 'dug pa'i tsho/jalta bu n spyod pa dang/ mar mar por 'jug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang/ rdos par gyur pa lta bu yin pa dar/

mkhregs par grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang/ dbang po grub pa lta bu yanepa da skyes pa ja lta bu yin pa dang/ rgab jalta bu yin pa dang/ nab ji lta bu yin pa dang/ shab ji lta bu la'il dang/ lus kyi rang bzhazhi thog
mang rnabaradang/ tham ji lta bu bzhin du yang dag par ba shes te/ngos dum rung ba/ ngo tshaskyab/ 'phags pa ma yin pa/mi zhim ba/ rjenapa'i dri cin/ ra 'gyur ba/ nus pa sogs pa sha dang khrag ka

ga logs la/rmang gunas rtag tu zag pa 'o zhes nas/de na sams bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar mi sogs te/sams bskyed po gcige gas kyang chags pa ma skyod do//de shani sugatong ba nges 'dzin pa med pa'i

yod dad ldan pa yin te1lus 'azhi de ltar snya po med pa bzhin/bdag ga 'us 'dasnying po med par mthong bzhan du lus la chags 'ji ltar byas/sems can 'du reg gisag bde gzhan du yongs su tshim par bya'o lus/
snying bo med pa 'das 'gro ba thams cad kyangesam pa yongs su rdzogs bar bya'o// 'grob thams cad kyaikyashes par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang rung ba la yang mu gnas pa'i tshul gyis gzhag pa
bya'o zhes nas lus kyi 'du shes kyang med la sems kyi 'du shesazhed de/kye rgyalaba' srasartag/ 'donebyang chub sags dba'i gi tong ba'i gtor tu drug pa/ kyi rgyal ba'i
sras ba// de la byang chub sems dpa' ya shes kyi gtar gang zhen/'di la byang chub sems dapa' gzugs rab tu shes so// gzugs kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi legog pa rab tu shes so// gzu/

'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa rnalta ba bzhin du 'ab tu shes so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhazhedu rab tu shes so// rnam par shes ba kun 'byung

ba yang dag pa ji ltab bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam pa shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa jalta ba bzhin du rab tu shes

so// martagi pa rab tu shes so// ma'age pan kun 'byung po rab tu shes so/// ma 'ge pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma'age pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du

ba tu shesaso// srid pa rab tu shes so// srid pa kun 'byung ba 'ab tu shesaso// sred pa 'gog pa rta tu shes so// srid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pajalta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyan thos 'di tu

rdzo shes so// nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so// nyan thos kyi kun 'byung ba rag tu shes so// nyan thos kyi mya ngan las rab yang dag pa rdzalta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas rab tu shes so//

0 ]ra sas rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so// rangasas rgyas kya kun 'byung ba zab tu shes so// ra sas rgyas kyi longs sumu na las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gtu shes so// byang chub sems par rab
tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' chos rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes red so// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mu na las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du nyal

sa/ ji ltar shes she na/las dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dang/ bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ gsob dang/ gsog dang gsang po med pa dang/ bdag med pa la sku shes te/chos gang yang sar bo can
jug sa pa med do// chos gang la yang rang bzhan du 'dogs pa yod re 'ango bo nyid kyi mthas gtugs par thams cad rab tu shes so// sems can rnams la yang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston te/deb ston

can 'jig pa med pa'i phyi'i chos ston to/gang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs 'jag pa med pa'i phyi'i/ tshor ba 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes 'ge pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed 'jig pa med pa'i phyin/

rnam ba ra shes pa 'jige bshad pa' phyir chos ston to// ma'age pa 'jagi pa chad pa 'phyi'i[） ]nyan thos kyi chos dang ]da sangs rgyas kyi chos ra/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa med pa'i phyi'i chos ston to/
datsa' phyir zhen/ chos nam skyes pa/ 'dus ma byas pa byed pa po med pa/ rtsod pa med pa/ gnas pa med// ma skyes pa/ ma 'byung ba/ ma zlangs pa/ ta bar ma blangs pa
0/ @#/// byed pa med pa lta/ de shes rab kyi getar de lta bu dang ldan pas/ las gron chung ngus chos thams cad la mkhas pa gzhan kyang ma 'jog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'ab shes so//
shes rab kyi gter de yang ma zed pa nito/ de yang shazhi khastan pa sus ma zad pa yasheno// bcu gang zhe na/ thos pa la mkhas pas ma zad do// dge ba'0shes gnyan la bstan pas ma zad do// tshig rab tu
yaM khye ba la mkhas pas ma zad do// chos kyi rabs la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pas ma zad do// rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas ma zad do// bsod nams thams cad shin tu bsags pas
mazad do// skyo pa mad par mngon par sgrub pas ma zad do// gzungs thams cad kyi sgor zhugs pas ma zad do// sems can thams cad kyaskad dang/ sgang/brjod pa sna tshogs kyakhyer ma zad do//'go

ba thams cad kyi yid gnyis dang/ nem nur dang/ thotson yang dag par gcod pa'i phyi'i ma zad do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs sukhastan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang/

yongs su sAzhiba' bya ba dang/ gdulakha'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs pa'i phyi'i mazad de/ mazer pangashin tu bstan pabcu po de dag gsinga shes rab kyage 'dem zed pa laneno// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di na byar
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi gter yan te/ de la gnas pa'i byeng chub po/mas dpa' rnams shes pa dang ye shes bla na med pa rnam par 'tshar rkyago kyi rgyal ba'i sras/

ga de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyaldan pa'i gtar gang zhezhu/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'dul byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/de yang rgyud nongs pa med pa'i dran pas ston gyi gnas

rjes su ldan te/ 'di lta tshagacig kyang rjes su dran no// tshiganyis dang gsum dang/ bzhadeng 1lnga dang/ tshob dang/ stong dang/ brgya stong dang tshabargyakhrag du ma dang/ tshe stong phrag dumang/ tshabargya stong khrag dug dang/
'jig pa'iskal pa 'am/ 'du ba bskal pa 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'duba' bskal pa 'am/'jag pa'i bskal bdum 'am/ 'du ba'akhaskal pa du ma 'am/ 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i Tiskal pa du ma dang/

bskal pa brgya dang/bskal pa stong dang/ bskal pa brgya stong dang/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dang/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangasam dag
bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ mtshus pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mumed pa/ sa mtshams rtsod pa/gzhal du med pa/brjod du med pa/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang bzhi ring/ ltadar/gzhung de
bzhin du brjod du med pa' lar brjod med pa dang/ sangs rgyas skyob lung bstan pa/ shin tu brjod pa gcig dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum ng/ bzhadeng/ lta nusasangs rgyas skya bar lung bstan bar shin tu
brjod med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang/sangs rgyas skye ba gcig bastan te/ de dang mtshams sbyor ba'i lung bstan pa gcig dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhadeng/ ldan s
/sangs rgyas skya ba shagatubastan te/ de dang mtshams sbyor ba lung bstanal/ brjod dumed pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang/ mdo'i sde gcig rang/gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang/
ldan s brjod du med pa'i yang brjod dumed pa bar dang/ dbyangs kyis bsad pa'i sde dang lung bstan pa'i sde dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ gleng gzhi'i sta dang/ ched du brjod pa'i sna dang/ 'di

ltar 'das pa'i sde dang/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sdodang/ shanitu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ chos rmad du byung ba bstan pa'i sde dang/ man ngag khastan pa'i sdu gcig dang gnyis dang/ gsum dang bzhidang/ ldan s/
brjod du med pa'i yeng brjod dumed pa'i bar dang// 'khor 'dus ba gtsagadang/ chos kya mtshams sbyor ba gcig nas/ chos kyatshams sbyar ba brjod du med bas yang brjod rumad pa'i bar dang/ dbang po sna

tshogs gcig nas dbang po snatshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du yod pa'i bar dang/ bapo rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig nas/ dbang po thadapa sna tshog sabarjod du med pa' leng brjod du med pa'i

bar dang/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig nas/ nyon mongs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang/ tang de 'dzin sna tshogs gcig nas/ tang nge 'dzazhi sna tshog sabarjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
sho med pa'ikhar ngag kyang dran// dgakha/ dang ba/'og pa med pa/ rnam par gsal ba/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ drima med ba/ 'od gsalab/sang sang po/ bsgrubs pa

[z mad pas rjes su shano// byang chub sems dpa' dran pa de na 'jig rten gyi 'khrug pas ma 'phrogs pa ya/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nyakhar nyon mongs pa'i maskyes pa yani/ sonaadegaba'i rtsa ba shin tu
tusbyangs pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/ bdud dang mu stegs can dmags pa la gnas pa gzhan gyis ma chod pa yazhi tshortags kun tu 'pho ba'i lus shan tu bstan pa thams cad

kyis brjod pa 'ganus pa yan/ sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi me'amatha' dang/ da ltar byung ba'amathas rnam pa'i m chod pa yano/ 'jig rten gyi khams su skya pa dang gnas pa thams cad kyis skyon du ma gyur pa yin/
sas rgyas skyes pa 'a 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa shin tu bstan pa thams cad kyis thogs pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bdazhi
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i getor rta brgyad pa'i da kyi rgyal ba'i ses dag de la byang chub sams rang 'a rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gata5 gong zhen/kya rgyal pa 'a sus rtag/ 'di

bya chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin te/de yang ya gi re bzhi zhi gzhan ma yin pas mdoratshul gyi chos ston to// den tsho'i rgyud gcig pa yang yongs su 'an to// tsho'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yar

brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to// sangs rgyas kya etshan gcig kyang yongs su ra dzani to// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod du yong pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzazhi to/ bskal
pa grangs med pa bstan pa gtsagakyang yongasasu'adzazhito// bskal pa grangs med pa lastan babarjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su ra'i to// de bzhin gshegs/
bas lung bstan ba brjod pa gcagekyang longs su 'dzazhi to// debazhi gshegs par lung bstan pa brjod pa brjod dmadapa' yeng brjod mad pa 'khor du yang yongs su 'dzazhi to// mdogacig kyang yongs su
'a to// mdo rjod byed pa' yabarjod du med pa' bdu yang longs su 'dzan to// 'dus pa gcig kyang longs su 'dzin to// 'jus brjod du med pa'i yang brjod dusarapa'i ger du yang yongs su'adzin to//

chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to// chos kya mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i leng brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzazhi to// dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig kyang longs su

bzhi to// dbang po rnam batha dad pa sna tshog sabarjod du med pa' yid brjod du med pa'i pir du yar yongs su 'dzin to// nyon mongs pa snatshogs gcig kyang yos su 'a ni to// nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod yod pa'i

gang brjod du med pa'i bar du yar yongs su 'dzin to// tade de 'dzanyisAtshogs gcig kyang yos su 'dzin to// tar de 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med par yong brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'anyi to// kye rgyal
ba' sras dag/ 'a ni khying chub sems dpa' snyams dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter yanita/mazad pa/ kun tu aTha' yas pa/dgong dka' ba/ gtape rnyed par dka' ba/ bsgrub pa'i dka' kha/
mi 'phrogasal/thug pa med pa// bdag nyid che ba'i se/ngas rgyas kyi sul gyi rjes su song ba ste 'dazhi gter dgu pa'o/ dkye rgyal ba'i srasarag/ de la byang chub sems dapa' rnams kyi glu gros kyi

gtor gang zhen/ kye rgyal kha'i sras dag/ 'a da la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i rtog pa dang ldan zhing blo gros dang ldan pa yan to/mdo sde thams cad dang ma 'gal bsade chos ston pa'i tshad

dngos po longs su ldog pa gcig kyang brtsams te chos ston pa nas// dngos po yongs su ldog babarjod du med pa'i lang brjod du med pa'i par du yang chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyis nagaci gnas / tshul re bzhi'i
du brjod du med pa'i lang brjod du med pa'i kher dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcag dang/ sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa gcig dang/ mdogacig dang/ 'khor 'dus pa gcig dang/ chos kyi mtshams
sbyar ba gcig dang/ pang bo rnamal zad d pa tshog sakacage ra 1 nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig dang/ tangang 'a'i sba tshogs gtsagakyang brtsams te chos ston pa nas/ tadeng 'dzan sAtshogs

brjod du'ed pa 'a yang brjod du med pa'i Tir du brtsams te chos ston to/ nyin gcig kyang zad pa'i byed tsang chos ston panas/zla ba phyed dang/ zla ba gcig dang/ logacig lo brgya dang/ la stong dang de la brgya phrag stong dang

bskal pa dang/ bsal pakho dang/bskal pa stong dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag stong dang/bskal pabyab khrag khrag brgya phrag stong dang/ bskal pa tshad med pa dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ bskal pa dpag tu
na/ @#// med pa dang/ grangs med pa dang/ mtshungs pa med pa dang/ kun tu mtha' yas pa dang/ mu med pa dang/ sa mtshams med pa dang/ gzhal du med pa dang/ brjod du med pa dag kyang
zad par byed cing chos ston na/tshig dang yig gcig brtsams kyang don dang/ tshig dang/ yi ge'i mtha' thug pa med de de ci'i phyir zhan de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i gte
tshe gcu rab tu thob pa'i phyir te gter de dag thob pas gzungs kyi snying po'i sgo chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba gzungs brgya stong gras mad pa'i 'khor thams cad mngon du 'gyur

de gzungs kyi 'bor brgya stong grangs med pa ston par byed do//chos snang ba shin tu bstan pa thob pas sems can thams cad la chos ston to chos kyi sgo snang ba'i chos can lce yangs pas 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad du mngon par go bar byed pa dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas 'gro ba thams cad tshig par byed pa dang/ dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar byed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang kun nas 'khor ba

[¥ ]thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang [”]sgra dang tshig rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang/ yi ge thams cad kyi spobs pas ston pa'i rjes su song ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sa bon grung po
yongs su shes pa'i bsam pa can du byed pas chos ston te/thogs par mi byed do/skyo bar mi 'gyur ro/ deci'i phyir zhe na/den 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas nam mkha'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings mtha'

dang dbus med pa rgyas par byed pa'i lus rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dug/ 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i gter banus blo gros mi zad pa/thug pa med pa 'dres pa med pa/ rnam par mi chod pa/

rgyun gcad par mi nus pa/phyir mi ldog pa/gting rnyed par dka' ba/ ring du gyur pa/go kun dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi chos la zhugs pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po de dag ni byang rtsubasamA
pa'i rnams kyi gter te/mi zad pa'i rnam pa bcus ma zad pa yin no//bla na med pa yin no// mthar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yin no// bcu gang zhen/ sems na thams cad kyi nye par 'tsho ba dang/
son gyi smon lam legs par yongs su bsngos pa dang/ bskal pa thams cad kyi grangs gcad du med pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam panyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir/sems can tshad med pa dang 'dus
byas kyis ma gos pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas la yongs su bsngos pa dang/ de ma thag gi yul du gyur pas chos thams cad blad mi shes pa dang/ smon lam chen po tha dad pa med pa dang/ spyod pa la gnas pa'i

stobasazhin tu 'dzin pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang/ chos thams thad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa ste mi zad ba'i rnam pa bcu po 'dagagis 'jig rten

gyi bya ba thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa zad mi shes pa'i gte'anyen por 'gyur ro/shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal pomazhes bya ba las/gter mi zad pa bdu bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu bdun pa'o//
can/ @#/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo bam po nyi shu dgu ba// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang//
nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang sha'agyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang sengag phyogs kyi
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yar gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa/ gli2re na yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
brlabs kyis chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na yang 'khod par shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir ma brtul/ byang chub kyi shing drung

yang phyir ma brtul/ ra'ab kyi rtse mo ya nga phyir ma brtul bar/rab mtsho ma'i gnas sa ga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po pa'i rgyan ces bya ba gang na ba der gshegs par
snang ngo// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs pa'i snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag na yang bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan
gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ste byin gyis brlabs lta ma de dag kyang ma 'khrugs par snang ngo// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis rgyang ma nas/ bcom ldan 'dab khang pa rin po che thams
cad kyis brgyan par gshegs pa mthong nas/ rig pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po rje thams cang kyis brgyan pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge 'i gdan nor bu rin po che las byas pa/ lha rdzas

kyi rin po che'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu las longs su grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa
mang pos byur ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad lag byung ba'i chos dkar po las byung ba/ bsod nams kyi snyebs mtha' yas pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam par smin pa thams

cad kyis rnam par dag pa mi mthun pa med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis byung ba/dgos pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba/ thug pa med pa/'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa 'bog 'bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ me tog gi bu re bye ba brgya stong phragal bcu kun nas sa pa/'thung ba'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas ldang ba/

sos kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag banus spros kun tu 'thul bar sbyar ba/ rin po cha'i bde bye ba brgya stong phrag bAn steng nas bkab pa/ me tog gi gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu kun nas bsgreng ba na po che'i

gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag banusakun nas bkab pa/ gdan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par gtang ba karin po ma'i pu shu bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan du bsgrubs pa nor bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu

shin tu rnam par phye bas g.yog par byas ma/ rin po che'i drab bye ba brgya stong phrag banus 'khor kun tu g.yogs pa rin po cha'i 'phreng ba 'phyang ba'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcushin tu sbyangs

pas bkab pa/lhab lhub kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag banus shin tu klubs shing btsan pa gdugs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phragabanus kun nas khebs par bkab pa/gos sna tshogs kyi drab bye ba brgya stong phrag

btsus snatshogs su g.yog pa rin pe che'i pad+mo'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu rgyas par bkram pa/ spos rin po cha'i drab bye ba brgya stong phragabanu 'thul zhing yid du 'ong bar dri zhim pa/ chen po'i bla'i

chen po'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyan chen po rgyas par phyes pa 2rin poma'i dril bu'i rgyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'od ba'i sgra phyung ba tsan dan rin po che'i mdog lta bu'i bla re bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab pa// rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag su me rtogak+ kun tu rgyas pa dgos kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyus sna tshogs su snang bar

bkab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i blare byeb brgya stong phrag banus sna tshogs su kun nas bkab pa/gdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag banus rab tupa/yogs shing rnam ba sna tshogs su

snang ba/gser gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab cing rnam par dag par byas pa/ bai DUrla'i bla re byeb brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas dri ma medacing natu dag par byas pa/ snying po sna tshogs

can gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bla rer btab pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i nor bu ren po tshe bzang pos shin tu mdzes shing khebs par bkab pa//

rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag banus phyogs thams cad bkab pa/ rin po cha'i gzugs brnyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par phye zhing mdzes par brgyan nga 12na po che'i 'phreng ba/

brgya stong phrag bcus 'phreng ba kun tu 'brel ba'i brgyan pa/ sos kyi 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag banus mchod pa la tshul dang 'thun pa'i smos kyis dri zhim par byas pa/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i sgros dang gdug spos/

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong khrag bshus kha dog mtha' yas pa dang dri zhim por ga tul ba'i mchod pa na lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lhab lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phragang ru mngon par klubs shing dag par byas pa

rin po che'i me tog gi 'phrengab bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyud du mdzes par byas pa/ dpal gyi snying bo'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phragab+hAnus rin po che sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po

sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus rin po thams cad kyi rgyan du rnam par dag pa nor bu 'an po che rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag banus gdan gyi snying po shAn tu brgyan pa 3dbang

po'i rdo rje phye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu smras pa/rin po che'i snam bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu sbyangs pa/ 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang po 'i nor bu rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snying
@#// par brgyan pa/ gser gyi snying po bya ba brgya stong phrag banus shin tu bsgrubs shing dag par byas pa/nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba byeb brgya stong phrag bcus rdul med par snang bar byas

panor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa bye ba brgya stong phrag banus snying po mtha' yas pa snang bar brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'bar bar

bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po cha brgya byin snang ba'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag banus 'od zer snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che lha las mchog tu bya ba bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyun skar khung gi shar bu mdzag

par bres pa/nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus kha dog gsal bar gyur pa/ dngul gyi rta babs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bres pa/ snying po dkar po rab tu rnam par phye ba 'gro ba

rgya mtsho'i zla gam bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus sgrubs shin tu b+hAsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag banus bstan mdzes par shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po ma sems kyi rgyal po bya ba brgya

stong phrag bcus 'dab chags yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar kun tu brgyan pa/ nor bu chen po ma sang ge'i gdong bya ba brgya stong phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag banus shin tu spras pa'imachod pa dang ldan ng nor bu rin po

che'adzam bu'i rgyal mtsha bye ba brgya stong phrag banus mthu ban nga rin du brtan nga nor bu rin po cha snying po dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par sna pa zhing mdzes par byas pa nor bu rin po ru dbang po'i rgyal

mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snang nga'i gdugs nya bres pa/ kanor bu rin pom dngul gyi snying po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang rnam pa sna tshogs su bkram pa/ nor bu rin po ma'i rab kyi rgyal mtshan bya ba brgya stong

phrag bsdus snying po na tu brgyan pa/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mdzes par nges pa/ ba k+ku'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcas dra bar bres pa/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par phye ba/ nor bu yid du 'ong ba'i 'phreng babyed pa stong phrag bcu rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod pa/ na po cha shin tu snang ba'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bsus na tu rnam

bar phye zhing rab tu bzung ba/ rin po che 'bru sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag nus lus du brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba bye ba phrag b.rus yid du 'ong bar snang ba nor bu rin po che ba dag du

ma'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyas snying po ba job gasna tshogs shing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mtha' phyir pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i 'phreng ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus dag par ba rlungs pa

nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus dpal chen po rab tu 'thob pa thob pa 'gyur pa nor bu'i gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs shin tu bar brgyan pa/ rin po

dbang po'i kha dog bye ba brgya stong phrag paru lags yongs su 'dzin pa/ dus dang 'thun pa 'a na dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhim pos rgyas par byas pa/ rim gro sgruba'i
@#// mi'i tshogs bye ba brgya stong khrag cus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su song ba/ smyos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu rgyas pa gzhan gyis pham pa med pa'i spos bye ba brgya/

stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu rgyas pa/ snes kyi gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun du 'byung ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i smyos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri rab du 'byung ba snang ba ston pa'i spros bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcu'i dris 'gro ba kun tu gang ba/ dri sna tshogs khag mtha' yas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa' zhim pa/ byug pa bye ba ngargya stong phrag bcus shin tu byug

patsan dan rnam pa tha dad pa'i basmyos byeb brgya stong phrag brkus tshon du bskus shing mdzes pa/ bas rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dri zhim por shin tu bsgos pa/ a ka ru smug po pad+mo'i snying po bye ba brgya

stong phrag b.ru'i sprin gyis snying por byas pa/ bdug spos bye ba brgya stong phrag baashin tu bdugs shing yog pa/ bdug spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dbang po zhi bar zhum pa 2spros kun tu rgyu ba bya

ba brgya stong phrag bduyid du 'ong bar zhim pa/ sos gyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'o thams cad du bdugs shing dri zhim pa/ smos rnam par tshor bar byed pa'i ma pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bdus dbang po mi

'khrugs par spos thams cad kyi mchod par byab/ spos kyi rgyal po gzhal dumed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su shin tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi me togagi sprin gyi cha'

bye ba brgya stong gabasu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sngon bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sbyin gyi mar phye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab ba/ lha rdzas kyi pa'i

smin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phragabaru mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po tsho'i ma tog gi smin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phragabasu'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi uta la'i smin gyi char bye ba brgya stong

phrag bdu kun tu log par 'bab pa/ lho rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog ga ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog putur ka'i sprinagyi rma' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu h+phun tu 'bab pa/

lha rdzas kyi me togo man da ra ba'i sprigyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs chen po rab tu 'bab pa lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyisinagyi mar bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu rgyun du 'bab pa/ na bza'i sprin

bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus bar snang kha dog sna tshogs su gyur pa/nor bu rin po ma'i sprin gyi bya ba brgya stophrag b.ru kun tu snang bar 'bab bdagadugs kyi sprinagyi par bye ba brgya stong phragabcu kun nas yog par

'bab pa/ ba dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu kha dogasna tshogs du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi cod pan gyi sprin gyi rma'abye ba brgya stong phrag banusna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcu in du klubs par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po cha'i sprenagyi dbye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs su 'bab pa lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i samo'i ro'i smin gyi char bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen

@#// por 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi spyin gyi ra bye ba brgya stong phraganu tsan dana rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog rnam pa du mar 'bab pa lha rdzas kyi a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi spyin gyi char bye ba brgya stong

phrag banu shin tu yog par 'thul zhing 'bab pa/ ren po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgreng ba/ rin po cha'i ba dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu+i na tu sbyangs pa/ snam bu rin po che'i lnga lnga bye ba brgya stong

phrag b.ruh+phun tu bres pa/ sbos kyi snying bye ba brgya stong phrag bsus na tu 'thul ba da po ma'i 'phreng ba'i chun po byab brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu spungs pa/ rin po cha'isil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu

'khrol zhing 'dzin ma/ lha rdzas kyi rdul yab bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par slob cing 'dzin pa rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu shin du 'khrol ba/ rin po ma'i stegs bu bye ba brgya stong

N+NaM phragabarus kun nas bskor ba/rin po che'i shing ta la'i 'phrengab bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu kun nas 'greng ba rin po che'i 'phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus lta lder brgyan pa/ rin po'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag

banukun nas yog cing 'khor ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan can bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang gi rgyan du krigs pa/ rin po cha'i khang bu bye ba brgya stong gi sgo la rin po che thams cad kyi 'phreng ba bkyi ba/

rdzo/ gser gyi dril bu bye ba brgya stong phragabasu'akhrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba/ dpal gyi be'u bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pas yongs su dag pa rin po cha'i bkra shis bye ba brgya stong phrag

banu'i mtshan bzang po byung ba/ gage ra gyi la pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i gser gyi lcag pod kyis kun tu blas pa/ ri pa tshe'i gdugs gcig nas gcig brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bdun po chu thams cad kyi yu

bar bzung ba/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i rgyan gyi dra ba thams cad du rnam par bres pa 1 rin po cha'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba snang ba bye ba brgyu

stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru rab tu 'tsher ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khol gyi snying po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcas gzugs rab tu mdzes shing lus shin tu 'phags pa/

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bsgrubs pa/ skyes kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib med par snang ba 1 lha rdzas kyi pa d+ma'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs

cing snying po shin tu 'phags pa na po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus/nga po kun nas log par byas pa/ me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas rgyas par bkram pa/ sngos kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcu'i dri sna tshogs kun nas yog nga/ lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bting ba/ lta rdzas kyi gos chen po ma bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bkram pa lha rdzas kyi gos kha

dog sngon po bya ba brgya gong phrag paru+i na tu rgyan par btid ba[”]lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyanasmon por bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga'/

'bya/ bar btang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ngo shos kha dog sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyan du bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu bod legs

par ba ting pa/ da skyes sna tshogs kyis yo ngas su bsgos pa'i gos bye nga brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por bting ba/ rin po che rmad du byung ba thamasacad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcug yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting

ba gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bshus bla gab tu bkab pa/ lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba 'i sgra phyung ba/ gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal ma tshan bye ba brgya stod

phrag b.ru zla shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba/ lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po cha'i mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyun du brgyan pa/ spros kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya rnyong phrag bcus

bsngos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thams cad kyi char du 'bab pa/ lha rdzas gyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus

gos thams cad du bskyod pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rinapo che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag banus mdzes pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhang lcab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong

phrag bcus lhab lhung thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu phyogs kun nas 'greng ba/ lha rdza sa kyi gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcu dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i snyan pa phyung ba lha rdzas kyi cha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus ldachen

po'i sgru+i na tu phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi pe war bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong zhing 'brel ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi kha sbyar ba bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus dbyangs chen por sgrubasgrags pa/ lhardzas

sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru glu dang rol mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa// lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par grags par

byus pa/ sprul pa'i rol mo bya ba brgya stong phrag brkus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra brnyan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rbabo na bye ba brgya stong phrag bsu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba/

yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang glu'i dbyangs snyan pa khyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rolamor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga'

dang zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba/ tshig gi rim pa yid du 'od ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstod cing mchong pa/ bstod pa rgya chen po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya

stong phrag b.ru shin tu bsgoms shing bston pa bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa 2 phra bar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag/
banus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa/ sdom gyi spyod pas bstong pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa/ dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag

h+pha bcus brten cing bstod nga/ sdom gyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag banus rnam par dag par bskyod pa chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag banus mngon par byung bar bstod/

cing 'jig pa me da par bstod pa/ bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa/ byang dub sems dang 'a sa'i glu bye ba brgya

stong phrag bsus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur brjod cing sbyar ba/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag

bsu glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa/ chos zab mo'i gla bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus thogs pa med par chos kyi snang ba thams cang glur blangs te sbyar ba/ dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bshus yid du
'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/ sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing rna ba dang bar byas pa/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu

bye ba brgya stong khrag bsus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhani rnam par bstan pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i klu bye ba brgya stong khrag bsu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang rim gro rab tu bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod

yul gyi gru bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba/ gardzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa/

thams cad kyi gsung gi ldem po ngag rab tu rtogs pa rnam par ston pa/ chos thams cad kyi gru bye ba brgya stong phrag bcug chos thams cad glu dang rol mo dang/sil snyan gyi sgra byung ba dang ldan pa//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang shugs mthong ma thag tu skyed par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa

bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa/ byang chub sems dang la rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bsu'i mos pa rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa bya ba

brgya stong phragabanu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa rgya cher byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa/ yongs su rgyas par byed pa byang chub sems

dpa' bsam pa dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong thug bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin tu basbyor ba/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems

dpa' sa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpala gzhon nur gyur pa bye ba brgya stong khrag b.ru'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'od snang bar byed pa 2 byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
tshab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis ma khyab pa la 'jug par byed nga/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrigayab stong phrag bcu re bzhin/

klo gshegs nga 'i stobs gzhal du med pa ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'thob pa rnam par 'phrul ba/ byung chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu sgrub

cing spyod ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru shin tu skyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i da pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bdu mi shigs par rab tu gzhog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i

shugs bye ba brgya stong phragabasu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi grags pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/khyang chub sems dpa'i chos/

kyi don bye ba brgya stong phrug b.ru'i ye shes gdon mi za ba nges par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrug pa med par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcu'i yo shes gdon mi bra ba bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcul sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin par byan gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo bya ba

brgya so phral ba yangs pa'i blo tshad med par ston pa/ byang chub sems dang 'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dmu rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bamukatong ba thams

cad kyi sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bsu tshad med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcu sems 'khrugs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha'ayas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung bar byed pa/

byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong phrag bsu tshad med pa'i bsam gtan rtogs pa'i snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag

bcu shan tu snang zhing shes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'byung ba rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshos kyi sgo byi ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ya shes snang ba

gsal bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'byam kus pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi blo snang ba/ byin gyis rlob pa phyogs bcu 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi tshul rmongs pa

med cing gti mug med par ston pa/ chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag banu rab tu 'thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bsu'ajam klas pa la 'jug par byed pa/ chos kyi lus bye ba

brgya stong phrag bcu sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par bsgrub pa rab tu shes par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye pa

brgya stong phrag b.ru mngon par bsgrub pa'i 'byung gnas su gur pa/ chos 'byam klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru'i tshogs rab tu sgrub pa chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru'i sangs rgyas

klo kyi chos thams cad mthong ba la rgyal mtshan du gyur pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par ston pa'i spyod tshul can/ lha'i dbang po bya ba brgya stong phrag da ru mngon par dga' ba'i

lus can/ klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru mi skyo bar lta ba/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu thal mo sbyor zhing spyi bo la gzhog pa/ dri khra'i dbang po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi ngoms

par mos pas ldong ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bya ba brgya stong phrag bsung rgyal gyi yid yongs su chad nga/ nam mkha'i ldeng gi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag banu'i kha nas dar shin tu spyangs pa ma 'am ci'i dbang

po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems rab tu dga' ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus dga' ba'i yid du blta ba tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu zhe sa ma phu dud du gnas pa/

'jig rtan gyi dbang po bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i spyi bo dang lus kyis btud pa/ lha'i rgyal bo brgya byin la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag banus shin tu blta ba/ rab mtsho ma'i lA'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya

stong phrag banus ngaga' ba chen po'i sgra phyung ba/ rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal bo la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phragi banus rab tu gdud pa// rab 'phrul ngaga'i lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag

thatha banus phyag bya ba/ dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus thal mo sbyar ba/ tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta ba/ dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag banus/
mngon par brjod pa// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya stong phrag banus shin tu mchod pa/ smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba/ sngon 'grogs pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus pa phyung ba/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus thams cad kyis phyag bya ba/ tshangs
