lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bsdus spyi bos 'dud pa/ tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa tshangs pa chen po bya ba brgya stong phrag banus yon
tanamatha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa brgya phrag stong gis shin tu bstod pa'i sa phyung ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khor lngas phyag bya ba/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya

stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/ tshad mad 'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus sangs rgyas legs par gshegs so zhes phyag bya ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye

ba brgya stong phrag bcusashin tu bstod cing mthong bar dka' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gzhal med khang dang ba can du 'phagasapa/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag banus
sems dang ba'i lus kyis mngon par gdung pa/tshad med dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas ma thong bar mos shing rang gi lus kyis gdung nga/ dge res kyi lha bye ba

k+Sha brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa dang rimagror bya ba che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus ngag ge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par bya ba/ chung che'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag banus de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i 'du shes rab

tu skyes shing lta pa ]tshad med rtse ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus dag pa'i chos rtogs shing rim spo cher bya ba/ 'bras bu che ba'i lnga bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus lus shin tu 'dud pa 2 ma che ba'i lha bye ba

brgya stong phrag b.rus dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan par byas te mngon par brjod cing lus gdung pa/mi dres pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga nas thal mo sbyar zhing ngoms mi shes par
blta ba/ gya nom snang ba'i lta bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus mngon par bltas te lus gdung pa/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ngoms mashes par lus

dbul ka/ 'og min gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gdud cing mchod la/ lha sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen pos snang ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lta bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
shin tu bas mas shing bsgrubs te brgyan pa/lha'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phragabcus sangs rgyas kyi gtan bsgrubs pa ma byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi gcad pa/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa'
[d/]chen po bya ba brgya stong phrag bdu me tog thogs pa dang 2 smos thogs pa dang/ 'phreng ba thogs pa dang/ phye ma thogs pa dang/ phyug pa thogs pa dang na bza' thogs pa dang/ gdugs thogs
pa dang/ rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang/ ba dan thogs pa dang 2 rin po cha thogs pa dang/ phyang phrul thogs pa dang/ lhab lhub thogs pas mngon par gtor cing char du phab ste rab tu dag ba/ lha
bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha'i khyim mngon par 'phags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyudapa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya ba/ lha'i gzhal me khang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bus dad par bsu ba
lha'i bu btsun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhan shin tu bzung ba/ dbang bskur ba'i lha'i bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhan kun nas bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'isems bye ba brgya stong phrag
b.rus legs par sems shing spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yid dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bya ba brgya
stong phrag bcu rab tu sim par byed pa/ byang rlub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru yongs su dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa bye ba brgyu stong phrag bcu
rnam par dag par byed l/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu ston par byed pa//
a[© } ]/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru rab tu sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
ris bye ba brgya stong phragabasu yongs su smin par 'dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par byung ba/sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag bdus byin gyis brlab pa/ bsod
nams bye ba brgya stong phrag b.rus yongs su grub pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyangs pa/ smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bas shin tu dag par byas pa/

rtsod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par skyes pa/ chos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nye bar brtan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa bye ba brgya stong phrag b.ru rjes su song ba/ yon tan bye ba brgya stong
phrag banus h+phun tu 'phags pa bshams so// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo bam po sumasu pa// ji ltar gling bzhi pachen po 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas

su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyis khang pa rin po chu thams cad kyi rgyan can du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pachen dag na yang

dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan dag gis khang pa rin po chu thams cad kyi rgyan rnam dag tu rgyan 'di la bu dang/ tshul 'di lta bu dang/ dad pa 'di lta bu dang/ mos pa 'di lta bu dang/
dga' ba 'di lta bu dang/ rab tu dga' ba 'di lta bu dang/ zhe sa de lta bu dang/ rim gro 'di lta bu dang/ sob 'di lta bu dang/ nye bar sems pa 'di lta bu s/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan
bting bar gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bting nas zhes can rim gro dang bcas par dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag
bsu dang lhan cig tu ngong ste bcom ldan 'das bsu nas/ me tog yon tan grangs med pa'i sprin gyi chakani rab tu phab/ spos yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mar ni shin tu phab/ 'phreng ba yon tan

sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i spri nu ni rab tu bkye 3na danagIn tu dag pa'i spyin yangs pa ni rab tu bkye/ gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spyin gyi char ni rab tu phab/ lha rdzas kyi gos rab tu phra ba'i sprin ni rab

tu bkye/ rinapo chayid du 'od ba mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char ni rab tu phab/sems shin tu dad bas lhardzas kyi lhab lhub dang phyang phul gyi spyin gyi char na rab tu phab 3bdug spos rnam pa du

ma'i spyin gyis ni kun tu bdugs/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang a ka ru'i phye ma dang/ smos kyi dam pa thams rung gyi phye ma'i smin gyi cha la ni rab tu phab/ lha'i bu mtha' yas pas kyang rang rang gi
lus kyi sprin@#na tu bkyi dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang/ de ma yin pa'i lha'i rjes nas 'dus pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang sems shin tu dang bas zhe sa/
rab tu bskyed nus shin tu btud de phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu mo grangs med pa dag kyang dga' zhing mos pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems so// byang chub sems/
zla/ dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na spyod pa grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang la gnas te/ sangs rgyas la mchod par brtson pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod

pa byed do// rim gro byed do// phyag 'tshal lo// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang 2 sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul bsam
gyis mi khyab pas rol mo dkrol ba dang brdung ba'i tshogs grangs med pa yang sgra 'byin par gyur to/ lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na'akhod pa rnams dang/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la ni
blta/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shin tu dkon pa' ni rjes su sems shing/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos can no zhes
sgyu yang dag par blta zhing de logs su mngon par blta bar gyur to// dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i 'khor thams cad dang/ lha bya ba brgya stong grangs med pa bcom ldan 'das ngasu ba'i phyir/
rin po pa thams cad kyi me tog gi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang 3sngos thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang/ rin po ma thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang/ rgyan thams

bad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi a ka ru thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang/ lha rdzas kye

rin po che thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyim tog thams cad phye ma'i thur ma thogs thogs pa dang 2 lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i phur ma thogs thogs pa rnams
kyang dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ mngon par gter to// rab tu gtor to// lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas su gtogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang la 'khod do/
ye shesakyi spyod yul lagazhol ba'i sems kyis spos dang bdug pa'i sprin gyis bdug pas bar snang brgyud pa byas so// sangs rgyas la dga' zhing gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi

sngon gyi char gyis rab tu brgyan pas bar snang brgyan pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa la zhe sa cher bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis bar yog par byas te brgyan du byas so//
sangs rgyas la mchod par gzhol ba'i sams kyis lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin rab du bkye bas bar snang brgyan byas so// sangs rgyas las thos par mos pa'i sems kyis gser gyi dra ba
grangs med pa las dril bu sna tshogs kyi drab 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas yog par byas te bar snang brgyan pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa la yon gyi gnas dam pa yin par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis bla re
grangasamed pa las rin po che thams cad kyi sa mo ro'i smin lding zhing 'phrul ba'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan pa byas so// sangs rgyas la dge bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi

gzhal med khang grangs med par lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba phyung bas bar snang brgyan pa byas so// sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon par rtogs pa'i sems kyis
lA rdzas kyi na bza' kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprin dang na bza' mtshungs pa med pa'i sngon gyi char 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snyang brgyan pa byas so// sangs rgyas la mos pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyis

lha rdzas kyi ngod pan grangs med pa'i sprin las cod pan gyi pachen po 'khor zhing 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan pa byas so/ sangs rgyas la yid bde ba skyes pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po

che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i sprin las 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan pa byas so// lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong grangasu med pa yang lha rdzas kyi me tog
kha dog tha dad pa grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ me tog zad meshes pa'i mdzod rab tu bskye nas 1 bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mos pa'i spos dri zhim po red cing sangs rgyas la dud par
gnas pas/ lha rdzas kyi zlos dang bdug pa kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na grogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma
kha dog snatshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// dga' ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang zhing ren po che'i gdugs kha dog sna
tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'gebs so/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la mos pa'i de mas rnam par 'phel bas gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs
med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i lam gos kyis yog par byas so// de bzhin gshebadas pa la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan rin po che
sna tshogs kyi kha dog can lag na thogs shing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhum ring du 'dong ngo// sangs rgyas la dga' ba mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang byang
phrul kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba grangs med pa lagan thogs/
te bcom ldan 'dasala mngon par gtor to// mtshungs pa med pa'i ngaga' ba rnam par 'phel bas lha rdzas kyi ba dan rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas 'dzin to// lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa yang zhu ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bag yod pa tshad med pa'i sems kyis/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang
@#// dkrol ba kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lagan thogs te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs phyung nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
ya khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa'i rnams kyang/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa khams gsum las rnam par 'das pa/ dmigs pa'i chos las byung ba//
tsa rjen pa'i dri med pa/ chags pa med pa'i sems tshim par byed pa/ chos kyi tshul zab mos mngon par grub pa/ blo tshad med par yangs pa las byung ba/ dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par sel ba/

dge ba'i rtsa ba bsamagyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'phrul ba grangs med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa// sangs rgyas mchod pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba/ mngon par 'du bya bamed pa'i
chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab pas/ chos kyi dbyangs thams cad kun nas yog par byas so// lha rdzas sa 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i me tog gi bla re sna tshogs kyis chos kyi dbyings kun nas
khebs par byas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa mos pas rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa'i na bza' snatshogs mngon par dgab pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan ba byas

so[;]chags pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems kyis/ lha rdzas las 'das pas mi skye ba'i tshogs las byung ba'i dril bu tshom bur bcad pa'i dra bas chos kyi dbyings brgyan
pa byas so// chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sgos thams cad kyi mchog gis bdug pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs//
pa bzhugs pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan du bting ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyengs brgyan pa byas so//

sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rang bzhin 'gag pa med pa'i sems kyis/ lha rdzas las 'das ba'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa byas so//

rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis bsam patshim pas/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyus kyi pho brang brgyan pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa byas so// mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba blang ba med pa las byung bas/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis chos kun nas yog pa'i rgyanagyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa byas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spros thams cad kyi
mchog gi skyen gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang/ me tog kha dog mtha' yas pasna tshogs kyi spren dang/ na bza'i kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi smin dang/ can

dan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'pho ba thams cad kyi sprin dang/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang/ gasmos dang brtag pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu
ldang ba'i sin dang/ 'phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
khrag theg brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i spren dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang/ de bzhin gshegs

ya'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa las byung ba sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang bus med pa las rgyu bas/ 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang/
tshig rnam par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas/ chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa/ ma bud pa dang mi 'jigs pa'i yid
dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngoms me shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa/ tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod las byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams
rgyu rgyas par byed la byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do// lha'i ri//
gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

[d/ ]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu/
'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang/ sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cadza
rgyas par mdzad ma// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan pa 'a mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba/ tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das
pa byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par 'os par bub/ sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshes par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par
gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i lus kyi rjes su bdal ba/ sku'i byin gyi nubs pa las mtshams med pa/ yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa 'byung ba bzhes pa/ 'das pa dang 2 ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba de sangs rgyas thams
@#// cad kyi rigs su byung pa khams dang mos pa bgrang bu med pa thams cad sbyor bar mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la 'jug
par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa// chos kyi so nagyis nam mkha'i khamasaThams cad du yog par mdzad pa// chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma
lus par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi brlabakyis rlob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud
kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/ ye shes kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs snang ba gzigs pa/ dag ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag
par gzigs pa/ sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du kun tu bzang po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba/ 'gro ba dang zhing thams cad du khyab
pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul
pa me mda' bar byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi
00 khams mtha' dang dbus med par khyab par mdzad pa// byang chub kyi sems kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can la rim gror mdzad pa/ ji ltar b.res pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa//
sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzad pa/ mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ gzugs kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byan gyis rlob pa/
'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa 1 sngod pa tha dad pa las byung pa/ 2 de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsubasgribs pa med pa mngon par sangs rgyas pa/
thugs la chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ma 'dresang/ ya shas thams cad la rnam par sbyod pa 1 don dang/ tshig dang/ yi ge tha dad pa yang dag par ston pa/ yo
shes rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ yon tan gyi mchog yashes kyi snying pos byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad du ston
gyi smon lam zad pa mi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyingasakyi rang bzhin la gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ma nyams pa brnyes pa/ bdag gi dang yongs su gzung ba med pas gnas pa mi mnga'
ba 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad 'byung zhing/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mishes pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa/ 'jig rten thams
bya@#// cad kyi mi shes pa chen po yongs su bsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa 'jig rten thams cad ye shes khyad par du 'phags
a pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'gro ba thamasaud nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su mi zad pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes pa thugs su chud pas dad par bya bar 'os pa/ yang dag par

tsa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhol ba'i byams pa chen po las byung ba/ thugs rje chen po yang dag par ston pas spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du med pa'i chos dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs
bsam gyis gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung dang dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa ka sems than gyi bsam pa ji lta babazhin du yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang da
ltar byung ba'i mtha' dmigs pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu dag cing bsam gyisam khyab pas sems can dag par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lung bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sangs
rgyas la rogs su dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshags pa'i rgyud du byung ba/ 'jig rten thams cad du 'khor lo phyir mi ldog par 'khor ba da 'jig rtenathams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad
la 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang chos kyi dbyingasathams cad kyi mthas klas pa la ma gnas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'a bsod
[d/ ]nams kyis rnam par dag pa/ 'khor ba la mi bzhugs par 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gyur pa/ btsal ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin ye shes kyi zla ba/
de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rjes su bzhud pa sgra ma lta bu'i ya shas kyis byin gyis rlob pa/ mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rnam par ston pa/ rmi lam ltabur rjes su dran pa/ sngal pa dang

mnyam par byung ba sems kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'jig rten snatshogs thams cad byin gyis rlob pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'i tshul dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi skye mched rnam pa'i phye ba yang
dag par ston pa/ sems can gyi dbang po dang 'thun par sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la sems can grangs med pa'i sems yang dag par gnas pa/ 'jig
rten thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ rnam par bstan pa'i rang bzhin du chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi rgyud mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid
ba cig tu gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid snang ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing 'grob thams cad gdon par brtson pa 2 sangs rgyas kyi spyod
yul bla na med pa yang dag par ston pa/ 'jig rten dang zhing thams cad yongs su skyob pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan magazung bar 'jig rten du mngon par byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan
de ma thams cad rnam par bsal ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang dmigs par 'byor par gyur pa/'khrug pa med pa/ khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgya theg pa chen
pos zhal yongs su rgyas pa/ chos thams cad kyi don grub pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par phye ba/ nyams pa med pa'i 'phrin las rnam par smin pas rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi
'byung gnas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su mi rtog pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas
gsal bar gyur pa// phyogs bcu 'byam kas pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa blta bas mi ngomasu shing gtang mi bra ba/ yon
tan chen po dang/ ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba/ dbang po mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyas par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin lasi tu sgrub pa mi nub ceng 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa// byang chub
sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa/ bsam pa yangs pa' bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal thams cad kyis rab tu 'bar ba/ de bzhin/
[z/ ]gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par ston pa/ sgrib pa'i chos thams cad du ma lhung ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi don gyis dag pa/ yon tan
gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can yon tanagyi 'od zer mnga' ba'i nyi mar gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi steng du shar ba/ gzi brjid thams cad kyi dwa pa mngon par skyes pa/
'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags
pa med pa mnga' ba/ phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang 'thun par ston pa'i ye shes kyi phyag mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa yo
shes kyi sman pa sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa// 'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du+i na tu rnam par dag pas rjes su 'brang ba dang/ 'gro ba dang zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du
phyir mi ldog pa ye shes kyi spyan phubs rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi le lags pa yang dag par ston pa/ 'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa/
'dul ba snatshogs du ma la 'jug pa/ dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par sbyod pa las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang mya
[za/ ]@#// ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa/ bsam pa dang las dang rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa'i sten pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ji lta ba bzhin
du sems can gyis chos shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i yashes mda' ba/ dga' ba chen po dang
lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang po dga' bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dad pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung po/ sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa/
sems can gyi las je ltab bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pa/ 'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa// sangs rgyas skye bas dge ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa/
sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa chen po stobs pa mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi lta ba thams cad la mi gnas pa/ yashes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa/ rab tu bzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul
gyi spyod yul thugs su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis ma non pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas 'byam klas
pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ las kyis snatshogs/
su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba/ ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten/
thams cad kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba me shigs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa/ snang ba dri ma med cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyis
jitsam du mngon sum du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba 1 grogs sngon du 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnam par
dag par mdzad ma/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba nyams pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung bas dgapar mdzad pa/ las bsags pa'i
tshul gyis yongs su byung ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'jom par byung ba/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na 'od shin tu dang bar snang
ba ye shes kyi dbyings rgyags pa med pa'i snying po'i nyi ma sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs kyi ye shesakyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa/ bsam pa dang yang dag par rtog pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ phyir rgol ba shin tu bcom pa/ yon gyi
gnas dam pa mchog tu gyur ma/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yon tan tshad med par 'gyur ba// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du
tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa/ zad meshes pa'i shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la rag las par yid ches nga sa/ tshad med pa'i
bsod nams dang yon dag par mdzad pa/ ya shes kyi tshul gyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o// zhes rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa rnam pa de lta bur yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas la yang dag par lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs las 'bab pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mcho'i gang na mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i

ye shes kyi nam mkha'i rjes su phyin par rjes su 'gro ba/ rnam pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bar shes pa/ rnam pa da lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i

sgos lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus kyi sku chen
bo 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par bstan par rjes su sems pa/ de dag gis

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa 'byung ba/ grangs med par rnam par dag pa/ grangs med par shin tu snang ba/ grangs med par/
bltar yod pa/ grangs med pa'i sems can gyi dga' ba skyed pa/ krangs med pa'i spro ba skyed pa/ grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dun pa/ rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ grangs med pa'i lcag pa'i/
bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba/ grangs med pa'i dbang po sam par byed pa/ grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thob par byed pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// 'od kyi 'khor lo bya ba khrug
brig brgya stong bsam byas mi khyab pa'i ng de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing 'byung pa/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa/mdog bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'od

bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang sems can rnam par dag pas dri zhim por rab du byung ba/ tshigs su bcad

pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsamagyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su byung ba rgyan bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par ston pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab par yon tan mi zad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba zad mi shes pa las byung ba/ sangs rgyas/
[z]/ @#// skye ba brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa// ye shes kyi sgo la rab tu gzhog pa/ don yangs pa shin tu ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sAl pa brjod du med pa'i tshul yang dag par ston/
la pa sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi klus pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ba// 'gro ba/
thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyod pa las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis

mi khyab pas bsten pa'i dpal yod pa/ rin po cha'i 'od 'phro ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa ltar 'byung ba mthong bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyan smon las chen po las
byung nga 'i dag ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa dang/ sngon gyi bag yod pa las yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i
sems chags pa med pa'i dag bu'i rtsa ba las byung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byam klas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la bsngoms nan tshad/
med pa rab tu dgod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul zil gyis non pa med pa la rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can gzud par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa3
bka' bzhin byed pa thams cad sangs rgyas zhing kun nas 'jus pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyim gyisabarlabs dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i 'khor du ji lta ji ltar sang sa rgyas kyi zhing 'khyam klas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa grangs med pa dag na/ sems ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang/ soms dad pa'i rnams
rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang/ sems rnam par 'phel ba'i rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang soms rnam par dag pa'i rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang sems yongs su smin pa'i rnam 'dul bar bya ba/

dang chos zab mo khong du chud par bya ba dang/ shes snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/de mas tshad med pa'i rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las

lu'am ldog par bya ba dang/ chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba'i bya ba dang/ yang dag pa'i mthus mi skrag par bya ba dang/ de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang/ pha rol tu khyen pa'i rnams kyang 'ab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang/

'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang/ dmigs pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang kun tu bzang po'i tshul du med khar bya ba dang/ bdud kyi yul

las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba dang/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i
[zs]'u@#// smon lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'tshang bar byab dang ye shes bod du chud par bya ba tshad med pa rtogs par bya ba dang/ sa mtshams med pa'i bsod

klu nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su bsgrub par bya ba dang/ shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang/ the tshom med pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par

bya ba dang 8 thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten pa so ge ra 'thob par bya ba dang/ chog mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bu ba dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang/

dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun tu khyab pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chan pos byin gyis brlabs

kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par bstan to//de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du 2 sangs rgyas kyi bag nyid che ba brjod pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i yashes kyi

snying po rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par snang ba// thams cad du bzhud pa'i da bzhin gshegs pa'i skus rnam
par 'phrul ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pa/ dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i

[gshegs stabs phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi dbang phyug parnyes pas chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang ldan pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas shin du sbyangs/

pa mnga' ba/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis snying po shAn tu sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dpes par
mi 'gyur ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba 2 mtshan thams cad kyi lo mashin tu 'phags pa'i sku can/stobs bcu'i rgyal mtshan gyi stobs chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa mi zad pa thams cad du blta bas mi ngoms

pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa'i dbyangs kyis ye shes kyi nga ror gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pas 'gro ba thams cad la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa/ yon tan

thams cad kyi rgyal po chos thams cad kyi srid la mnga' ba'i phyir dus gsum snang bar byed pa'i gsung anga' bas/ byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyan sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las yang dag par byung ba'i byin gyis

brlabs so// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis tshul 'di lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/rimagre dang/ rgyun kun tu bgam pa byas te/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa
dang lhan cig tu zhe sa can rim gro dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/
bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po rab
dga' ldan gyis spyan drangs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam pa 'di lta bu 'ang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid cheb 'gro ba thams cad la mdzes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mos pa dga' ldan res kyi
lha'i bu thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis mi ngoms par rim gror bya zhing/ tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas la dmigs par brtson pa bskyed pa/tshad med pa'i sems
rgya na sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mi ljang pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyurab dad pa dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis bsags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta ba dang mchod pas skyo bar
mi 'gyur ba 2 lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bsdus pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang smon lam dang/ sems bskyed pa las byung bas/ khang pa rin po che thams
cad kyis brgyan par gshegs so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de bzhin du/2jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhil dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang gshegs par snang ngo//

bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang parin po che'i rgyan las shin tu 'das par gnas so/ lha rdzas las 'das/
pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas log par gnas so/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'an po chu thams cad kyisnyen gyi char mngon par 'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad
kyi rgyan gyisI nagyis brgyan par gnas so/lha rdza sa las 'das pa'i gos thams cad kyi spen rab tu gtong bar gnas so// lha rdza sudas pa'i tsan dan thams cad kyi nachen po rab tu gtong bar gnas so/

lha rdzas las 'das pa'i dri thams cad kyi mchog dang bdug pa 'thul ba'i spren gyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che snyatshogs thams cad kyi snen rnam pa tha dad pa'i char rab tu

'bab par gnas so// lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog mang po'i sprin gyi tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sil snyan dang brdung pa bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
sgra rab tu 'byin par gnas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi dbyangs su grag pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang glu'i dbyangs kyang rab tu 'gyed par gnas par gyur te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin

du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gleng bzhi pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs par snang ngo// de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis
lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab bo zhes sgra brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la bar chad du ma 'gyur
@#/// ba dang/ ston gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang/ tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa dang/ mtha' yas par sems bskyed pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel ba dang/ shugs chen po
yang dag pa'i bskyed pa dang/ dga' ba chen po shAn tu bskyod pa dang/ dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pas dga' bar bya ba dang/chos la bar chad
med pa'i yid du 'gyur bar bya ba dang/ chos rnams ma nyams par bya ba'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra rgyun mi chad par gyur to// de nas lha'i rgyal
po rab dga' ldan gyis sa ngas rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas/ de'i cha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
bkashis dam pa gang zhig gis/ chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan ba tags pa/pho brang mchog tu rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/bkra shis dam
pa gang zhig gis/ ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan brtags pa/ kha dog gsar du rab gshegs pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig
gis kun tu mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ pad+mo'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ des na 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ yan
lag ren po cha zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ rin chen mdzod du rab ga gas pa/ des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/nga kra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// dpal rab rgol
ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btab sa pa/dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ yon tan thams
cad bston pa'i nye mar mtshan btags pa// me tog snying por rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra sa legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// yan lag 'od zer
mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa// shing gis brgyan pa'i rab gshegs pa// des ni 'dir ya nga bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis[） ]dmagon po tha tshon 'dzoms
pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan de// rin chen khang nga ra 'bagshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang nyegages// mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa//
spos kyi rtsa mor rab gshegs pa// des ni 'der yang bkra shis legs gyur ci// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba// no'abus brgyan par rab
gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rang dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod de[）]
gtubya// glakhe dbyangs su tshigs su bcad pas rgyal ba gshegs pa mngon par bstod pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang lha'i rgyal po rang dga' ldan rnams sangs rgyas kyi
byin gyis brlabs kyis/ gla'i dbyas su tshigs su bcad cing ston gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rjod pa byed cing/ rgyal bgshegs pa la yang mngon par bstod par gyur to//
de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku dang 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rigs gcig tu

ba gyur pas rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thugs su chud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med par khyab pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi spyan dang chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'khrul

dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pasgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang/ dus bzhin du byung ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas
lhags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus yang dag par spyod pa gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi mthu byung bas//
rin po tshathams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs nas gdan btang ba la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang

bzhugs par gyur te/ ji kar bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshags pa dang byon pa'i tsha/ sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang mchod pa byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa de dag thams
chad pas de bzhin gnyags pa gdan de la bzhugs pa'i tsha/ grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa'i rnam par lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ sos dad/ byug pa dang/ phyem ldang/
na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang/ rin po che dang/ rol mo brdung ba dang/ dkrol ba dang/ glu dang/ bstod pa dang/zhe sa dang/ rim gro dang/ dad pa dang/
dga' ba dang thal mo sbyar ba dang/lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyun dang/ lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i bstod pa dang/ lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs
med pa'i smin gyi char 'bab pa dang lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa 'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de bsgreng ba dang/ lha N+NasA las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyal mtshan la
ba dan spyas pa dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa grangs med par sbyar ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i yo byad kyi tshul dang/ bsam pa rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bas sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dad mdzes
@# 'apa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dri thams cad dang/ phyogs brgyan pa'i spos kyi sen chen po dang 2 rim gro'i rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing yid du 'ong bas gangs rgyas
la mchod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rim gro la brtson pas de bzhin gshegs pa gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ grangs med pa'i rgyud du ma chod pa byas so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
ra thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang mchod pa byas par gyur to// gin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sas rgyas phal po cha zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan du bzhud pa dang//
gshegs pa dang/ bzhugs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo bam bo sum cu gcig pa/ de nas sangs rgyas

kyi mthus phyogs bcu kun nas byang chub sems dpa' bsu mngon par lhags te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba da kyi ya/

rol nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste 1 byang chub sems dang 'a de dag re ra zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul in tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig tu phyin to/ byang
chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dog ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dam pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang/

shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang 2 chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag go/

byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rin po che'i snying po dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang/ dngul gyi

snying po dang/ gser gyi snying po dpa/ nor bu'i snying bo dang/ rdo rje'i snying po dang/ pad+ma'i snying po dang/utawa'i sAng po dang/ tsan dan gyi snying po dang/ smos kyi sAng po zhes bya ba dag go/ byang
chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba ngag zhal ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/'di ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang/g.yo ba med pa'i dpal
dang bcings pa med pa'i dpal dang sbyong pa'i dpal dang/ 'od zer gyi dpal dang/ mtha' las rgal ba'i dpal dang/ mchog gi dpal dang/ dbang phyug gi dpal dang/ tshangs pa'i
dpal dang/ in tu bsags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ de nas myang rlabasams dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs bcu rgyas par byas te/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brtan

nas seng ge 'i khri rin po cha'i snying po can nor bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul te/gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa'i lus dang/ 'od zer bye ba khrag breg brgya stong gus med pa gtong ba dang/
@#// dri ma med pa'i 'od gtong ba dang/ tshad med pa'i 'od rab tu skyed pa dang/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i rin po che yang rtag par 'dzin pa'i gzugs dang 1 byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa kha nam

tho ba med pa las byung ba'i smon lam dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba dang/ blta na don yod par sems can gdul ba dang/ rnam par dag pa'i chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su

rgyu/ston pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i byang chub sems pa'i rtsa gcig tu smon lam btab pa'i spyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// byang chub sems dang 'a de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste//

chags pa med par spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ 'di lta ga gnas pa med pa 'i lus dang/ 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa'i lus kyis kun tu 'gro ba'iya shes kyi lus kyi byin gyis brlabs
dang 'di lta ste 2 mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo 'byam klas pa tshad med par gyur pa dang/
'ang lta ste chos la mi 'jigs par mkhas pa'i snang ba mtha' yas pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mi zad pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul bshad pa dang/ 'di lta ste/
tho gzus thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa'i yashes kyi phung po rab tu rgyas pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par gyur pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa dang/ 'di lta ste/

nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par a shes kyi spyod yul yongs su gnas pa dang/ mtshams med cing mtha' nas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa rab tu thob par gyur pa dbag go/ ji ltar gling bzhi
pa 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus par gyur pa de bzhin du 2 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dog tu yang byang chub sems dpa' ming
'di skad ces bya ba dag 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di skad ces bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de skad ces bya ba dag gi zhal nga na tshangs par spyad pa sha stag 'ongs par gyur to// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pus mo'i lha ngaganyis nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong byung ste/ phyogs su thams cad sbyang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thamasu chud bstan to// de
nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi pa tham sa cad dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yod pa mthong bar gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji snyed kyis phyogs bcur chos M kyi dbyings kyis kus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dgan/ de bzhin ba/shegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa mthod bar
gyur pa de dag thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i glob das su gyur
@#[） ]/pa dag ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mos rnam par 'phrul ba la mos pa sha stag go/ chos kyi dbyings kyi lus tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su song ba sha stag
go gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i rjes su song bas rab tu zhugs pa sha stag go/ sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa blta ba la rjes su gzhol ba sha stagage/ chags pa med
[# ]pa'i sems skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par byed pa sha stag go/ bsam pa rin po rdul dang bral ba dang ldan pa sha stag go/ brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang 'grogs pa dang ldan
pa sha stag go/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs grangs med pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ yang dag par spyod pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa ga stag go/ bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i
byang chub kyi dran pa rnam par dag pa la gnas pa sha stag go/ blo dang sems skad cig thams cad kyis cher 'phags pa rab tu thob pa sha stag go/ chung ngur zhugs hing cher gyur pa'i spyod pa la dbang

ba sha stag go dacher gyur pa la zhugs shing chung ngur 'jug pa'i rjes su chud nas ya shes kyi spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go/ de lta bu'i gnas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rang bzhin zlos su rtogs
pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ rin po chu sna tshogs ltar grub pa'i lus dang/ de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa'i spyod

yul thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ ye shes chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba dang/ ye shes kyi stobs rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mthu'i mchog thob pa dang rdo rje gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul 2ba tu thob pa dang//

sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gangs med pa'i rnams yongs su smin par gdul ba la rmongs pa med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad du 'gro ba gdon mi za ba'i mchog thob pa dang ste

bgrang ba thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang/ bgrang ba mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad shin tu bslabs pa dang/ bgrang ba'i shes pa thams cad kyi mthar thug cing chos rnam par dgod pa la sa khas pa
dang 'di dag ngang gzhan yang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du me da pa dang/ yon tan bsregs pa rnam par dag pa mi zad pas 1 byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum kyi tan tshad
med la dang ldan pa sha stag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas 'byam kas pa thar sa rud blta ba'i phyesnga kun nas 'dus par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a
rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skus so/ de yang dag sangs rgyas skye ba med// rgyal ba
mya ngan mi 'da' ste/[）]rgyu mthun pa yi bsnyen lam gyis/des ni rnam par 'phrul ba snang/ 'di dug chos ni pasam mi khyab// 'di dag sems kyi spyod yul min/ gang ges ye shes la rol phyin//
@#// des ni sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong// lus 'di yang dag sangs rgyas min// sgra yang de bzhin gshegs pa min// lus dang sgra las gzhan n yang// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mi

sgra mthong 11sngon gyi las rnams ma gtogs par// rang byung rnams kyi spyod yul gyi// mchog gi tshul rnams shes pani// blo zhan rnams kyis mi nus so// yang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di// gang dag ma/

mkhaM kyang ma 'ongs te// gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag rang byung sku yono// tshad med glin tu 'dren pa rnams// chos 'di rab tu bshad mdzad kyang// chos la gnas pa gang yang med// zhing rnams
zla bye bkun n snang// mkhyen pas mtha' dang dbus med de// chos kun thugs su chud cing rtogs// chos kyi dbyings la rab zhugs nas// rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa mdzad// chos rnams kun la chags pa med
'gro la de nibasgribs mi mnga'// tshad med pa yi yon tan gyis// zhing rnams kun n rab tu snang// gang zhig yashes 'di dag dang// ye shes thams cad rtogs 'dod pas//bsam pa rnam par sbyang byas te//
byang chub spyod pa spyad par bya// drang srong chen po'i byin gyis brlabs// 'di 'dra gang gis mthong gyur cing// de ni the tshom mi byed na// dge bshes mchog la bsten pa yin// de nas byad
chub sems dpa' dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// shin tu zab ste brjod du med//
brjod du yod kyang 'da' bar dka'// tshig gi lam las natu 'das// nam mkha' la ni rgyal ba snang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// mi yi seng ge mthong bar 'gyur// yang dag sangs
rgyas rtog med kyang// rgyal ba rnam par rtog par snang// 'jig rten mgon pos chos nyid dngos// zab mo 'di dag yang dag bstan// gang zag mtshungs pa med pa yi// des ni sku 'di 'ab tu 'byung//
thams cad gzigs kyi spyod yul gyi// ye shes chen po 'di 'dra ste// 'di la gang zhig rtogs 'dod pas// des ni rgyal ba mngon du byas// yid kyi dbang po rnam dag pas// de bzhin gshegs pa
bsnyen bkur zhing// 'di yi tshul las 'da' byed// nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o// ma zad pa yi bsod nams dang// byang chub sems kyis brtan pa'i rnams/ 'theTom rnam par bzlog byas te//
de dag la ni skyo med ltos// rgyal sras gang gis chos dbyings kyi/ 2 tu bstan pa'i mthar phyin pa// des ni kun gzigs rnam 'phrul ba// 'di dag shananu 'da' bar bya// dad pa tshos 'di'i rtsa ba
zhes chos kyi phung pos bshad mdzad kyis// dad pa shin tu cher skyed la// byang chub spyod pa spyad par gyis// sangs rgyas bste stangagang byed cing// de bzhin gshegs la drin gzo ba// yang
dag sangs rgyas dpal ldan las// de dag rgyang mar mi gnas so// bdag nyid che ba 'di lta bu/ gang gis thos mthong mkhas pa'i rnams// spyod yul thob pa gyis 'gyur ba'i/ smon
lam su zhig sbyong ma byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs b.ru'i rnam par bltas nas/
de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// mig gis gzugs rnams mthong gyur pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas byin rlabs kyis// dag pa'i sems ldan rgyal pa mthong//
ji ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// rgya mtsho la ni 'jug par byed// de bzhin ye shes stobs ldan pas/ bsam du med pa'i sangs rgyas mthong// ji ltar sa bon rnam par dag/ zhing bzang la ni skye
[>'gyur ba// de bzhin sems bsam rnam dag la// sangs rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur// ji ltar nor gyi phung po yis// dbul ba thams cad sbyongs byed pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyis//
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam dag 'gyur// ji ltar dug du gyur pa la// nad med dug sman rgyal bar byed// de bzhin nyon mongs rnam dag la// rnam dag tshulan spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang
bsngags pa'i// dge ba'i bshes la brten byas na// de yi mthus ni sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid 'di dag thos par 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sbyin pa mchog rnams byin/
byas kyang// 'di a tshul la rab spyod pa'i// grangs dang char yang mi 'gro'o// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris// brjod pas yang dag sangs rgyas rnams//
ka rgyal ba shes par mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ gnas nas g.yo ba mi mnga' ba'i// sku na kun tu rnam rgyu zhing// chos kyi dbyings na ston pa mdzad// ji ltar nam
mkha'i khams 'di ni// nam yang rang bzhin mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang// ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal
mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mi yi 'jig rten 'di kun dang// lha yi gnas rnams
thams cad dang// 'gro ba ma lus kun na yang// mi yi gtso bo shin tu snang// ji ltar sems dngos gcig pu las// rnam pa tha dad sems brjod pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas sku gcig las/
ngas rgyas thams cad brjod pa yin// byang chub gnyis su med par brjod// byang chub de yang mtshan nyid med// mtshan gyis mngon par rnam bres pa'i/ sku rnams gnyis su snang bar 'gyur 3/
mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings la zhugs// sgyu ma'i sa yang rab tu bstan// de phyir sangs rgyas de dag gi/ spyod yul blta ba zud pa med// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// mgon po thams
cad dus gsum du// ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu snang// 'di 'dra' lus su bdag gyur ces/ sangs rgyas rtog par ma mdzad do// skyon la rnam rtog mi
lhazhi/ @#// mnga' yang// byin gyis brlabs ni ston par mdzad// dbyer med pa e dbyings la yang// chos kyi dbyings ni yang dag nas// 'jig rten khams nitshadamed par// thub pas
rnam par rtog pa ldan// sku ni sprul pa ma yin te// sbrul chen pa yang sku ma yin// sbrul pa med pa'i chos 'di yis// sprul pa rnams ni rab tu bstan// yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pa/ chos kyi
dbyings la hin tu rten// mtha' dang dbus med rab tu zab// tsheg gi lam gyis bzla bar dka'// kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams la// de bzhin gshegs pa don nges mkhyen// zhing rnams kun la
chags mi mnga'// chos kyi dbyis pa rnam par spyod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i rnam par
bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun mkhyen ye sa ma chags pa/ de la zhugs par gang gyur pa// de yi sems ni tshad mi zin// byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod// de bzhin
rgyu gshogs pa mang po rnams// yul dang yul du de dag snang// chos rnams phyogs gcig gang la yang// yang dag sangs rgyas gnas pa med//'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis// byin gyis brlabs ni
gang bstan pa// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ ]'di yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'// dus gsum rnams ni ji snyed pa'i// sems can rnams kyi mthar thug pa// bgrang ba'i mthar ni phyin par
nus/ 'dren pa la ni mthar thug med//de dag sku ni gcig tu snang//sku gnyis de dag bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang/ sku la gnyis su gyur pa med//ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa/
tshang med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams// chu yi snod du snang gyur kyang/zla ba gnyis su gyur pa med//de bzhin chags medamkhyen ldan rnams//chags med rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/zhing rnams kun na 'bu
tu snang//sangs rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med/ 'di la gcig kyang yodam yin// sku ni gnyis sam gsum du me da/ ji ltar sems can bsam pa bzhin 3/tshad med pa ni rab tu snang// skun 'a
pa ma yin te//ma 'ongs pa yang sku ma yin// skyes dang byang chub mya ngan 'das// skad cig gis ni rab tu snang// ji ltar skya mir gyur pa'i gzugs 1/skyes pa ma yin 'ongs pa min// de ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// skye ba med par shin tu bstan// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur
rnam par bltas te de'i tsha tshags su bcad pa 'di dag skyas so// yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pas/ tshad du sku yang rnam par bstan/ ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams/ de bzhin/
'dren pa rab tu mthong// sku la phyogs ni med par brjod/ sangs rgyas yul ni ma lus khyab//bar snang nam mkha' ji lta bar/ de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// der ni sems kyang
'pho ba med//sems la skye ba yod pa'i ng min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni// skye ba med la rab tu gnas/// ji ltar rab rab ldan pa'i mig/ nang na'ang med cing
phyi na'ang med// de bzhin 'jig rten sangs rgyas dag/ nang na'ang me bzhugs phyin 'ang min// 'jig rten kun gyi don gyi phyir// rkang gnyis kyi ni mchog byung ste// 'jig rten du nem byung yang
'jig rten dag tu skye bos mthong// sangs rgyas rnams la zhing me gnas// rgyal ba dag la nyin mtshan med// skad cig ma yin zla ba min// rgyal ba la ni lo ma gnas// 'jig rten dag na 'di skad brjod/
nyi acheg mo zhig tu// rang byung byang chub rgyal bas thob// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rjes mi 'brang// de la bskal pa yod ma yin// dus kyang ma lus med pa ste// dus gsum yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas
mgon po rnams ni mnga' ba'i 'gyur// ji ltar nyema'i dkyil 'khor ni// nams kyang mtshan dang mi gnas te// nyin mtshan zhes kyang rab tu brjod// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid do// bskal pa//
gcig dang dus gsum du 1/'dren pa bzhugs pa ma yin te// dus gsum zhes kyang rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ltos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdul
dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te[” ]de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yang dag sangs rgyas sku gcig ste///
'dren pa thams cad don gcig kyang// tshad med gzhan dang gzhan dag tu 'u/ phyogs bcu kun na rab tu snang// gang gis ma lus thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab pa// sems
can gco bo thub pa yi// spyod yul rnams ni ci 'dra ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ nang ga skus kyang snang ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs// phyi rol skus kyang mi
snang ngo// dus mang kun tu las rnams kyis// ji ltar las rnams bsags pa bzhin// de bzhin so sor phye ba'i skyes/ rigs su byung ba rab tu bstan/ rgyal ba'i chos nyid ma gtogs par//
sangs rgyas sku ni 'di 'dra ba// grangs su bgrang bar mi nus te// bsams pas lta yang shes mi nus// ji ltar bdag cag sems kyi las// bsam gyis mi khyab mi 'byung ba// de bzhin sangs
rgyas bsam mi khyab// sems kyi 'phrin las mi mnga' 'o// ji ltar zhing rnams bsam yas pa// sa la rnam par dag pas mdzes// de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// 'gro ba dgan mdzes
par snang// ji ltar las rnams 'jug pa ni// rkyen gyis rab tu 'byung 'gyur ba// de bzhin rgyu rnams 'thun pa las// sangs rgyas shin tu mgrong bar 'gyur/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni// ji
ltar yid bsams rdzogs byed pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang// rtag tu smon lam rdzogs par sgrub// mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir// 'jig rten mgon po 'dren par gyur//
de yi smon lam de dag gis/// phyogs bcu 'di dag rgyal bas gang// nga yi snyan lam du dam bda'/ bya mgar/ de nas byang chub sems dang la dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ye shes dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas te/ 'jig rten chos rnams rnam par sbyong// 'jig rten chos
rnams rnam sbyangs nas//sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod//de ste sems can mnyam sangs rgyus// sems can la las bsam byas na rgyal ba de dag thams cad mthong// sangs rgyas la
ni gshegs pa med// sangs rgyas la ni dmigs byas nas//sems kyis sangs rgyus dmigs pas na/ sems bskyon pa dang rgyal mnyamapar 1/ de bzhin de dag rgyal pa mthong// dkar pa'i chos kyis
nyar brtan cing// gang gis grags pa rnam sbyangs pa// de dag thams cad sems bskyed la// shes rab ldan pa rab tu bzhugs// dmigs pa dag dang byin gyis brlabs/ mi yi gtso bo ston pa mdzad//
de phyir dmag gas pa kun tu yang// sangs rgyas rgyal ba gshegs par brjod/'jig rten khams rnams 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas sku rnams bdag gi med/sems la bdag gi med pa bstan// byang chub

tshe rtogs la bdag gi med// mi yi se ge'i chos nyid dang//dpa' ba'i stobs la rab tu gnas//lus dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ste kasnang ba'i sems dang mnyam pa'i sku// ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin sku/ ji bzhin/
03/ skur yang rgyal ba ste//sku yi rang bzhin shes pa ni// sangs rgyas chags pa med ces bya// sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa ste 1/chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs//sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub
rnams/ gang la'ang dmags pa med pa yin//sangs rgyas la gshegs pa med//sangs rgyas gang na'ang mi bzhugs te/ yang dag sangs rgyas log pa med// de bzhin gshegag la len ma mnga'/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis//sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs

rgyas thams cad kun tu khyab//zhing gcig lan ma gnas te// thams cad du na sangs rgyas gshegs//zhing rnams kun tu rab tu snang//sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad du/ byin gyis brlabs dag rab tu 'byung// 'tshang rgya

chos kyi 'khor lo dang//bsam pa bzhin du mya ngan 'da'//sangs rgyas la ni su zhig sems//ci phyir sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab//yang dag sangs rgyas su yis mthong// rgyal ba sus kyang mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar chos

rnams chos nyid dang/ ji ltar sangs rgyas spyod yul du//gang dag chos rnams gcig tsam yang//de bzhin nyid la mi 'jug go/ 'di ni 'jig rten 'di rgyal zhes//'jig rten dag na rnam rtog yod//gang gis ngo bo nyid

shes na//'jig rten med de rgyal ba'ang med//'jig rten dad par byaba'i phyir/mgon po dag mngon sum ston/ de dag gamibalta ba 'di//shin tu dmigs par mi rung ngo// gang gis chags pa rnam bzlog cing 3/chags/
[s ]// pa med la dga' byed pa/chags pa thams cad rnam bzlog nas// chags med chos nyid rtogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhes brjod gang yin dang// gang gis rnam 'phrul snang 'gyur ba'i//

zla chos ni dus gsum thams cad du// rnam pa kun tu me rnyed do// gang gis chos nyid 'di shes shing//gang gis 'di bzhin yid ches na// thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa'i na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i myur du
'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ba// 'di dag thams cad tshig gis bstan// yang dag sangs rgyas tshig lam med// tshig ga lam gyis rab tu brjod// de nas byang chub sems

zla dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis rnam par 'phrul snang ba'i// sas rgyas
mthong ba med pa bas// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal phung bo blangs kyang bla// 'grob gang gis byang chub tu// sems ni nam yang ma bskyed pa// de dag gnas 'di thos gyur
na sangs rgyas byang sgrub 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis bsam pa gcig gis kyang// 'di la mos byed mkhas pa ni// mi yi mchog tu ma 'gyur zhes// des ni the tshom mi bya'o// de yi rnam par
'dzul ba na// bskal pa bye ba'i bar du dkon// su zhig 'di la mos byed pa// de dag bla na med par 'gyur// brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// skad cig skad cig bsnyen bkur ya nga// ba
0 'di yi tshul la mi gnas na// de dag bsnyen bkur byas ma yin// gang la sangs rgyas brjod gyur pa'i// chos 'di gang gis thos gyur pa// des ni mi bde kun gyis kyang// spyad pa rnams ni spang bar bya//
ji tsam chos kyi dbyings rnams dang// dus gsum gyi nimagon po// sangs rgyas rnams na rten pa yi// ye shes chen po gcig thos nas// phyi mtha'i bskal pa bye ba rnams// zhing rnams re
rer zed byas shing// 'di yi tshul ni brtson byed na// de la byang chub dkon pa med// sems can rnams kyi sngon mtha' yi// 'khor bar mi rnams gnas gyur kyang// des ni sangs rgyas rab byung ba/
chos nyid 'di ni shes ma gyur// chos rnams zhig par byas pa med// chos ni 'jigapar ma 'gyur te// kun tu snang las rnam 'phrul ba// 'jig rten de dag thams cad bstan// shin tu rgyas pa chen
bo'i mdosangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba lus/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su byung chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o/// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de'i// sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan byang chub

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyad
du/ 'das pa'i pha rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal bstan pa mthong ste// de dag kyang 'di la ste/ mtshan rdo rje'i
rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sha stag go/ phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba de ltar/ phyogs bcu nas kyi de bzhin te de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'ad skad ces kyang bka' ma to// rdo rje'i rgyal
mtshan de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so lags so//'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas

kyi zhing brgya stong phrag banu'i rdulain tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pag sug gis/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam dang/sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs

dang khyod kyi yashes rnam par dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'i bya ba dang/ spobs pa chags pa

med par bya ba dang/ ye shes kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i sar 'jug par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yangs pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang// dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa phun sum tshogs par byu ba

dang bsgribs pa med pa'i chos dkar po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyig la sgo kun nas 'jug par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya ba dang/ ston gyi mtha'i mur

0 thug pa'i yeshes dang dran pa rgyun mi chod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin du brlab par bya ba dang/chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa bstan par bya ba dang//

shes pa kun ga zung bar bya ba dang/ 'di lta ste// yongs su bsngo ba bcu yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzung bar bya ba dang/ 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu bstan par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma chod par bya ba dad smon lam chen po'i skabs dbyabar bya ba dang/ don shin tu bstan pa la 'jug pa bya ba dang/ chos

kyi dbyings yongs su shes par bya ba dang/ byang rgyab sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa la brten par bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyis/ kyi rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyis phyin
gyis pachubs pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis ban pa dang/ gzungs kyi snang ba la zhugs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgribs pa chod pa la zhugs pa dang/ chos kyi
dbyings snang ba'i chos nyid du bya ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dkar po yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba dang/ ye shes kyi spyod yul yangs ba la gnas pa dang/ bsgribs pa med pa'i chos snang
ba la gnas pas chos bstan ba 'di brjod pa dang bstan pa'i phyir skyobs par gyis shig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo Ta'i rgyal mtshan gyi

ya shes tshad med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do//spobs pa chags pa med pa dang tshigarab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// bsgribs pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do//
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gcig pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tshad med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// byang chub sems pa'i de de 'dzin bsam gyis
mi khyab pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nyams pa med par yongs su bsngo ba'i ya shis nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// chos thams cad kyi lhag

mthong mngon par bskyed pa la mkhas pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// chos thams cad bstan pa'i gnas rgyun mchod pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi dge ba'i
rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyi phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pas/ pung chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi spyi bo la phyug pa mdzad do// sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyalamtshan la reg ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de las rnam par langs te/ langs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam 'di lta ste/ 'grob thams cad khyab par byed pa// sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa 'dzin basam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dang// de la gnas
shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob bo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs
su bsko ba la slob par 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo bal slob bo//kye rgyal ba'i spus dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs

su bsngo ba gang la bsams te de skad du sbas pa de dag ni gang/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ yongs su bsngo ba'i grangs ni du zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bsdo ba bcu bo 'di dag ni 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/
da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/gsung ngo//gsung bar 'gyur ro//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rnams kyi 'du sheb 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su

skyob pa zhes bya pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po dang/ mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams

cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yodas su bsngo ba gsum pa dang/ thams cad du rjes susong ba zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dba' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa dang
00 @#// bsod nams kyi mdzod mi 'ad ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lta pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba//

k+kha byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsko ba bdun pa dang/ de bzhin

tshe gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba brgyad pa dang/ chags pa medacing rings ba dang bkro' ba med pa zhes bya ba 1 byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dgu pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa ga/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dpa' byung chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu po de dag ni 'das pa dad/ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so//gsung ngo// gsu' bar 'gyur ro/
zla kyi rgyal ba'i gra ga dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsko ba dang po sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su spyob pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kyi

rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i yarol tu phyin pa la rab tu sbyor ba 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par sbyong ba 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems
ba'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtsom pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par dpyod pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa 'am/ byams ba bsgom pa yang dag
par bskyed pa 'am snying rjes snying brtsebar byed pa 'am/ dga' ba la rab tu dga' bar byed pa 'am/ btang snyoms la shAn tu gnas pa byed kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la na tu bsams nas/

dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la rab tu sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa rnam par phye nas/'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun 'chad par 'gyur

ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par ldeg par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba thams cad la rnam pa dag pa'i mthar phyin par phan 'dogs

pa gang yin zhes sems bskyed do// de de ltar gaba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par bskyed pa na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/
bdag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ bag sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig/ 'jigs pa kun las
bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi lam du gyur cig/ shin tu bde ba dang ldan l]
pa 'thob pa'i bya ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cig/ rab rib med pa e shes snang ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ badrug sems can thams cad
kyi snang bar gyur cig/ ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad gyi sgron mar gyur cig/ shin tu dag pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams
'tsha cad kyi mar mor gyur cig/ chos kyi tshul la gzud pa'i phyir/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur cig/ bsgribs pa med pa'i khyashes kyi phung bo bskabs pa'i phyir/ bdag
sems can thams cad kyi yongs su 'dren par gyur cig ces/ de de ltar 'grob thams cad kyi don du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar shAn tu thug par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsko ste/ ji
ltar mdza' ba bsung pa'i phyir/ yongs su bsngo ba de ltar mi mdza' ba bsrung ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag tu bya ba'i

bsam pas mi mdza' ba ni gang yang med de/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par phyung ba ste/ de 'di snyam du byang chub re mas dpa' mi mdza' ba'i don byed
pa de dag thams cad ni bdagagi rgyud la dgod dgod ba yin no zhes te 1 de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi yul thams cad la zhe snang ba med pa'i mig gis blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te// sems can thams cad la dgaba'i chos yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir 'jugago/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ga thams cad
kyis gajug par bya bar mi nus so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang drin mi gzo ba dang 1 blo zhan pa dang/ sems 'khrugs pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ mun par gyur pa dang/ rang bzhin skyor ba dang/
rlom sems dang ldan pa dang/ sgrubs pa nyams pa dang/ sems dmus long lta bur gyur pa'i sems na byis pa thams cad kyis skyon can dumi nus so//'di lta ste// dpe lan lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba de ni

dmus long gi skyon gyis 'char ba las thogs par mi 'gyur ro//dri za'i grong khyer gyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro//gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i rdul gyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur 'o//

lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgragacan gyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro// du ba 'khrigs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro//
grib ma sna tshogs kyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro//dug gi ri'i skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro/ ]khams kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis thogs par ma 'gyur ro// dus yongs su 'gyur ba'i
skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa can yang dag par shes pa dang ldan pa/ sems kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid shanitu zab cing yangs pa
yid la yang dag bar rtog pa mi zhan pa yon tan sbyad pas ye shes kyi mthar gyur pa/chos la shin tu dad pa'i sems mngon par skyes pa/ chos kyi snang ba'i 'od kyis dang/
tu snang ba/ don thams cad mthong ba/ chos mngon par shes pa/ ya shes rig pa rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa// sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos spyod pa la rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams
cad kyis nyes par sems bskyed pa la 'khrul pa me dpa de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na/ gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi skyon gyis thogs par mi 'gyur ro// sems can m baspun
pa'i tshul gyis ldog par mi 'gyur ro//sems can gyi lta ba'i rtog pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gyi sems 'khrug pas ldog par mi 'gyur ro// sems can/
gyi sems kyi rgyud stor bas byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po bgos pa las ring bar mi 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab ba'i skyen lam dkrugs ma'i rig pa thams cad kyi
