'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig dang ye ge 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs
rgyas kyi sgra don yod par ye shes kyis rnam par rig pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams
wa cad las thos pa rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos can du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa
dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba las rnam par 'dus te/ bstan pa la gnas pa'i byab la mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog rnam par spel ba byed cing/
'phags pa mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing/ ye shes kyis spyod pa'i gang zag la mos
pa' gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta brjes su thob pa las byung bas thos pa don yod par gyuracig/ sems can thams cad bstan pa rab tu gzung ba dang
yo ngas su bsrung ba la zhugs pas/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ye shes kyi mkhas pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ soms can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gsal bar bya ba'i
snang ba rab tu thob pas/ chos thams cad thos pa shin du 'dzin ma la zhugs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i mdzod kyis dga' bar sbyong cang gtong ba shin tu byed ba
dang mchod sbyin n du byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa phun sumatshogs par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
bas(bya/ gachen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnam par
dag la mchog dam pa phul rab tu thob cing/ ci nas kyang mi 'jigs pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs
su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang 1 len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i
gang zag dang 2 song ba 'phongs pa dang bkren pa mang po tshad med pa/ byang chub saMms dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang 1 byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang/sems bskyed
tshu las skyes shing bstabs pa thams cad gtong bas shin tu re ba'i yid can de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas/ sbyong ba la rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs pa rnams la bzod par

ba gsol ba'i sems bskyed de/'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyed kyi drung dusong sta rem blo'i bya ba zhig na/ nga 'di ltar khyed 'dir phyin te na tu ngal bar gyur to/ zhes spyi bos btud de bzod pa
gsol bas slob thams cad bzod pa lnga byas/rim gror byas/ ngal ba bsnyes nas ci 'dod pa sbyin pa de ngag gis shin tu rim gror byed te/'di ltar nor bu'i shing rta 'dzam bu'i gling gi na chung

bas bzang mo rin po chas yongs su gang ba dang/ 'di lta ste gser gyi shing rta yul gyi na chung rinape shin tu rnam par dag pas yo ba ka khang ba dang 1 'di lta ste/ baiDUrma'i shing rta na chung ma'i 'khor

glu dang rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pas yongos su bkang ba dar na 'di lta ste/ dngulagyi shing rta shin tu mdzepa bud med gnyon/ lha'i bu mo lta bu s yongs su gang ba dang/ 'di lta ste rin po che bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i shing rta bud med cad shes rin po che rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas yongs su gang ba dang/ 'di lta ste 1 tsan dan gyi shing
rta byung chub sems dpas bzhon par 'os pa dang/ 'di lta ste kAgal gyi shing rta bud med bzang mo bzhin pazang ba/cha byang sdugagushAn tu brgyan pa/gathub sa mdzes pa/ blta na sdugamed mi mthun
pa med pas yongs su bkang ba dang/ 'di lta ste asma gar ba'i shing rta dbang bskur bas yongs su gang ba ngang/'di lta ste (bos dam pa'i shing rta bu dang bu mos yongs su bkang ba dang
'di lta ste/ rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i shing rta dang ga bshes gnyen dbyer mi phyed pas yongs su bkang ba dang/ de rnams la 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs med pa
rnam pa sna tshog slong mo pa thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong bas/ slong ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos po rab tu thob pas yid la bsam pa shin tu rdzogs nas/ slong ba
ma[jgj ]/de dag thams cad sbyin pa thamasad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ste shin tu[&]ma par byas shing bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas// dga' pha dang/ mgu ba dang darang

kyi nga dang/ yid bde ba skyes nga ra byas te/ dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yong su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyis mi khyab cing/ thogs pa med pa'i shing rta'i
'khor lo phyirayeldog pas 'gro pa dang ldan te/ theg pa chen po'i shing rta la bzhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing/ phyi ma'i
mtha'i bskal pa'i mar klag par phyir mi ldog pas chos kyi shing cang shesa'i zhon par gyur cig// sems can thams cad chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa'i ngam ams med cing/
thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la brtson pas chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sas rgyas kyi zhing
masacad du 'gro ba la brtson pas/ kun tu 'gro ba dri ma med pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyuracig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dga' thas mog shing yang dag par 'gro ba la
sgyu brtson pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i shing rta rjes su mthun pa la rab tu gnas par gyur go/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i lam bcu dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

mawa/ ting nge 'azhi thams cad la rab tu dga' ba 'a bde dang ldan zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i dzishing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba'i yu la na
gnas pa dang ldan pa dang skyes bu dam pa la brtan pa thob pas/ sngon byas pa'i bsod nams shin tu bsags pa dang/ ya ngu dug pa 'i smon lam la shin tu brtson pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par
spyad pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pas 'khor lo bzhi nga 'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs dang ye shes la
brtson pa sa/ phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings suchos kyi snang ba gtong g la bslabs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyan pa thob ste//
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang bad ba nga dag par ston pas/ bsod nams thams cad dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad
med pa dang/ chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shing rta la mkhas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dzungs ra 'i dri ma rab tu byung ste/ sbyin pa gtong bs 'byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig
gi mas can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbusamad pa ma lus par tshul khrims rnam par dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes rnam nga ra dag pa'i shing rtangang ldan nga ra gyu
ma shAkya// cig sems can thams cad sems 'khrug pamed par gnas pas 'grob thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrug pa med cing/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang/
ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'byung ba'ishing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yi shes kyashing rta dang ldan par gyur
ga sems can thams cad shin tu mgyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu byung ste/ bsam gtan kyi yaro tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyu dge/ sams cad thams cad
chos kyi dbyangs kyi shing rta la shin tushon zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul sprul pas rgyas par byed paphyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i yi shes kyi shing rtadang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
tshe/ thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jigs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nying kyi don du sman pa gtong ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rgyal po'angeshang rta la zhon par gyur cig/ bums can thamA
cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin gyi phyogs thams cad la rang rtu'ajug pa rmongs pa med pa'i phyirasmon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can
thams cad theg pa chen pomanor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig/ sams
wa can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam skyo ba med par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i share rta la
zhon par gyur cig ces// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas dang/ 'dun pa dang/ slong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang//
mos pa dang/ spro ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pas sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i thog rang la yon ba shin tu bsgrubs
pas ye shes dang sems kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/// shin tu rgyas pa chen po' mdo bam po sum cu
rtsa drug pa/// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' nan po glang po cang shes pa yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa/ lo drug cu lon pa/ mchag drug dang
ldan pa// kha dog pad+mo lta bu gdong rnam par dag pa/ dkar zhing drag med pa// gser gyi rgyal mtshan na/gsar gyi rgyun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas lus kun nas g.yog pa/
sna rin po che snatshogs kyi dra ba'i rgyan du bcug pa// gser ltar bltanamadzes pa// dang ga tshad stong gis khyon du ngal ba med par 'gro ba sbyin shing gtong ba 'am/ rta cang shes gom pa
mcha @#// zomadog bde bar 'dor zhing 'degs pa dang/ bya ltar mgyogs pa dang ldan pa/ ma lcang lor 'khril ba/ nam tsong dang rmag par ldan pa/ rmig pa 'i dbyibs
mtho zhing skyon med pa// gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba dang ldan pa// glo kun nas brgyan pa/ na po che sna tshogs kyi gdong
lce rgyan gyis rnam pa brgyanang/ bzhonan bde ba/ lus la byams pa/ shin tu mgyogs pa// phyogs bzhir yid ltar mgyogs pa 'i shugs dang ldan pa// lha rdzas lta bu'i lhab lhub
thams cad dang ldan pa/ de lta bu bla ma'i skye bodang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ pha drung/ ma dang/ 'phongs pa dang/ bkren pa slong ba dang/ 'an po'i
tshe 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang/ soms yangs pas sbyin pa dang/ sems la chags pa med pas gtong ba dang/ rjesasu 'gyod pa med pas yid mgu bar byed pa
dang snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam pas gtong ba chen po rab tugatong zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la rab tu brtson pa dang/ byang chub semA
ts+tso da pa'i rigs su mngon par skyes pa'i bsam pa yongs su slong ba'i tsho/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
ma/ yon tan gyi rgyan gyis byung ste/ cang shes kyi theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung ste
theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon nga ra zhon par gyur cig sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thig pas snang bar gyur
te theg pa chen po la shin tu mos par gyur cig/ sems can thams can smon lam thams cad sgrol ba lar tu zhugs pas// brtsams pa chen po'i theg pa dang ldan par
gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dug ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rab tu thob pa la rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung bar gyur
cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i yi shes rin po ches sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin tu 'byung ba'i chos can du gyur te/ theg pa rin po cha yongos su
rdzogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma tog rgyas pa'i sems dang rgyud du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
nga'i rgyan rnam par bsags pa'i theg pasungashan tu byung bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg pa myur ba la mngon pa3brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos
can du gyur te/ bskal pa grangasamad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su bsam pa rjes su sems shing rnam par sbyod bar gyur cig/ sa mas can
thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa la mkhas pas// longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang cang shes kyi theg pa chen po 'a spen pa byed par
gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid kyi lam gyi na thar gtugs par mngon par gzud par bya ba'i phyir/ theg pa shin tu mtho bar gnas
shang rab tu brtan pa dang ldan par rgyu cig cas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo gung po cang shes dang/ rta cang shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gras pa'i
sbyin byed pa'i tsho/ dgaba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i thog nga la mngon par bskyon zhing [） ]yongs kyi gzhon pa yongs su 'grub pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i theg pa/bsgribs pa med par 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i
rgyal por gyur pa// chos kyi dbang byed pa stan gyi sbyin pa byed cing/ rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri stan bzang po bzlum+ma'i rkang pa can seng ge 'i khri la gnas pa/ gsar [”]gyi rgyu
ma dang 'an po 'dra bas byas pa// stan reg na bde bgrangs med pa du ma btang ba/ na 'khor spros kyi dam pa thams cad kyis shin tu dri zhim par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna/
tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ zhe po ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum rgyan gyis brgyan pa// gser gyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa// gsaragyi dri'i bu'i du ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong
ba'i dbyangs 'byung ba/ ni ngo tsha'i 'bru bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te rnam par phye bas shin tu 'phags shing b.lanams pa/ srog chags bya ba
khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pasakun nas blta ba/ gdugs khab gcig gis sa chen po thams cad skyong bar dbang bskur ba/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i na
du bya ba de la 'dug cing/ 'khor lo thogs pa med pas bskyang ba dang tshasabya ba la rgyal po'abaka' thams cad nyams pa med par nyan pa// dang la rnakaM par snang ba dang/ in dra ni
la dang/ nor bu rin po che'i snying pos spras pa/ nyin dang/ zla ba dang/ skaram che phra lta bur rab tu brgyan pa// rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa/ rin po che khyad
bar du 'phags pa rgya mtshos spras pa/ rgya mtshodang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ bkra shis dang/ bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang/ ngaga' ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan nga/
'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi gyim bag dri ma med cad rdul dang bral bas bkab pa/ de la 'dzam bu'igling thams chad kyi bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskurab sa mngon par
dbang bskur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ byams pas dbang sbyar ba pha rol gyi 'khor bton pa dang ldan pa// bka' la zlog pa med pa/ 'dug na dga' ba de lta bu'i stan gyi rnam pa

tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang/ du dag gi rgyal po bya ba khragaM khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la khri stan bzang po'i rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang/ yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la gsol ba 'am/ skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/ 'phags pa 'a dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ chos smra ba
'am chos la dgab pa'i phyir yos su g.yos pa'i sams kyis sam/ pha dang/ ma dang/ bla ma'i skye bo 'am/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba'i spyan gnas sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rtenamachod pa 'i phyiraram/ 'phos pa dang bkren pa slong ba dang ga tum da pa dag gam//
sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yang rung sta/ sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tsho/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can
wa[4]/ thams cad sa sa rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing/ shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrugs ma
dang dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbang phyag thamasacad kyi rdo rje'i rnam pa thams cad du thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing/ 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i stanarab
thob par gyur gi/ sems can thams cad 'grib thams cad kyis blta bar 'os shing/ sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge 'i gdan rab tu thob par gyur cige 3sems can
thams cad 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis skyong ba'i phyirje/ stan gyi rgyan dang 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sams/
can thams cad dag ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil gyis mi non pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs med
par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug pa med pa dang ldan zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du mang pa'i yang brjod du med pa stan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i
byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus sa rgyas par byed pa'i phyir/ gter chen pos chogs kyi stan la gnas par
ngu'u'u// gyur ge/ sems can thams cad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim gro byed pa'i phyir/ rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog
gamathu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i stan la rab tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya shes kyis rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang khyu mchogag mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phur/ rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang/ sros thams cad kyi snyan dang/
ma tog tham sa rung kyi snyan dang/ gos thams cad kyi ston dang/ 'phrong phyogs thams cad kya stan dang/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi snyan dang/ bo zur sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i
stan dang 'jig rten gyi 21sa brjod du med nga 'a yang brjod du med pa ltar tshad med pa'i stan dang/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa'i ston dang/ rdo rje'i gdan
thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig ces/ da ltar byang chub sems dpa' stan gyi spyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dgasems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gyasem/
ma 0 gos nga 'i byang chub kyi snyan dag tu thob cing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi spyin pa byed cing dbang phyug gi lus la ngagab pa'i gdugs rin po che'i rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong khyad par
du 'phags shing dbang che ba'i yo byad du bya ba rin po che'i rtsa ba can dril bu'i dra bas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i srad bus gsar gyi dril bu spungs pa'i sgra 'byung ba rin po che bo lhu'i

'phreng ba rab tu spungs pa/ nyan kor nas rnga'i sgra dbyangs yang du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ gsar gyi dra ba rnam pa dag pas g.yogs pashing brgyan pa// rin po cha'i dra ba bairgya phrag stongag bla re brog
pa nor bu rin po che 'brug grangs mad nga sa smras pa/ rin po che bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas sna tshogs su bris shing brgyan pa/ a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ sngos kyi dam pa sna
tshog sabye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nyen kor de nyes par bskos pashing bdugs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar ltar 'ong gsal zhing ngag pa rgyun bu ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas
pas brgyan pa/ de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs phye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dge/ kha mam tho bsad pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing/ sems can rgya ye/tso bo mngon du
'gyur pa 'am/ de bzhinagshegs ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das mchod rten brgyan pa'i phyir tham/ chos btsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang dgaba'i gshis
gnyen nam/ byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba btsun par byab dgagam/ pha dang ma 'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog gam/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i gnas
kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam/ slob dpon dang/ bla ma dang/ byang chub kyi theg pa grub pa 'am/ de la zhugs pa dag gam/ 'phongs pa dang bkren pa slong ba dang lan pa dag la 'bul ba

ba dang yongs sugatong ba dang spyin par byed pawe6/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bso ste/ samatsan thas cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi g.yog pa rab tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag
bar yang dag par yo ga par gyur cig/ samasacan thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'dus te/ yon tan dang ya shas kyis mngon par bakaT/
par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi rdul dang/ mun pa dang/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ lus shin tu bkab par gyuracig/ sams/
can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis bltan sdug cing sas rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shas kyi snying po can du gyur cig sems can thams cad sas rgyas kyi chos 29log pa
med par 'jug par brtson pas/ mi 'khrugs pa 'chos dkar pos shrIn bkab par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyis gsargyas kyi sku'i mthar gtugs te
mngon par bkab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob pas gdugs su dod par gyur cig/ sems
can thams cad khams gsum thams cad log shin tu 'phags gang chags pa mang pa' la shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas/ ye shes kyis rnam par snang bar gyur cig/ sams/
can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la bsod nams thams cad kyis mchod pa'i lo re gdugs su 'os par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs
su rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi dam par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tsho/ ngagu ba'i rtsa ba de dag
sems can thams cad kyis chos la dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par gzung ba thob par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo 'o// gdugs gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyangs
kyis glas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gamathu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa las phyir mi ldog
pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs gcig gis brgyan te/ de bzhin gshags pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// gdugs
dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan yid du 'ong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dgab pa' phur yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par
ga dugs kyi rgyan gyis kun tu yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lams pa'i sems can thams cad dang 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad gdugs tham sa cad kyis dgab
pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs snatshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyasu gcig la phul bas// sangs rgyas thams cad la brjod du
mad pa'i gdugs phul bar sems shang yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon pa byang chub pas/ 'phags pa'i gdugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad gab pa'i
rgya ra yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na bzhug pa thams cad la gdugs kyis
dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'phreng ba brgyus shing klubs pa dang/ sngos thams cad kyi mchog ga dri
mes po'i ngad 'byung ba'i gdugs dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par sbas pa'i gdugs dang/ rgyan mdzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang/ rgyan tshad med par yangs shing rgya
che ba dang/ gsar gyi dra bas kun nas yog par brgyan pa/ dril bu'i dri ba kun nas spungs pa'i sgra da nga du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba'i gdugs dang/ shes bsgribs pa med cing chags/
bamed pa'i gdugs dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par dgab pa'i gdugs [………..…….….…… ]pa yongs su gtang ba'i re yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dag ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yo ga mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yong
su bsngo'o//sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi don kun gyis kun nas g.yogs shing rab tubargyan pa 'i phyir yongs su bsngo'i// 1sangs rgyas kyi ye//
shes dang/ yon tan dang/ dgongs pa dam pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yos su bsngo'o/[“]masayin po che mtha' yas pa la dbang sbyar ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo 'o/
chos thams cad la ye shes kyis dbang sgyur ba kun tu rdzob/sa par bya ba'i phyi'i yongasau bsngo'o// dgaba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon pa la g.yog por yongs su bsnga ba'i don du yos su bsngo'o/
mawa//// 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir longs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcus ba rer bris pa'i gdugs su
'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis g.yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos thams cad la dbang phyug tungabang sgyur

ba'i dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// mthu chen po dang dbang chen po'i sems kyi rgyud thob pa bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// blo yangs pa dang sems rgya che ba thob par bya ba'i yos
su bsngo'o// yon tan tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// yon na thams cad kyis sems mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sem
can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// nga shas chen pos mnyam par dgab pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ sems can thams cad
kyis 'gro ba thams cad bsdo ba'i tshul ma lus par thob par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo'o// sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yo u bsngo'o// bsam dang dge ba dang yid
kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dgab cing yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongasasu bsngo'o/
07 'ad ltar ya nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i u pa can/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dus 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong
ba 'byung ba/ snam bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs pa// kha dog dang tshon sna tshogs kyi snam bus brgyan cing bsgrung ba/ gsar gyi dra bas kun nas spyangs shing klubs nga/ gsar
gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bsangashen tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa/ tshon tha dad pa nyin tumazlo ba rin po
ches rnam pa snachogos su brgyun pa/ rgyal mchan gyi rtsam zla gom gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hacug pa/ 'od zer rnam pa sna tshong dag
'byung ba/ rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis sa thams cad kun tu yog pa/ rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis a h+phamagacud kun tu yog pa rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam pa dum 'od dang ldan pas rab tu brgyan pa'i
rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs basbyong ba'i rgyun de lta bu dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang/
'jig rten gyi khamasachos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa// sas rgyas kyi shing namam kha'i dbyanges thams cad 'byamakrus pa la gnas pa yangs pa// kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi sbyin pa yongs su
mcha @#// btang bar mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a bsam pa dang mos pa'i khyad par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyi'i//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams la 'bul ba 'am/ de bzhin gshags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos dkon mchog mchod pa 'am/
pa dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul la// dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ 'khor gyi tshogs su gyur pa 'am//
! gang brag gi rnam pa gzhan su yang rung sta/ song ba thams cad la mgror bya ba'i phyir spyon zhing yongs su gtong ban/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i/
ni rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngoste/[”]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la thub pa med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ bsod nams thamos cung yang dag/
par bsgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi go 'phang bris pa spred nga 'a chos nyid kyis chos thams cad la dpang sbyar ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgrung bar gyur cig/ sal/
can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te/ rin po che'i gshi la sangs rgyas kyi chos brisaM pa dang ldan par gyur cig sems can
mtha0 thams cad 'gro ba kun lamar ma snang bar gyur te/ rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir/ thub pa med pa'i
rgyal mtshan dang ba dan can du gyur dge/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis ma thub pa'i chos can du gyur te/ mngashas dang stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng bar gyur cig 3
sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad la lung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te ye shes mthu ba tsho'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thamasacad ye shes kyi dekyil 'khor gyis
chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te/ ye shes kyi nye ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed nga 'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
mchod pa la brtson zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu bsgreng bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ na po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur
cig/ sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyis dben shing sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur ta sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur
cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'a chen po rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'iraM/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ngal sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che
zhing ya ngas pa dang/ zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad kyi sred pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa
dang/ 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
dang 'a chen po ren po che thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang/ sems can thams cad nor gyis phyug par byed pa dang/ napo che'imadzod thams cad 'byed pa dang/ rin po che'i gter
thams cad gtong ba dang/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa dang/ rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la
khyab par byed pa dang/ na po che'i tshogs thams cad 'phungs par mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang/ rin po che tshogs thams cang 'bror bu 'am/ rin po che thams cad
yongs su btang bar mas bskyed pa'i tsho/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la rin po che byan pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'daltar yongs su bsngo
ste sems can thams cad dran pa'i rgyud rmongs pa med cing sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pas/
chos dkon mchog gi snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyan pa dang yo ngas su gtong ba shin tu brtan pas/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs su 'dzin par rgyug cig
sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sams rin po cha rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sems cad thams cad sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa mad par gzhol bas/ yod shes rin po che la zhugs par gyuracig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po chatshad med pa yang dag par bstan bar bya
ba'i phyi'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tanan po che grangs mang nga phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shesan po che mngon par 'tshang rgyab la
brtson pas/ yon tan rin po che ma tha' yas pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che shin tu ya sa pa'i mthar thug pas// ye shes
rin po che bcu drug gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab tu thob par gyur ni/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rin po che la rnam dang de sangs rgyas pas/ rin po che'i dam
pas spune pa'i gnas kyi mchog tugyur cig/ sems can thams cad so so yang dag pa gag pa mi zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin po che rab tu ston pa la brtson pa sa/ rin po che'i dbang po dam
'bya/ par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang lachen po ldan po che de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
sman rin po che rnam par dag cadenyams pa med pas shes dam pa yin pa cha yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'deltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po lus dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa lus blta na sdug pa/ rnam par dag cinge mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyan gyis lus shin
tu brgyan pa/ rin poche thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan nga/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis shin tu brgyan nga sems can thams cad kyi lus
rgyan gyis brgyan par brtson pa// sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad stobs pa// dga' ba sna tshogs kyis sems can
rab tu dga' bar byed pa do/rgyan snatshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba ngang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i phyi'i sbyane zhing yos su
gtong ba' rgyan yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad yo shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas lha dang bcas pa'i
'jig rten gyi rgyan du med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi maNaMn rnam da ra ngag nga dang ldan zhing/ mtshan gyis lus shin tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can
thams cad bsod nams brgyapa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i lus can du red do/ lus M mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis
brgyan pa dang ldan zhing/ lus mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bres pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad lo so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i madzod dang ldan zhing/
tshag gi rgyan gyis[“]shan tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag yid du 'ong zhing rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing/ yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan
par gyur cig// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig gitshul rnam par dag pas 'gro ba kun mgu bar byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong
par brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par 'jugacing/ sams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can
thams cad chos snang ba thams cad kyi chos rab tu thob cing/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis rgyud shin
tu brgyan pa sa/ sa mas yanyes kyi yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rgyan de dag/
yongs su gtong ba'i tsho/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad mang pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang ye shes kyi rgyun yongs su rdzogs te da sems can
thams cad kyi ras na nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po
dbang phyug la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba/ cod pan dang gtsug gi ngani po cha'i sbyin pa byed cing/ draa su gtong ba dang/ mngon par stobs ba dang/ sems can
thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang/ ltos pa med par yongs su gtong ba'i sunas rnam pa ra 'phel bar byed pa dang/ sbyin pa sa bsgos pa'i rgyud yongs su bsgom pa dang/ sbyin pa la
debang sgyur bar rab tu 'jug pa dang spen pa'i ye shes lu rab tu slob pa dang/ spyin pa gtong ba'i dbang po yongs su bsrung pa dang sbyin pa gtong ba'i blo rgya cher byed pa'i tsho cod pan dang gtsug
gi rin po che yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can tham cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi sa
shAka bams cad kyis bon dbang bskur bas/ bang po thams cad la shin tu dbang bskur bar klu yi// sems can ban ga cad ye shu / / 1tshug ga pha rol tu phyin pa
thob pas/ sde bo gtsug tor can gyi na go dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyiba'a mthar phyin pa sa/ e9 shas ni po cha mchog gis
sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bor phyag bya bar 'os shade ye shes rin po cha'i nAchog la yang dag par gnas par/
gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chod kyi skade pa 'a dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob ste/ ye shes kyi cod pan shin tu bcings pa ru gyur cig/ semachan khung [：5]da[']jig rakun gyis
bltar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te/ yungashos kyi nor bu rin po tshes mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad spyi bor gyur pa ang zla kyi chos tham
cad la rnam par blta ba'i chos can du gyurata spyi bo shin tubatsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che rgyamacho'i snyingapo rnam par bgapa dang ldan zhing/ stobs bcu'i
rgyan cod pan gyis mgo rab tu brgyan par gyurayi// sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang po nas bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyi na'i gnas par gyur cig/
sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i mthar thug sta/ chos kyi yo shas kyi spyi bo rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thacatshan canyamkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis mnon nga 'i sbyang
ba rab tu thob ste/ rgyal ba'a mchog dam par gyur cigaces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cod pan dang gtsugag rin po cha yongs sugatong ba'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems
ngan thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung gnas rnam par dag pa dang/ yoshos kyi cod pan dang/ nor bu na po che rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos btson bcug cing btsonachas bcings pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba/ sdug bsngal gyi khyim gyis bskor ba/ shing sgrog dang lcags sgrog dang/
ltung gi bcang bas bcings pa/ lus lcags thag gis btags pa/ bsdams pa/ shin tu rgyu ba'i lus can/ mi bde bas lus ngashan tu mnar ba/ skyabs med par lung ba/ bkres pa dang
skom pas nyen pa gos med pa// mun pas log cing khebs pa// shin tu rtsub 1 bar lcags sgrog gis sgrog pa de lta bu drag mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang/ rgyal po
mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du/ bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang sa byin nas/ btson ra de nas sems can de dag yongs su thar par byed do//
rna nges btson ra de nas sems can de dag thar par byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad mngon par byananas/ sman dang/ sA na pa dang sngags kyi rnam pas lus nad me[–/ ]ra bus/ bde ba dang yang
dga' ba larab tu bkod nas/ chos rin po che thos par byas te/ dga' ba'i gtam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas// saphas rgyas kyi bstan pa las ma nyams pa zlangahado de de ltar sems
can btson ra nas bkyi yang dag par bsdus pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sred pa'i bcings pa dang zhags pa las shin tu grol
bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin cing/ 'khor ba'i rgyud shan tu chad par gyucig/ sems can thams cad bag la31 shin tu bcom ste/ kun
nas 'khor ba dang rnam par bral bas ma rig pa'i mun pa dang/ rab rib dang/ lang tog rnam por bsal cing/ rob ribe mad pa u0f7a shes yang dag nga la 'ong ba ra cig/ sa la can thamA
cad 'gro ba kun gdon bar bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thug par gyur te/ khams gsum pa'i b.ris pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'a ra ro/ngas pa mang ba'i sar yo/
shas bsgribs pamed pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing nyon mosapaN+Di cings pa thams cad shAn shegs pa gyur te/ sems can 2mas rung sams kyi g.yo ba rnam
par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir/ g.yo bamed pa' shas la yang dag par gzhol zhing g.yo ba dang/ rlom sems kyi bcings pa thams cad
dang yapar gyur cig/ sems can thams tsang khams gsum pa thams cad du chags pa mad par gnas shing 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te/ 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad
rnam par sngangs par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsam pa sangs rgyas thams cad la btang bas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu grol bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag tu sems chags pa mad pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba dang/ theg pa chen po la god par bya ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas 'ge
rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dong bar gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad gtson ra dang btson cha nas bkye bas/ yang dag par bzung
ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thamaMs cad shin tu grol zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongasasu bsngo'o/
ha10 yang sems can la la zhig srog dang dbral ba'i phyir gsad du khrid pa sngag bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi bzad cing 'dar ba/ bcang ba lngas bcings pa/ skye bo brgya phyag stong gas
kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa sna tshogs nas bshal 'ange bkra ba/ gnyen bshes kyi rgyud dang mdza' bo'i rgyud thams cad dang bral bar gyurang ral gris gtsab nge gshags pa/
bsal shing bsgrung ba la bskyon pa/ lus thams cad kun nas brlag ste ma 'bar ba'i nang du dor ba 'am/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mi bde ba thams cad kyis ma bang bar bya ba/ gtse sna tshogs thamA
cad du brgya ba zhig/ byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen pos mthong bar gyur na/ de la byang chub soms dpa' sems dang ra chen po de gas da nga pa ba de'angon du lus ngo ngas su
gtong ste/ ji ltar byang chub sems dang 'a mi 'dzam pa dang/ rgyal po khyad par du 'gro bas ji ltar byas pa dang/ dam chen pa'i byang chub sems dang las mas dang 'chan po gzhir
kyang sems can gsad pa slu ba'i don du lus yongs su gtong zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nyams su len pa de bzhin du rab tu gtong bar byed cing tshig 'di skad du snya'o// dbyeng
kyis mi bde ba 'di dag bdag la gyis shig/ lus 'di yongs su btang gis nga'i srog gcad par gyis shig/ nga la de ci byas so cog kyang mi mnyam pa ze da kyi// khyad kyis ma 'de la ci
bya bar 'dod pa de las grangs med pa'i gyur tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam par gtsa ba thams cad kyis mi bde ba sna tshogs su gyis shig ces te/ 'di ltar bdag gis gsad bar
bkri ba mthong yang/ bdagagi lus dang srog gis mi slu ba ni bdag la tshul dang mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad la dmigs te 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i
phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed do snyam nas/ bdag gi lus dang srog yos su btang ste/ gsad bar bya ba de bslus nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o//
sems can thams cad gzhan gyis gtso ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar byung bas/ lus dang srog shin tu ma 'phrogs par gyur cig sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad las thams cad
mkhyen pa'i byang chub stobs bcur lung bstan pa'i gnas rab tu thob par gyuratsago/ sems can thams cad ngan song thams cad kyi 'am las yongs su 'dus te/ 'jig pa thams cad
las rab tu thar par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ags kyi dbyings su zhugs pas 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skabs rab tu red par gyur cig/ sems can than
cad dge ba'i bshes gnyin de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bzung bas/ dgres 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad (khan ma tho ba med pa'i las dge
pa thams cad spyod pas/ ral gris gtsab pa lta bu'i ma bde ba thams cad las 'das par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing ngam pa'i drung du phyin cing 'jigs pa
med par bdud kyi sde thams cad rnam par 'thor bas/ bag tsha ba dang 'jigs shing skug pa thamasacad dang bral ba gyur cig/ sems can tham cad bya named da'i chos kyi
'jigs pa med pas rnam par dag cing khyu mchog dang seng ge 'i nga ro 'ban pas/ 'khor gyi 'gus pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral bar gyur ga/ ma naN can thams cad pa
na ma tho ba med pa'i las la yang dag par sad cing/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi nang na bslubs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i song gar gyur cig/ To man chad thams cad skye bo kun
yongs su skyong ba'i sams dang ldan zhing/ 'gro ba kun tu 'jigs pa med pa'i khang par zhugs/ra gyur cig ces de ltar gsad par gyur pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sam
rapa' chen pos rang gi lus dang srog btang ste bsus nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i btson ra'i sngag bsngal kun sang ba dang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi bde ba ma snang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po la mgo les gtsug phud thor pa gra tu bcas pa bslang na//
du@#// rgyal po gtsug na rin po che dang/ byang chub sams dpa' yan lag dam pa shin tu'aphags pa dang/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a gzhan dag gis ji ltar
byin pa de bzhin du/ des slong ba de dag mthong nas/ gtong bar mos pa'i tshig dge bas thob pag dang gtsug phud du chos te khyer cig ces stobs shing/ kye tshur shog bdag gi mgo 2/
gtsug phud dang thor pag tu bcas pa long zhig ces nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling na btsun pa mi'adem ba des yid rtsa gcig tu byas te/ yid ma 'khrugs pa dang/
yidem 'dres pa dang/ las gzhan la mi sems nga' yod dang/ 'jig rten las 'phags pa'i yid dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i yidi dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yid dang/ dag
pa'i yid dang/ drang ba'i yid dang/ rig pa la brtson pa'i yid kyis/ gtsug phud dang thor pag tu bcas bde slong ga la gtong ba'its+tsaM gtsug phud dang thor pag tu bcas par mtshon
gyis phog ste mgo las phabs/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te rim gro dang bcas pa'i lus kyis sor mo bsu'i thal mo sbyar nas/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang/
! da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa rjes su dran pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ dga' bas rnam par spel ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ chos kyis yos
su rgyas pa'i ya da kyi dbang po dang/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas dengs par mi 'gyur ba'i yid kyi dbang po dang/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang tha dad par khong du chud pa dang/
tshor ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya bar rab tu shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dang sa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad dang//
rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i gtong ba'i sems dang/ sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bskyod pa 'dus phyir mi ldog pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ni sbyang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
rnam pas thob pa// gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog pas dag tha'abashesaganyan gyis bstan pa'i tshul la gnas te/ gtsug phud ngang thor pag tubacas pa mgo las/ ste yongs su gtong ba'i7/
dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yo nges su bsngo ste/ sems cad thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gtsug gi mchod rten du gyur/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang bar gyug/ sems can thams cad
skashin tu phra ba dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal cing/ sa rdo rjenug ngo 'a ngam pa lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sku sdug cing skum mas legs pa dang skra snum bar
gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mgo lags pa las ni tu lags par skyes pa'i sgra rab tu 'jam pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sku dga' ba 'khyil ba ltar
tsa sa/ wu'u// g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing/ ngang la gyi be'u dang bkra shis kyi sku dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las rnam
par 'das shing/ mas rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i skra thob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par rang rang gi sku las 'od zer rab tu
'gyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu shan tu rnam par dag pa ltar sku shin tu mdzes par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems ma nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi
dbu skra dang/ dbu lta bur mdzes pa dang ldan pas skye bo la gzhag pa'i mchod rten du 'ongs ba'i sgra dang ldan par cig sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dbu ltar chags ba med pa'i sgra
mdzes par skyes pas/ mun pa dang rdul gyis mi chags pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud dang thob pag tu bcas pa yongs
su btang bas/ yang dag par bsrung ba'i dgu ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis sa lta bur shAn tu zhi ba'i sems yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
stobs bcu'amathas gtugs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chan po slong ba rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
[n]]dga' ba byed pa dang/ rgyal bo zla 'od dang/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'tshad med gzhan dog pa sa mig yongs su skungs pa ni/ sa dang ye shes kyi mag
yongs su sbyangs pa'i blo dang/ chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa 'i yad kyi gnas dang/ bla na med pa 'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur pa yad kyi rnam pa dang/ ma / rangashes pa thams cad kyi
mthar thug pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang/ yishes kyi skye mched la yang dag par btang ba'i sems dang/ dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang mnyam ngu byas pa'i sbyin pa dang gtong
ba'i soms dang/ zhe sdang ba med pa'i mig gis dad pa ma rdzogs pa'i dbang dang/ slong ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i sams dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan la sa b+hol bas byang chub sem
dpa'i sems theg pa chen po dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje yos su bsgoms pa dang/ dbang po drug shin tu babs pas slong ba rnams la mgo phyin pa da la yan du yang nag pongs//
su gtong zhing chos de lta bu la zhugs pa'i sems kyis slong ba dang 'dod pa dag la sbyin pa byed cing mchod sbyin kyi don la 'jug nga dang/ chos kyi mthu shin tu k+khumyud pa dang/ 'jig rta/
thams cad kyi dga' bar lta ba dang/ bag med pa'i srid pa rnam par zlog par byed pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi ngaga'akha dang pa snatsho a rang gi ngaga' ba khong du
chud par byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang/ ci bslangs pa'i dngos pos kha mi gtong bar byed pa dang/ mi gnyis pa'i sman pa
rjes su srung ba dang/ rlom sems med pas shin tusbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang/ slong ba rnams kyis dngos po tsa bslangs nga sbyin par byed pa'i tsho/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di
lco ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dag ba'i rtse ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyi mig tu gyur tra/ mag gi dam par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi mdzod shin
tu yangs pas nyams pa med pa'i mig tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad snang ba mi 'phrogs pa dang ldan zhing sha'i mig rnam par dag pa yongs su grub par gyur cig/ sems can tham
cad shi 'pho dang skye bshesangashing lha'i mig rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rdzas su 'dong zhing chos kyi mig rab tu thob par gyur cig/
sems can thams cad gtong ba thams cad rnam par ston ngag shes rab kyi mig thob par gyur cig/ sam+man thams cad chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sbyin
! dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i mig gi mthar thug ste/ kun tu lta ba'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams
mtha yongs su shes shi ba rib med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stobs bcu mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs par phyin pas bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang/
ldan par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po mag yongs su gtong ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshad kyi mig go chas/ sems can thams cad
yongs su bsngo ba la nye bar 'god do// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo bam po sum cu rtsa bdun pa// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dang 'a chen po ji ltar rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mdung pamed pa'i sgrigatsug gis yongs su btang ba bzhin du/ slong ba nye bar 'ongs pa la byang
chub sams dpa'i spyod pa blangs pa'i sim sa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs su byung ba'i spyan nga 'i sums dzang/ byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu thun ngang skyos pa dang/ dbang po dang/ ya shaso dang/ yon tan gyis shin tubatsun
pa dang/ khams gsum ma dag cing snying po u0f7ada pa la snying por rab tu rtog pa dang/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' blta ba rab tu thob pas rang gis lus la chags pamang
ba'i sems dang/ gnas med pa 'i sa rgyus kyi chos thams cad rjes su dran pa gnas pa dang/ dul ba dang zha ba'i sams dang/ dbang po'i rgyu ba shin tu zhi bar ng/
'gro ba'i mya ngan thams cad nas sems can thams cad gdon par sems pa'i ya shas 'byung pa'i shes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang/ rgyud ched du brjod pa rgya mtshos
gtong ba'i sems yangs par byas pa dang/ don la rnam par nges pa'i chos dang mgon po thams cad kyi lam du 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi dbang phyakal yod shas kyis sbyod pa
ngang rang gi lus snying po med pa las snying po blang ba'i blos yos su gtong ba'i tshe/ rna ba dang sna yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dgo ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yo ngosasu
bsngo ste/ dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi sgra rnam par rig par bya ba la chags pa mdu pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad
kyis sgra thams cad skad ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba'i phyir/ bsgribs pa mong pa'i rnab dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang ldan pas/
yo thogs pa med pa'i rnab dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rna ba'i skye mched shin tubasgoms pas/ rna ba rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rnam par shas
ba zhi ba skyo ba'i phyir/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rnab dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung khong du chud pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i rna ba dang/
ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bsgribs mad pa'i chos rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir/ gnas med pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad phyir rgol ba
'jig par byed pa'i shes pa la mi phyed pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rna ba shin tu dag pa la dbang sgyur bas kun tu 'jug pa'i rna ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snyan rab tu'athob par bya ba thob pas/ lha'i rna ba rab tu thob par gyur cigs/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rna ba yongs su btang
bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi rna ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos nas sna rnam par dag pa yongs su bsngo sdu tu sems can
thamaMs cad legs par mtho ba'i rtswa dang/ dpe byad bzang po'i sna dang/ mtshan bzang po'i sna dang 'an tu yid du 'ong ba'i sna dang/ rnam par dag pa'i sna dang rim gyis gzhol ba'i
sna dang mdzes pa 'phags pa'i sna dang/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'asna dang/ ngo bltan sdug pa'isna dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi shangs rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir yongs su
mthazhi/ @#// bsngo'o// sems can thams cad ngo la mi sdug pa med pa dang/ sa thams cad kyi ngo dang/ chags pa med pa'i ngo dang/ bstan stag pa'i ngo dang/ mi mthun pa med
pa'i ngo dang/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo dang/ kha nam tho ba med pa'i ngo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor lta bu'i ngo dang/ kyon nas lta ba'i ngo dang yid du 'ong
tsho zhing tshad med nga'i ngo dang ldan par gyur cigaces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rna ba dang sna yongs su btang bas yang ngag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bde
! ngag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyachos thams cad la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ ci nus kyang sems can
thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu 'dus par 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu shes par 'gyur
ba dang/ tsa nas kyang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu'ajug par 'gyur ba dang/ tsa nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
shin tu mthong bar 'gyur ba dang ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis phan sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad
shin tu zil gyis mi non pa'i yongs su dag pa klob por 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba rab tu'athob par 'gyur ba dang/
ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
gyis brlabs pa'i lus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'chen po skyadeb/
zil gyis mi non pa'i sa la gnas te/ u dum ba ra ltar shin tu dkon par sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa dang/ gtong ba ma zad cing 'bum klas pa dang/ dad cing klung sbrags
gtang ba'i sems dang/ yongs su gtong pa'i blo mtha' yas pa dang/ dul ba dang yongs su dul ba yid kyis gtong ba'i dbang po dang/ gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i mi la
jug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang/ 'gro ba thams cad bde bar byed pa'i gtong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ gtong bachen po dang/ shin tu gtong ba dang/ rab tu gtong ba dang/
mchog tugatong ba'isimA kyis rang gi lus dang/ yan lag dang/ gdong gis kyang phan 'dogs pa dang/ mi smod par gtong ba'i sams kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i chos la rab tu gnas te//
ji ltar rgyal po me tog so dang/ glang ngo 'argyal po mche ba drug pa/sa so ji ltar byin pa de bzhin du rang gi lus dang/ kha nas so yongs su gtong ba'i/ dge ba'i rtsa
blo ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod rten du mchod par 'os par gyur te/ mche ba dkar zhing rno ba dang ldan par gyur cig sems can
thams cad sangs rgyas kyimtshan rab tu thob pas so mnyam zhing thags bzang bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la legs par zhugs
shing dul ba'i sems kyis nye bar spyod par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khor blta na sdug cing kha'inang dang so rnam par dag par gyur tsagi/ sems can thams cad
kha dang so dpemad par rnam par dag cing bzhin dran pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad so bzang po'i gsab nas sa zhim po'i mchog grangs med pa yid du
[–/ ]'ong ba dga' ba skyed pa'i ngad 'byung bas yongasasu dag cing so bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad shin tudul ba'i so rab tu thob cing bkra shis dang/ dga' ba
'khyil ba dang/ paNo sna tshogs kyisomadzes pas bris pa'i sa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gdong gi dkyil 'khong nas tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang ba 'byung bas/
'od ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mtha' yas pa rab tu 'byung ba'i so dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad (ba bras la ma chags ma zhen cing ba na ma tho ba med par spyod pas//
sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa'i mthar thug par gyur te so'i thigs rags shing 'bras chan ba phye ba lta bur gyur cig/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i dam pa lung ston cing/
so'i gsab kun nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' ya/sa pa'i snang ba 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' so'i sbyin pas ya nga dgapar 'asdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
ba de dag sems can ma lus par thams cad mkhyenapa nyid du yang dag par bskyod pa dang/ chags pa med pa'i rgyan gyi chos thams cad shes pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/
'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lce bslangs ba na/ ji ltar rgyal po bzhin bathangs dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a ra mi ldog pa dang/ dam yin
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang skye bas skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs ngag la gnas shing/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de dang de dag tu yongs su btang bar
gyur pa de bzhin du/ des kyang slong ba med pa de dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i sangaga'i gdan dag la bkod cing/ slong bsagos pas sems kyis yid du 'ong zhing 'jam pa'i ngag dang/ byams pa la
sred pa'i sems kyi rang gi lce gtong ba'i tshe/ ga' ba'i sems med pa dang/ rnamed ra'i sems dang/ nyams pa med pa'i sems dang/ rigs chen po'ajigs dang ldan
pa'i sems dang/ sas rgyas kyi dgos kyi rigs su byung ba'i sems dang/ byang chub kyi sems la dgod cing gzhag pa'i sems dang/ rgyud 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang/ mthu stobasu
chen po'angeshugs kyi sems dang/ lus la chags pa med pa'i sems dang/// tshagau tu brjod pa la chags ba med pa 'i sams su byas/
te/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs shing bdag gi kha nas lce byung sta/ lus thams cad la slong ba dbang byed du bcug nas/ tshag mnyan zhing 'jam pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ byams
pa spyod pas tshig tu brjod cing/ ci nas kyang khyed dga' zhing yid bde ba dang/ mgu ning rangs par bdag gi lce long la gang du dgos pa de'i dgos pa sgrubs shigaces nas/ de la sbyin
zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ lce yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad tshig gi tshul
thams cad kyis shes bar byed pa'i phyir/ lce shin tu yangs pa dang ldan par gyur cig sems can thams cad yang dag ji lta ba bzhin gyi tsheg bden pa gnyis su bya ba med pa dang
00//ldan par gyur te/ gdong gi dkyil 'khor 'bas pa' rtse dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par ston pa'i phul
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can byams cad ngo bye ba'i mchog shin tu rnam par dag pa ldan zhing/ shin tu srab pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur/
cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun kyi tshogs pas the tsam gcod pa'i phyir/ nges pa'i tshag gi dbyangs mtha' yas pa yod pa'i lcangang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
cad lu'i mdzod nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'gyed nga 'i phyir/ snang ba mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams
cang rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa'i tshog sami zad pa sa ston rung brjod pasu/ tshaka shin tu ngas par brjod pa'i rtse dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad stong pa kun brjod pa tshad
med pa'imadzod kyi lce dang ldan zhing 'dul ba'i mtha' dang mnyam par sems can kun gyi tshig thams cad dang slab thams cad rnam par 'grel ba'i lce dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems
can thams cad spyod pa rjes su brjod pa'i tshig gi rgya mtsho thams cad la bab tu zhugs pas dbyangs kyi tshogs dang tshag gi rnam pa shes pa'i lce ngang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can tham/
cad spyod pa thams cad mngon par brjod pas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing/ chos thams cad kyi tshig thams cad shin tu ston pa'i lce dang ldan par gyur ge
kyi ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cungamkhyen pa nyid du dmigs pa'i smon lam la rab tu brtson pa de lce yongs su btang bas/ yang dag par bsdus pa'i
dge bany+tsi de dag sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa 'a ya shes chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di lta yang byang
chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dam pa mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i mgo byang chub khong du chud par byed
pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi mchog tshul gyi mgo dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par lta ba dang/ yashes rnam par dag pa'i mgo la yang dag par lta ba dang/ bsgribs pa mang
pa'i mgo yongs su sgrub pa dang/ sa dam pa'i mago rjes su lta ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ye shes dam pa mgo lta bu 'dod cang tshol pa dang/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyis
bltar med pa'i ye shes kyi mgo'i rim pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ phyogs thams cad du phyin pa'i yi shes kyi rgyal po'i mgo la mngon par mos par byed pa dang/ chos thams cad
la dbang byed pa zil gyis mi non pa'i mgo yongs su grub par byed cing/ de lta bu'i chos la spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi yongs sugatong
ba'i tshul la bsubs pa/ sangs rgyas la mos pa skyes pas dag ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/ slang ba mi krar yas pas dga' bas yongs su rgyas pa'i soms dang ldan pa yid kyi debang
bo shin tu gsal ba/ rgyud rab tu dang zhing sems dang yid shin tu dang ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba'i snang ba thob pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa shin tu rgya [”] che ba/ rgyun/
mi 'chad nga ra sams pa/ gtong ba tshen po gtong ba/ shin tu gtong ba gtong ba'i yi da dang ldan pa// dbang po'an tu dga' bas lta bur brtan pa'i chos can lhag pa'i bsam pa yangs shing ngag
la rgya che bas sbyin pa gtong bar mngon par 'dod pa/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongashes mchog dang/ skyes bu dam pa ka shA'i rgyal po dang/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sa mas dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag kyang mgo yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de ltar mgo gtong ba'i tsho[） ]mgo yongs su gtang bas ya nga dgu par bsdus nga 'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di
ltar sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi dbu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang/ skye mched brelakyisaMm non pa dang/ zhing thams cad
0// du mngon par 'phags pa dang/ bum pa rgyas pa dang/ dga' ba 'khyil ba dang/ skra dang mgo'i 'od dang/ 'od zer snachogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang/ 'jig
can thams cad du rmad du byung ba dang/ dpal gyi ba'us brgyan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dbu dang ldan pa dang/ yang shas kyi mgo rtogs par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog/
tuphyin pa'i mago dang ldan pa dang/ mgo rnam par dag pa dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyayeg yongs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyire yongasasu bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po mgo yongs su gtong ba'i tsha da dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyis chos kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ye shes kyi yan lag dam pa rab tu thob par
bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dang ra sems dpa' chen po slong ba rnams la dad pa'i lag pa thog mar 'gro ba dang/ phan 'dogs pa'itshul
dang chos la spyod pa la brtson par 'gro zhinge ldog pa dang/ rin poma'i lag pa thog mar 'gro bas lag pa gtong dang/ spyod padon yod par byang chub sems dpa'i lan la spyod pa dang//
lag shin tu brkyang zhing gtong ba'i sems ma 'khums pa dang/ a par spyod pa'i tshul shin tu nges pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sang ga'i rtsal gyis spyod cing lag pa yangs pa gtong
mtha ]ba la mos pas lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang/ tshul gyi gzhi chen po rab tu brtan pa la lhod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam dang/ tshor bas ma nyams pa'i blo dang ba dang/ 'gro ba ma/
yan nga ba 'gro ba las phyir log pa'i 'gro bas byang chub 'byung bas/ de ji ltar byang chub lums dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang/ rgyal po dga' ldan dang/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gzhan tshad med pa dag kyang skye ba'i skye gnas sna tshogs dag na gnas shing/ lag pa yongs su gtong bar gyur ba de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems yang+ga
shing rgya che ba tshad ma da nga dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur pa// chos kyi rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gtong ba'i lag pa
dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin pa'i smon lam can/ sems bskyed pa rdul med pa dang 'grogs pas kun nas bskor ba med pa/ ye shes dang/
chos kyi lus rgyun mi 'chad nga// mi shigs mchod pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi sgul ba/ dge ba'abashes gnyen gyis nye bar brtan pas sams sbrel ba/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spyad pa dang gcig tu gyur ba'agatong bas byung ba de/ slong ba la rkang lag gi sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sem
na thams cad la 'di ltar yosu bsngo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dmigs te/ rkang lag yongs su btang ba yongs su byin pa 'dal dag ba'i rtsa ba ci/
yod pa de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba thob cing rin po cha' lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/
de dag rin po che'i lag pa des sems can thams cad la sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes rab cu thob ste/ phan tshun gyi lus la rin po ches 'thor bang gyur cig/ mngon par 'thor bar gyur cig/
rab tu 'thor bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi sngan gyis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
phan tshun du zhe sdang bamed pa'i sems dang ldan zhing/ phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su 'dong zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i
gnas ta mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir/ thams cad lagan rin po che thogs pa dang/ lag na sros thogs pa dang/ lag na gos thogs pa dang/ lag na gdugs thogs pa dang/
lag na 'phrang ba thogs pa dang/ lag na ma tog thogs pa dang/ lagan phye ma thogs pa dang/ lag na lhab lhub thogs pa dang/ laganam tog mtha' yas pa thogs par gyur cig/ kun
tha0 nas sgo dang ldan pa'i thabs la gnas shing/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par brtson pa'i sems dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham/
cad du thogs pa med pa' lag pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ cho 'phrul gyi lag pa mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'i lag pa dang/ 'od zer gyi mdzod/
mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i lag pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad lag mthil gcig gis yog par byed pa'i lag pa dang/ dra bar 'brel cing san mo zangs ltar 'dug
pa'i lag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi phyagashin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen
po yon tan rgya mtsho yums cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ khas len pa'i ngang tshul can dang/ slong ba thams cad la mngon par mos shing 'dod pas/ dga' ba dang//
spro ba dang/ dad pa chen po rab tu thob pa dang/ slong ba 'bod par ston pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas rkang lag yongs su gtong ba byed cing/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi byang chub tshol ba'i tshe/ rkang lag yongs su btang bas yang dag par
bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar thams cad gtong ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'/
chen ngo thams cad mkhyen pa 'i bsam pa dang/ soms dang yid du ldan nga byang chub kyi sems kyis rab tu dga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par dadapa'i
sems dang ldan pa/ tshor bas dengag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ slong ba than can la mngon mos pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ len pa thams cad la zhim ldang ba'i sems dang
ldan pa/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad kyi gtong pha'a' ma du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtong bas sbyin par bya ba'i rjes su
srung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sums dang 'i sbyin pa rgya chen pos btang ba shin tu gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems rgyun mi 'chad pa dwang ldan pa/
bdag gi lus la 'phos par mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'byung gnas dang/ rgyal po yid bde bar sems pa dang/ de ma yin pa'i byung chub
sems dang 'a so mas dpa' chen po gzhan grongs mad pa dag kyang skyo ba'i skyo gnas de dang dag la gnas nigoshang/ khrag yongs su gang bar gyur pa deltar slong ba rnams la rang rgyalus
kyi khrag gtong ba'i tshe/ khrog yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dgeba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos dang ya shas//
kyi lus dang ldan zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang 'dra bar dge sbyong gi lus dang ldan par gyur/
cigasems can thams cad lus nyams pa mad cing dag pa dang ldan te/ lus la rma med par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis ma 'phrogs pa'i sams dang/
ldan zhing/ sprul pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'od dang ba'i lus nyams pa med pa dang ldan zhing/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'dus dang ldan par gyur cig/
sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mu gnas pa dang ldan zhing/ chos kyi dbyings su mngon par skyes nga 'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gzhan/
thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i lus dang ldan zhing/ rin po cha lta bu'i 'od yod pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i dbyings su chos kyi skyed pa
la dbang sgyur ba'i lus dang ldan zhing/ ye shes dam pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis bltan don yod par skyes pas/ rin po che rgya
00 @#// mtsho lta bu'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi gtso bas gos pa medacing/ bar snang gi rang bzhin gyi lus dang ldan par gyur
cigaces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rang gi lus las khrag gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tsho/ sengashas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po la rab tu gzhol ba'i sems kyis
dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo'o// dag pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// yangs pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// dga' ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// rangs pa'i
yid kyis lo ngayu bsngo'o// sngo ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su bsngo'o// dang ba'i yid kyis yongs
su bsngo'o// mgu ba'i yid dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang/ yid bang zhing ras pa skyo bas dag ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub
sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po gtong ba'i sems gzhal du mud pa'i dga' bas rnam pa ra 'phel ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ mkhas pa'i skya bos bstan pa'i
zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa 'jig rten gyi drim bsal ba dang/ slong ba thams cad kyis zad par nus pa'i nang gi lus nye bar slongs pa'i yongs su
0 gtong ba dang/ yon tan rin po ches yang dag par blangs pa'i dge ba 'byam klas pa dang/ byang chung sems dpa' thams cad kyi yi dam gyis nye bar blangs pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs chen
po dang/ slong ba thams cad kyi yid kyis 'dod par bsams pa btang yang 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang/ sbyin pa la dmigs pa'i dngos pos shin tu brtags pa'i las kyi rnamA/
par smin pa'i rten dang/ len pa rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sems nyams pa med pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur ba pha lta bu'i 'du shes su mngon par 'dzin
pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang/ 'jag can gyi khams thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan
thams cad dang/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i snying rje'on pos yongs su skyob pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i stobs bcu rnam par spyod pa dab
'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mthun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa thams
cad mngon du gyur pa'i khyu mchog dang/ sang go'i nga ro bsgrogs pa dang/ dus gsum mngon du gyur pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ dus gsum thams cad mngon
[n1/ ] shu'u// du gyur pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par thug par zhi non pa'i byang chub semag dang 'i smon lam dang/ yongs su yi 'chad nga med pas mngon du gyur pa'i sems bskyang
pa grangs med pas/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phan pa tshol ba dang/ rgyal po thams cad gtong ba dang/ de ma yan pa'i byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa
ngag kyang skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs dgan gnas shing/ sha dang nang yongs su gtong ba ji ltar myong ba rnams la lus las sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tsho/ sha dang rkang longs su
btang bas yang dag par bsdus nga 'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad jo rdzasnying po ltar mkhrags
pa'i yan lag dang ldan zhing/ mi shigs pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad gseb med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas/ gsab ma yin pa'i lus dang ldan par
gyur cig// sems can thams cad yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing/ sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu grub pas/ bsod nams brgya pa'i mchen gyi lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshag pa'i stobs bcu tha mi dad cing
07 ma nyams pa dang ldan te da pa byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par bris pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshags pa'i sku rab tu thob pas/ mtha' las
'das pa tshad med pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'joms pas kun tu khyab pa'i spyod lom dang ldan zhing/ thub nga med/
nga'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dus pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus gcig par gyur cig/ sems can
thams cad nam mkha'i dbyangs kun tu chos kyi skus khyab par byed pa'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad sheng
ba'i lus dang ldan zhing/ byang chub kyi lus dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa 'i sems dang
ldan pa slong ba la sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi sku mtha' las 'das pa chad med pa rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir
yongs su bsngo'o/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i rgyud la bslabs pa'i soms dang ldan pa// sbyin pa thams cad byin pas
nga@#// spyod pa'i sems dang ldan pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa// pha rol tu 'gro ba'i sbyin pa grub pa'i sems dang ldan pa//
[F ]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin pa'i rjes su bslabs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyi zad mi shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin
pa'i gnas thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan nga/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams
cad yid la bya bas mngon du gyur ba'agatong ba'i sam/ dang ldan pa/ slong ba thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par rgyu ba rab rtumachod pa'i sems dang ldan pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
[”]yongs su skyo ba med pa dang/ rgyal po g.yo ba med pa dang/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang snying yongs su btang bar gyur
pa de ltar slong ba kun nas 'ongs pa rnams kyis bslas shing/ rang gi lus las snying yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa dang/ sbyong ba dang/ thob par byed pa dang/ lhag ba'i bsam
]]pa rnam par sbyong ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir stobs bcu'i byang chub la dmigs par byed pa dang/ smon lam chen pos nan tan du byed pa dang/ byang chub semA
dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas pa dang da smon lam yongs su ma gtong bas sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe/ dag ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste//
sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin lta bu s yongs su bzung ba'i snying dpal gyi ba'us brgyan pa dang ldan zhing/ rdo rje'i ra khor yug thams cad ltar mi shigs shing/ rdo rje'i snying po lta
bu'i snying dang ldan pa dang/ bag tsha ba med pa'i snying dang/ thub par dka' ba'i snying dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i snying dang/ dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ye shes kyi snying
po can gyi snying deng/ mthu go cha chen po dam pa'i sems kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi snying dang/ 'gro ba thamasAkya gtso bo lta bur mi 'phrogs pa snyinge dang/ mthu bo cha ltar mi shags pa'i snying po
can gyi snying dang/ bdud kyi las dang/ bdud kyi dpung dang/ bdud kyi sde rnam par 'joms pa'i snying dang/ brtan pa'i snying dang/ gzengasamatho ba'i snying dang/ dpa' ba'i snying dang/
rtul phod pa'i snying dang/ mi 'jigs/ mi sdang/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i snying dang/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po yang dag par bgos pa'i snying dang/ shin tu btsun pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
stong dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pas byang chub snang bar gyur ba'i snying dang/ byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjes su rtogs shing
[s] ]ku'u// rmongs pa med bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i snying dang/ stobs bcu mngon par byang chub pa phab tu'athob pa'i snying dang ldan par gyur cig ces//
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyingegaspyan pa/sa yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i stobs
ny+tsa/ bcu ma pa' ba'i thugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o// 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba mngon
par dad bar byed pa'i lta ba dang/ gsal zhing dga' bar byed pa'i mig dang/ byang chub dang mnyam par bya ba'i byams pa dang/ ci 'dod pas slong ba phu dud du bya ba'i sbyin pa dang/ rgyun mi
chad par yid la byed pa 'a gtong ba dang/ lus la snying po med par rtogs pas snying po blang ba'i sems dang bar 'gyur ba'i lus rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang/ spyang ku dang/
la dung khyis bza' bar gyur ba'i lus su rab tu rtog pa dang/ gzhan la rag lus shing lus mi rtag par yid la byed pa dang/ lus kyi rgyus thams cad khong du chud pa dang/ gzhan la da
! ]pa'i sems dang/ de lta bu'i chos de dag yid la bya ba 'bartson pa de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' legs par phyin pa dang/ rgyal po sdig pa bsol ba dang/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grangs med pa dag gis kyang slong ba rnams la rgya ma dang/ mchin pa dang/ mkhalam dang/ glo ba yongs su btang bar gyur pa de ltar rgyu ma dang/ mchin pa/
