ya shes kyi bza' shing gar pa lag tu thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gsar ba dang gsar pa yang dag par 'byung ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la lta
zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang rim gro byed pa'i phyir 'khrug pa med pa'i chos can du gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bza' shing gi ra ba la dga' bar pa tu thob sta/ chos
la rab tu dga' bas dga' bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i bza' shing gar bar sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba'i phyi'i dag 'pha'i semAdang ldamara'agyur
cig/ sems can thams cad kyi yul la rnam par rtse zhing spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi dgyes pa dang rol pa la rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing/ de bzhin
'a@#// gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ 'dul bar 'dong bas dga' ba dang/ rtsa ba dang/ longs spyod la rab tu brtson par gyur cig/ sems can thamA
cad byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas me'a mthar thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongasasu ma skye ba'i sems kyis gnas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
ts+tso dpa' rtse ba dang/ longs spyod dang/ dga' la mos par 'gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bza' shing gi re ba sems chen po bskyed pas dga' kha la rten cing/
chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang bar chud par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su sangs rgyas mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la dga' zhing/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la brtson par gyur cig dwasems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rab tu brgyan par bya ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir dga' zhing
mos pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig cas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bza' shing gi ra ba rtsa ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ longs spyod kyi gnas yongs su
gtong ba'/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi bza' shing gir ba rol pa'i gnas su 'dong zhing/ sas rgyas thams cad thams ca mthong ]
ka ba 'grub par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyire yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan ya nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa du
ma rung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ nyams can thams cad lam 'tshabaragazhol ba/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/ gtan pa med pa/
las kyi lam gsum shin tu dag pa// yo shes kyis grub pa'imachod sbyin yo byad grangs med par sogs pa/ dmigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas rnam par
dag pa/ spyin pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ba yo byad kyi rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ spyan pa'i tshogs sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong srasamang la
can gyi mchod sbyin du ma byed pa'i tsho/ mchod sbyin byas pa'i sbyin pa chen pos yang dag par bzung ba'i dag ba'irtsa ba de dag byang chub kyi sems dkonapa sbyan pa 'i tshogs tshad med
pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la zhugs pa/ dge pa brtsam pa thog ma dang/ ba ma dang/ tha mar rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa bye ba khrag
khrigabargya stong gi bsam pa can/ sems can grangs med pa mngon par mgu bar byed pa/ byams pa tshad med pa bsgom pa yang dag par spyod pas nye bar gnas pa/ gro bo thams cad/
@#// snying rjechen pos yongs su bskyab pa shin tu grub pa/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshags pa mngon par mnyes par byed pa// sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyir rjes su 'gyod pa medwapasu gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa// phyis mya ngan du bya ba med par yang dag par spyod pas/ khyad par rnam par
'phel bar byed pa// dad pa'i dbang po sems skad cig gis tshad med par rnam par 'phel bar byed pas/ gtong ba dang ldan pa de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ theg pa
tsha chen po'i sems bskyod pas grub pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa'i dgeba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad gtong ba chen po dang/ shin tu gtong ba dang/ rab tu gtong ba dang/
mchog tu gtong ba dang/ gya nom par gtong ba dang/ phul du gtong ba dang/ blun med par gtong ba dang/ mnyam pamad par gtong ba dang// 'jig rten thams cad las
pa'i phags pa'i gtong ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos gtong ba dang ldan zhing sbyin bdag gi dam pas sems can gyi khams thams cad ngan song nas 'don pa//
ye shes kyi lam la rab tu gzhog pa'i smon lam mnyam pa med pa dang ldan/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nor pamed pa dang ldan pa/ bdag mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes rjes su sangs rgyas pa/
dang ldan zhing/ sems can thams cad zhi ba'i ye shes la rab tu gzhogapa/ mngon par shes pa'i yashesamanyams pa med pas 'gro ba thams cad la shin tu mkhas par byas pa//
yi shes kyi ma dang sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba/ sangasargyus thams cad kyi rgyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phyarem ldeg pas rgyun
chad pa med par gyur tu/ mchod sbyin shan tu byas par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la rim gro byed cing/ bla nas nig phu'i shesakyin Thar thug par rgyun chad
pa med pas phyirami ldeg pa'i mchod sman byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad tshad med pamathau0f8byas pa bsod nams bsags pa'i pha rol tu phyin cing/ dge ba'i rtsa
ba legs par bskyed pa dang ldan par gyuratsagi/ sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbus tshod med pa bla na med par snang ba'i bde ba yongs u
gtor zhing/ sas rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin bdag tu gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams su snyoms par dge ba'i rtsa
bas yang dag par 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing mnyam pa'i sems kyis mchod sbyin byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad theg pa'i mchog la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu
@#// dgod par brtson zhing mchod sbyin gyi dam pabyed par gyur cig/ sam can thams cad dus ma yin pa thams cad las 'dus shing dus ma yin pa thams cad la
bab pa'i mchod sbyin mthar phyin par 'gro ba thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa'i machod sbyin byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skyes bu dam pa'imachod snyani phun sum
tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan zhing mchod sbyin legs pa dang ldan nga ra gyur cig sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nye bar bstan tu thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid kyi mthar phyin pa la bkodad/ mchod sbyin gyi rgyan mtha' las rgal ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod sbyin byed par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings
tshe tshad med par bsod nams kyi mchod sbyin byed pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yu8la par sgrub cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnam
par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ soms can thams cad smon lam chen pos sems can gyi khams thams cad sgrol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su gzhog pas 'gro ba
kun gyi mchod sbyin gyi bdag por gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos mchod sbyin byas pa'i bsod nams chen po byan pas yang dag par bsdus/
pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bde dag ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis mchod sman legs par byas par 'gyur ba dang/ mchod sbyin chud mi za bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas thamA
cad mngon par mnyes pa'i mchod spyan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad la zhe sdang bamed pa'itshig gi mchod sprin du 'gyur ba dang/ 'gro ba thums cad yos su skyob/
pa'i mchod sbyin du 'gyur ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis grub pa'i mchod sbyin byas rar 'gyur ba dang/ sas rgyas thams cad blta ba dang mi 'bral ba'imachod spyanedu
'gyur ba dang/ cho ga dang shin tu ldan pa'i mchod sbyin du 'gyur ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyis
yongs su grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchod sbyin du 'gyur pa dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mchod sbyin byed cing/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i machod sbyin gyi mthar thug par 'gyur bar yodongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po yo byad kyi tshogs dang/ dngos
po la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ mngon par ma chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i soms dang/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad re ]
ur+ya// zhing 'dod pa med pa'i ems dang/ skyon med pa'i sems dang/ rmongs pa mad pa'i sems dang// chos la rtog pas shin tu btsal ba'i sems dang/ semA
can thams cad don la gzhag par yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dang/ chos thams cad kyirang bzhin yang dgopa ji ltar babazhin du rab tu rtogs pa 'i sems dang ldan pa/ longs spyod mtha'
yas pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad la dmigs pa tshad med pa rim gro byed pa'i tshul can/ sems can la phan pa rnam pa tha dad pas rnam pa sna tshogs dumar yang dag pa ra sprod pa//
rgyu dngos po'i rnam pa tshad med pa brjod du med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba'amtshan nyid sna tshogs can thams cad spyan pa'i tshogs la rab tu brtson pa/ ga tang bar bya ba mtha' yas pa
stobs pas gtong ba thams cad ya nga dag par gtong ba la gzhol ba/ phyi nang gi yul thad mi shes pa'i dmags po thams cad shin tu ston pas de dag gtong ba dang/ yongs su
gtong ba dang/ stobs pa dang/ sbyin par byed pa dang/ 'bul ba dang/ bsam pa'i stobs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du yon tan chen po thob pas
sems rin po che dang 'grogs pa dang/ lan la re ba med par 'gro ba thams cad sIng rjes rjes su skyong ba dang/ 'gro ba rin po che thams cad kyi bsam pa rin po cha shin tu sgrub ba dang/
[o]/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang gcig tu bgrang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'it+taM/ lo khyad
thams cad kyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can kyi khams thams cad ma lus par yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// zhing thams cad ma lus par gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pamed cing rgyan rnam par dag pas
rnam par dbye ba dang/ rab tubargyan pa yo sasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus bar sems gcig gis rgyus par dgang ba dang/
rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// nam mkha'i khams thams cad ma lus pa'i mar thug par yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dus mtha'
dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug cing 2 thams cad mkhyen pa sa 'dul bas dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir yo ngas su bsngo'o
ya shes kyi byin gyi rlabs thams cad ma lus pa la mkhas pa yang dag par bstan pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas
kyi byang chub thams cad ma lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par bstan pa// 'jig rten gyi khams 'thum
po glas pa thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pas sems can kun gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bskal pa'i gras thams cad ma lus pa byang chub
sams dpa'i spyod pas rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas
pa kun nas/nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par dag pa dang/ che ba dang chung ba dang/ phra ba dang/ yangs po dang snyil zhing rgyu ba dang/ spyi'i tshugs su bstan pa dang/ rgyan gcig pa//
dang rgyan tha dad pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su bgrang zhing bstan pa thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dang 'i sdod pas yongs su rgyas par rtagang ba'i phyir yong
su bsngo'o// sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad ma lus pa la dus gsun du brtson pas sems skad cig ra ra zhing thams cad mkhyen por gdul ba dang/ rab tudagod par bya pa'i
yongs su bsngo// deltar byang chub sam sa dpa' sems dang 'chen po sems can gyi khams grongasamad pa thams cad gzud par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam rgyun mi gcad pa la
zhugs pa/ snying rje chen ngo sa'agror la cad yongs su skyob cing/ byams pa chen po tshad med pa la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyirjes su slob par zhugs pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag tham sa cad kyi tshul la gnas pa/ sas rgyas thams cad la dag ba'i rtsa ba rgyun mi 'chad par skyod pa// dus thams cad du slong ba la skyo ba med par/
rim gro byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa// gtang ba thams cad btang bas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa brtsams pa thams cad tha mkhyen par yo sa su bsngo ba la brtson pa des
slong ba de dang de dag 'ongs shing/ yo byad kyi dngos po mtha' yas pa slong ba dang/ slong ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas
dus gzhan dang gzhan du slong ba 'ongs pa dang/ slong ba de dang de dag yul de dang der 'os shing/ dus gzhan dang gzhan du phyin pa/ dmigs pa'i dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa slong
dang slong ma'i son sa na sna tshogs bsam pa mthun pas gdong du lta ba dang/ sems can skyong ba grangs med par 'dus shing/ byang chub sems dpas skabs phye ba la gnas
pa dang/ sbyan pa thob pal sdod pa'i slong ba sna tshogs dang/ len pa snatshogs dang/ sems can sna tshogs pa dang/ gang zag gzhan dang gzhan sems snatshogs dang ldan pa thog/
gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs ba'i mi rnam pa thadad pa gzhan dang gzhan du gyur pa/ skye gnasazla dang pas zin pa sbyin pa'i gnas gzhan dang gzhan du gyur pa de lta bu'i
slong ba'i tshogs chen po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gras mang pa kun nas 'dus pa mthong na/ slong ba de dag thams cad la sems dga' ba dang/ soms dad pa dang/ slong
lca ba la byams pa dang/ dwagaba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i 'dushes kyis snying rjechen pos rim gro byed pa'i sems dang/ yid rab tu spro ba dang/ sems shin tu tshim pa rab tu 'thob
ste phyir ldog pa med pa'i dad pas gtong ba rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i mas dang/ skyo ba med cade khyad par du 'phel bar gtang ba'i soms kyis slongab ji ltar 'ongs ba dang/ dngos
po tsa slong ba de dag yongs su tsham pa dang/ yongs su rgyas pa dang/ lag gang ba dang/ snod gang ba 'ang/ bsam pa gang ba dang/ ci 'dod pa'i dngos po thob pa dang/ yid bad/
ba mtha' yas pas rgyas pa dang/ dbul bor ba dang/ nor dang yo byad thams cad sdud pas brtan pa dang/ dngos po yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis shan tu bsad pa dang/ tsA/
bslangs nga 'i dngos po thams cad thob pas yid bde ste sgrache zhing mtho ba 'byin pa dang/ ci bde bar 'dong zhing spyod pa dang/ bsam pa ji bzhin du shin tu tshim pa dang/ namongs pamed
par spyan pa thob pa dang/ chad cing dub pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par byed da/ slong ba de dag mthong ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu dga' bar 'gyur gyi
brgya byin gyi stan la 'dug pa sa bsal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas pa san ma yin no//rab mtsho ma'i dbang phyug la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gras med par gnas pas
ma yazheno/ dga' ldan du skyes te skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba las rnam par 'dus pas ma yin no// rab 'phrul dga'idabang phyug la bskal pa grangs med par bde ba'i rnam pa thob pasam
ya nano// dbang sgyur ba'i dbang gis bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par yid du 'ong ba'i bud med kyi bde ba la gnas pa/sam yin no// tshangs pa'i stan la gnas pas bskal pa
brjod du med par tshangs pa'i bde ba la sngon pas ma yin no// mir gyur pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i srid stong gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bde ba'i rnam pas bskal pas mtshams med
cing tshamed par dga' ba dang/ rtsa ba dang/ longs sbyong thob par gyur pas ma yin no// dge rgyas kyi lha'i bde ba la bsal pa mtshungs pa med par bde ba'i rnam pa zad mi
shes pa ngang 'grogs pas ma yin no// gtsang mi'i gnas ni gnas pas bskal pa mu med par bde ba dang 'grogs par gyur pas ma yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
pa'i chen po slong ba snatshogs mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// spro ba skya'o// mos pa 'byung ngo// rab tu dga' ba 'grub bo// dad pa 'phel lo// bsam pa
'byung ngo// dbang po las su rung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i sems yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mos pa chen pos bskyod pa'i sems kyange'ugs rnam par 'phel lo//
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rtsa ba brtan zhing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag slong ba de dag dang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// bdaba'i
phyir yongs su bsngo'o// don gyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// rnam par dag pa 'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o//
yid bzang bo'i 'byung gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// theg pa chen po'i bzang ba nyid kyi phyi yodAsu bsngo'o// brtsams pa bzang po thams cad shes pa dang/ 'byor ra
bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// byang chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas stobs banu'i yi shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i
phyi'i yongs u bsngo 'o// de yang sems chags pa med pa dang grol zhing bor nges pa med pa'i lus kyi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems chags pa med pa dang grol zhing/
00 bcings pa med pa'i ngag gi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// sems chags pamed pa dang grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i yid kyi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de yang sems
can gyi 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ma yani/ gzhung da bzhin du srog gi 'du shes kyis ma yin/ gang zagag 'du shes kyisam yin/ shed las skyes pa'i 'du shes shes ma
yin shed bdag gi 'du shes kyis ma ya na/ skye ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ byed pa po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yani/ yod pa dang mang pa'i
'du shes kyis yongs bsngo ba ma ya na/ 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes kyis ma yin/ shi 'pho ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yani/ skyo ba'i 'du
shas kyis ma yani/ rtag pa'i 'du shes kyisom yano/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ srid pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ srid pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'dushes
pas yongs susngo pa ma yin/ 'dushes med pa ma yin pa sa yosasu sngo ba ma yin te/ de chags pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o// bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs
su bsngo'o// grol ba med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsko ste/ don las yongs su mi bsngo'o// rnam par smin pa yongs su mi bsngo'o// rtog da longs mum bsngo'o// rnam par
wu'u// rtog pa yongs su ma bsngo'o// sems pa yongs sum bsngo'o// bsam pa yongs su mi bsngo'o// sems yongs su mi bsngo'o// sems med pa yongs su
ma bsngo'o// de de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i tsho/ nang la mngon par chags pa med do// phyi rol la mngon par chags pa med do// rkyen la mngon par chags pa med do// dmigs pa la mngon
par chags pa yod do// rgyu la mngon par chags pa med do// rgya 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa med do// chos la mnarar chags pame dudo// chos nyid la mngon par chags
pamed da//sams nga mngon par chags pa na dud// bsamapa la mngon par chags pa med do// de de ltar yongs su bsngoba'i// gzugs la chags pa med do// gzuglu
nye bar len pa la chags pa yod do// gzugs 'gog nga la chags pa med do// tshor ba la chags pa med do/ tshor ba nye bar len pa la chags pa mad do// tshor ba 'gog pa/
la chags pa med do// 'du shes la chags pa med do/ 'dushes nye bar len pa la chags pa mad do// 'dushes 'gog pa la chags pa med do// 'du byed la chags pa med do//
'du byed nye bar len pa la chags pa mad do// 'du byed 'gog pa la chags pa mad do// rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// rnam pa shes panye bar len pa la chags pamad do//
rnam par shes pa 'gog pa la chags pa med do// gang de lta bu'i chos la chags pa med pa de ni gzugs la bcings pa mad do// gzugs kyi skye ba la pacinges pa mad do// gzug/
kyi 'gag nga la bcings pa mad do// tshor ba la bcanges pa med do/ hatshor ba'i skya ba la bcings pa med do// tshor ba'i 'gag pa la bcanges pa med do// 'du shes la bcings pa
med do// 'du shesakyi skye ba la bcings pa med do// 'du shes kyi 'gag nga la bcings pa med do// 'du byed la bcangs pa med do// 'du byed kyi skye ba la bcings pa mad do//
'du byed kyi 'gag pa la bar nges pa mad do// rnam par shes pa la bcanges pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la bcings pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa la bcings
pa med do//gang chos de dag la bcings pa med pa de ni chos thams cad la chags pamed pan+ti/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos gang chos la 'dzan pa 'am/ chos gang la chos kyis chags
par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ skya ba 'am/ skya bang 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ nga yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'i ngo bo 'di kyis dngos po med pa'i
rang bzhin te/ gcig ma yin no/ dganyis ma yin no// mang ba ma yin no// tshad med pa ma yin no// chung ngu ma yin no// nyung ngu ma yin no// dma' ba ma yin no// yangs pa
ma yin no// zab pa ma yin no// gsal ba ma yin no// zhi ba ma yin no// spros pa ma yin no// gnas pa ma yin no// gnas med pa ma yin no//
chos ma yin no// chos med pa ma yin no//bsgom pa ma yin no//bsgom pa med pa ma yin no// yod pa ma yin no// med pa ma yin no// de de ltar chos med pa'i tshul gyis chos
rnams la rnam par lta ste chos kyi tshig gi lam la gnas pas chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// de las kyi lam yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do/ byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam par thogs par ma byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang phyir mi ldog go/ rten pa'i las sgyu ma lta bur yong rab tu shes so// chos sgra
brnyan dang 'dra ba yang 'jig par mi byed do// sems cad du snang bas kyang rlom sems su mi byed do// chos thams cad sgyu ma dang mnyam pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba ba'ani
du shas te/ las rnams kyi rgyu'i mthu dang yang 'gal bar m byed do// las la gzhol bar yang rab tu 'jug ste/ chos M rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yang yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ mngon par 'du bya ba mad pa'i lam yang rgyun ma gcod do// da dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yos u bso ste/ gang gi phyir thams cad mkhyen
banyid tshul med cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu 'gro bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tham sa cad du yongs su bsngo zhing thams cad las ldog par ma byed do/ ci'i phyir yongs
su bsngo ba zhen/ 'dan 'jig rten las pha rol tu gyur pas na de'i phyir pha rol ces bya'o// phung po las gzhan du 'gyur bar byed pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/
tshig gi lam las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yos su bsngo ba zhes bya'o// sems can gyi 'du shes sna tshogs las pha rol tu gyur pas na/ de' phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/
'jig tshogs mang po las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'aphur yo ngas su bsngo ba zhes bya'o// na ngon par 'du byed pa las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o//
srid pa las gzhan du gyur pas na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o// nye bar len pa las gzhan du gyur nga sa na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/ 'jig rten gyi tshes
las gzhan du gyur pa sa na/ de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o// de de ltar yos su bsngo bas sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba yin/ chos kyi rjes su song ba yin/ ye shes
kyi rjes su song ba yin/ byang chub kyi rjes su song ba yin/ ngon gyi rjes su song ba yin/ yongs su bsngo pa'i rjes su song ba yin/ spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba yane/ spyod pa'i rjes
@#// su song ba yin/ rang bshen gyi rjes su song ba yin/ rnam par dag nga 'i rjes su song ba yin te/ de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas chos shes par byakha thams cad kho nga du/
chud par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas gang yang thugs 'byung bar byas pa med pa yin/ chos gang la
yang mi mthun par byas pa med pa min/ chos gang yang chud gozan pa med pa yin/ chos gang dang yang 'gal bar byed pa med pa yani/ chos dngos po gang yang nyams par byed
pa med pa yani/ chos gang yang bor ba ni da pa yan/ rgyu gang yang bshag pa med pa yin/ can gang yang phyin ng gi chos thams cad dang 'gal ba byas pa med pa yin/ las kyi
'bras bu yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
mnyam pa nyid kyi rdzasau song ba zhes bya ba ste/ yongs su bsngo ba des yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa
yin no// snying po thob pa yin no// chos nyade thob pa yin no// thams cad mkhyen pa la brtson pa yin no// don gyi chos dang ldan ba yin no// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes
07 su song ba yan no// dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no// smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rjes su song ba yin no// rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i
snying po' rjes su song ba yin no/ chos las cad kyadabang phyug la dbang sgyur ba rab tu thob pa dam pa'i rjes su song ba yin no// (bam po bzhi btsug//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas taM/ 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/ chos kyi dbye nges
la lta ba dang/ don dang/ yi ga dang/ chag la 'jug pa dang/ sems mtha' dang dbung med par yangs pa yongs su bsgom pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad snying rdzachan pos rgyus par bya ba
ngang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyisams yang dag par 'brel bar bya ba dang/ yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
pa'i lus su yang dag par shes par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa thob pa yang dag pa mthong ba dang/ chos kyi lus kyi
rjes su song ba'i gzugs kyi lus yongasasu dag par yang dag par ston ra dag byed cing/ sas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabasakyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ de dag rgyal ro 'i
rigs dang ldan gyur cing// 'gro ba kun n rgyal po gang yod pa// de dag zil gnon rgyal po 'gro ba'i mchog/ phan pa'i don du rgyal po mthu chen 'gyur//
de dag dang ba'i yid du 'bu gyur cing// 'gro ba kun la dbang sgyur rab thob ste/ dachos dang ldan par chos kyi rgyal srid skyong// 'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba rab tu skyed// de dag rgyal po'i
rigs brgyud rnam rag pas// chos dang ldan par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// da dag 'khrug med rgyal srid skyong bar byed// phyogs rnams kun nas 'khor lo phyir mi ldog/ de dag/
yon tan gzugs dang rab tu ldan/ mkhas pa'i blo dang shes rab ye shes ldan// de dag thalanon mthu la log pa med// bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rab tu 'joms//
de dag tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ste//bzod pa'i stobs la bsdams pa'i sems kyis gnas// khon 'dzin khro ba rnam dag ya da bsal bas// rgyal ba rnams kyi chos 'dir
rtag tu brtson// de dag zas dang skom dag sbyin byed cade// bzhon dang 'phreng bgos dang smos mang dang// ma'9dang byug pa rgyab rten mar ma dag/ rnam pa mtha' yas ji snyedagatong byed
cing// phan pa'i sems kyis de dag sbyan byadatshe// da la shin tu dad pa'i sems bsgyur cing// bsam pa dag pas dga' ba yongs bskyed de// 'jig rten bla ma dag la sbyin pa byed/ de
ngag dngos po thams cad gatong byed cing// phyi dang nang dang ganga rnams ji snyed pa// kun kyang dang ba'i yid kyis zab tugatong// mde la zhum par byed pa gang yang med// mgo yang gtong
zhing mig kyang rab tu gtong// lag pa gtong zhing de bzhin rkang pa gtong// sha dag gtong zhing de bzhin rkang yang gtong// thams cad
lus kyang ma dga' mad par gtong// de dag dbang phyug shin tu yangs gyur cang// rigs dang rus ldan 'gro ba mi yi rje// kha nas lce yangs shin tu brkyang byas shing// slong ba rnams la mi
dga' med par gtong// de dag dbang phyug shin tu yongs gyur cing// slong ba rnams la lce sbyin byas nas kyang// 'di u0f7ana 'gro ba yod pa ma lus kun// rgyal ba'i ljagus yangs jibazhi'i
thob 'gyur bsngo// rab tu spro byas bu yang sbyin par byed// mi dga' med byas chungam sbyin par byed// rab tu dga' byas rgyal srid sbyin par byed//bdag kyang gzhan gyi bran du sbyin
par byed// ci 'dod gtong zhing thams cad gtong bar byed/ mi skyor gtong zhing dus su gtong ba byed// ca 'dra'i dngos po bslangs par gyur ba rnams// thams cad bsam pabaka'i
du rab tu gtong// chos kyi don du bdag kyang gtong bar byed// byang chub don du dka' ba rab tu spyodo// sems can don du thams cad bzlod par byed// ngashes ngon du phyir ldog mi gyur/
ngo rgya la ba rnams las chos rnams mnyan byas shing/ mngon par g.yog phyir 'bul bar byed pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab soms kyis//
rgyal ba rnams la dga' ba yangs pa skyed// mi yi gtso bo 'dren pa mthong nas kyang// byams ldan phan nga 'i sems kyis rim gro byed// dga' bar byed pa' yod dang ldan gyur cing//
snod du gyur te chos rnams len par byed/ can s 'jig rten 'di dag bder 'gyur zhing// ca nas thams cad bskyabs par 'gyur ba dang/ can s 'gro ba thams cad 'grol 'gyur bar//
de dag 'gro ba kun la yongs su bsngo/ ]gzugamadzes bzhin sngag ngag snyan ldan pa dag/ me tog sdug btags sbos zhem bskus pa'i rnams// 'phreng ba lhab lhub rgyan dang ldan pa yi/
'khor dang ldan par de dag rab gyur cing// mkhas shing shes pa'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang// phan par sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba'i tshe// bltos shing re ba'i sems kyang mi
'byung bar/ sems can phan phyir byang chub rab tu tshol// dge ba de la rjes su sems byed cing// sna tshogs yangs8shing rgya cha snal zhi las// 'gro ba kun la brtan pa yongs su
bsngo/ las la gnas su byed pa gang yang med// de dag rgyal srid yangs pa sbyin par byed// yul dang mar bcas grong khyer dam pa dang// rgyal ngo 'o pho brang gnas su gyur
00 pa dang// khyim dang bza' shing ra ba sbyin par byed// bskal pa brgyar yang sus kyang ma khyen pa'i// sbyin pa 'jig rten mi yi gtsos 'bul// 'jig rten rnams kyi pha rol phyin byas shing
'gro ba kun la pha rol ston par byed// da dag phyogs bcu'i gling ba mang po dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur nas kyang// slong ba thams cad shin tu mgung byas shing/ shin tu
dgor 'gyur de bzhin spro bar byed// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis cing bsngos pa// smyos bu 'dul ba de dag spyod yul la// rab tu bslabs tu pha rol phyin bs shing// de dag las
de yongs su sngo bar byed// chos rnams 'di la kyemasu zhig zhugs//gang la zhugs gyur ji ltar zhugs gyur ces/// de dag chos dngos 'di la rnam lta yang/ sbyin pa'i sems la
rnam par thogs pa med// chos rnams gang la chos kyis chags med par// ye shes tshul shas de dag yongs su bsngo/chos kyi tshul la de dag yongs bgro//don gyi tshul shes dpag yodrusu bsngo las la rnam
yang rnam par rtog pa med/ rnam par smin la'ang gnas par ma byed de// byang chub rton par rab tu du pas shes kyang// chos nyid dbyings las 'gal ba'am byed do//
lus la chags par de dag mi byed de// sems la'ang de dag gnas par ma byed do// las kyis de dag blo 'jug mi byed do// las kyis ye shes rten la 'ang 'jug mi byed//
u/// las kyi ye shes rten la'ang 'jug ma byed// 'das pa'i chos la rtog par byed de// ma 'ongs chos la'ang blo na gtong ma byed// da ltar yod la'ang
gnas par mi byed de// dus gsum kun las rnam par dben par skyes// de dag gzugs kyi pha rol phyin gyur cing// tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed ya de rnams dang// 'jig
rten kun gyi pha rol phyin gyur te// dag pa de dag dma' yid m 'gyur// phung po rnams dang khams la yongs btsal cing// skye mchang de bzhin lus kyi rnam pa dang// sems kyi
rnam pa ma lus rnam gzhigs kyang// byang chub dngos su gang yang mo rnyed do// rtag la nam ya nga chags par ma gyur de// chad pa la yang de dag soms me 'jug/ chos nyid yod dang
mad pa ma yin te/ dgacig nas gcig brgyud las kyang ma lus shes// sems kyi rgyuyag byang chub thobami byed/ chos nyid la yang de dag mi gnas te// zhing la'ang de dag
gnas pa ma yin no/ de dus gsum chos rnams kun kyang yod pa min// de ltar spyod pa chos 'di kun rtog cing// ji ltar rgyal ba kun gyis brtag mdzad pa// de ltar des
btsal nam yang red pa min// spyod pa rnams lam shes rmongs pa med// bya ba'i lam dang 'gal bar mi byed cing// las kyi lam rnams yongs su rjod byed pas// saMm
can lam rnams yongs su sbyong byed cade/ sgyur bcas brgyan dang bcas par de la rtog kapid nas mkhas pas gang rnams brjod mdzad pa'i// mkhas pa'i lam la de
dag spyod byed cing// don gyi tshul la rjes su sems byed pas// byang chub tshul ni ma yi gtso bos rtogs// chos rnams skye med 'jig pa med pa ste// 'gro ba kun tu
gang yang 'pho ba mad// chos rnams skye dang shi 'pho med pa ra yang/ rgyal ba'i chos kyi tshul rnams rab tu rtogs// chos rnams gang girang bzhin rnam shes pa// don
rang bzhin dngos yod ma rtogs ti/ dngos med rtog med de dag rab tu shes// bde gshags yongashas de dag rnam par mthong/ 'gro ba kun dang chos nyid thams cad dang//
sems can rnam pa zhing gi rnam par dang// chos kyi rnam pa dusu rnams ma lus pa'i// chos rnams mkhas pas gang yang brjod pa med// chos rnams ma lus gzung bar bya
bamed// ji snyed sems can rgyal bas sangs rgyas pa// de yi chos la'ang chos ni dngos med de// de yang dus dang chos su brjod pa yin// chos nyid kun tu 'gro ba ci 'dra ba//
nga bzhin de dag yongs su sngo ba byed// des kyang 'gro ba kun las bsgyur byas te// de la kun tu dpa' bo yongs su bsngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su
[s/c]'u'u// song ba zhes bya ba ste yongs su bsngo ba drug pa'o/ dkyi rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po rnams kyi yongs su
bsngo ba 'gro ba thams cad ma nyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhis bya ba bdun pa gang zhan/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
gtong ba'i dmigs pa la brtson pa// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rab tu rten pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam phur ma ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang
ldan pa/ thams cad gtang ba'i bzod pa dang ldan zhing/ rna la gzan pa'i ngang tshul can/ bsam gtan 'byam klas pa// rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa//
shes rab kyi tshul dang sa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyis rnam par phye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ yon tan mtha' yas pa yang dag par
bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las la rab tu brtson par yid la byed pa dang ldan pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyogs mngon
par skyob pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu nye bar sogs kyang rung/ ngag ba rtsa ba chen po nye bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs pa nye bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu/
chen po nye bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa nye bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mang po rdul tsam yan chad nye bar sogs kyang rung dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal
du med pa rta bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nye bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa nye bar sogs kyang rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mu med panye
bar sogs kyang byung/ sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs kyad rung/ chos la dmags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs kyang rung tshul de bzhin du
'dun la dmigs pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dmigs pa dang/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa dang/ thabs mkhas nga la dmigs pa dang/ legs nga 'i dge ba'i rtswa
ba'i sems bsgom pa la dmigs pa dang/ nang la dmigs nga dang/ phyi rol la dmigs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshogs la dmigs pa'idag ba'i rtsa ba
nye bar sogs kyang rung sta/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yongs su spyod pa dang/ nye bar gnas pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ nye bar sogs pa dang/ tshogs
! su bya ba dang/ mos par bya ba dang/ rnam pa sbyang ba dang/ rnam par ston pa dang/ rgya cher byed pa'i tsho bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa sems can dumyal ba'i sgo ne
tu bcad pa/ dbang po rgyu ba shin tu bsdams pa/ bya ba'i tshul la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyin ci logamed par 'gro ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi/
[D ]snod du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du byung ba sas rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis
shAn tugasol pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las byung ba/ sangs rgyus kyi smon lam kyi rjes su song/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de
bzhin/ shug pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ rang gsams kyi go skabs red pa/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba/
sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad du 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag gi stobs kyis phyung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ mtho ris
la chags pa med pa/ skyid pa la yongasaM su'adzan pamed pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa la chags po med pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su sngo bar byed pa/ 'gro ba
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi gter du gyur pa/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i nan tan la rab/tu zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dgab pa'i gdugs su gyur pa// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten
[zl]pa'i 'i ma gyis mngon par 'don pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par byed ba/ yul thams cad du yongs su bsngo ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgyunam tshad/
bar 'byed pa// ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par gzugs par byed pa/ lamachen po rnam pa sbyong ba la brtson pa/ 'grol thams cad kyis bstan don yodapa la zhugs pa/
'jig rten thams cad kyi dram sbyong ba/ rab tu spyan pa'i sAms dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan pa du byung ba/ sas rgyas kyi rigis rnam par dag
par rab tu skyes pa// yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor chon ngos sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ grog thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa/ sems
cad thams cad rnam par dag pa la yang dag par gzhog pa/ dge ba yongs su bsdu ba la yang dag par brtson pa// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i banigyi rlabs dang/ lhag pa'i
bsam ba rdul med pas yongs su bzung ba de dag ba'i rtsa ba de dag spyod pa'i tsho/ soms 'di ltar skyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems bskyed pas yang dag par bzung ba dang/
byang chub tu sems bskyed pas bsams pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pas brtan pa dang/ byang nubatusems bskyed pa'i bsam pa las byung ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyadabs
phan pa la zhugs pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa la snying brtsabar byad pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul du yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang/
stobs bcu la dmigs par brtson pa dang/ stobs bcu'idabyings su yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbyings su mngon par bsgrubs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar
yang dag par bsgrubs pa de dag las rnam par smin pa gang byung ba de phyi ma'i mtha' bsal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa dang da 'gro ba thams cad la yongs
rgyusu gtang bar bya ba yongs su gtong ba'i phyu'i sems can thams cad la yongs su bskos/ sems can gyi khams thams cad las soms can gcig kyang mchud pa med par byas te/ sems/
can gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad ma lus pa la yang yongs su sngo bar byed de/ de 'ad ltar yongs su bsngo'o// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rin po ches yongs
su rgyas pa dang/ na bon thams cad kyis tshal par gang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gos kyis rnam par dag cing gos kyis longs su gang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khamA
grongs med pa sos thams cad kyis yid du 'ong zhing dri zhim pos yongs su rgyas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par mdzes shing//
00 lhab lhab kyis yongs su rgyas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nor bu rin po che mtha' yas da sa khyad par du 'phags shing/ nor bu rin poms yongs su rgyas pa dang//
'jig rten gyi khams gras med pa ma tog sna tshog sakyas kha dog dumadang ldan par gyur cing/ ma tog thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas pa dang/ 'jig rtenagyi khams grangs med pa/
kha bras zhig ro sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa ldan zhing/ kha zas zhim po yongs su phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gras med pa gsar dang/ dngul dang/ nor gyi
dbyigs gas dag cing/ noragyi dbyag gis yongs su rgyas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rin po cha' ba dan snatshogs kyis brgyan cing/ lha rdzas kyi gos thams
cud kyis kun nas yog ste/ grags pas yongasau rgyas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rin po chasnatshogs kyi cod pan gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su yos su brgyan
cing rin po che'i cod pan gyis yongs su rgyus pa dag slong ba rar la phyi ma'amatha'abaskal pa'i mur thug par sbyin pas rngoms par ma gyur cig/rgyun gcodapar ma gyur cig/ slong ba
gcag la ji lta ba de bzhin du slong ba thams cad ma lus pa la yogasu gtong zhing/ slong ba re re la yang phyi ma'i mtha' bsal pa'i mur thug par shin tu tsham par byed kyang yongs su skyo
zhu// bar ma gyur cig/ phyir ldog par ma gyur cig/ de yang 'ang ltar skya mang pa'i sems dang/ 'dod runge sred pa med pa'i sems dang/ grags pa 'dod pa med
zla pa'i sems dang/ 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang/ mya nganamed pa'i sems dang/ thamago cad mkhyen pa'i lam la the tsoma med pa'i sems dang/ gtang ba shin tugatong ba'i sems dang
snying brtse ba'i sems dang/ yongs su sman par bya ba' sems dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa' sems kyis mos su gtong bar gyur cig ces/ de ltar
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ba'i rtsa bde dag ma 'ongs pa 'a bskal pa'i mthar gtong ba dang/ 'dod pa'i sbyin pa gtang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa 'chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can gyi khams las sems can gcig kyang ma chud pa med par byas shing/ sems can thams
cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa glang po cang shes yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ gser gyi rgyan dang/ gser gyi
dra bas g.yogs pa dang/ ni poma'i rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pas yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rta' rgyal lo'i sngon a
bya pa dang 'dra ba rta'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sdug gu sna tshogs dang yan lag garkyen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/
'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bud med dang/ rolamo brdung ba dang/ dkrol ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa dang bcas pas yongs su gang ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jige
rten gyi khams grangs med pa bu dang bu mos gang bu bung chub kyi sems la gnas shing/ phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mar thug par slong ba re re la yang yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ 'jig
rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi lus kyis yongs su bkangasta/ byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs shin tu bdo ba'i yadakyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
med pa rang gamagos yongs su bkang ste/ bag yod pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi lus la byung ba'i migags yongs su
bkang ste/ mag ga sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sha dang nang gis yongs su bkang ste/ sdugabasngal gyis nyams pa med ra'i yid kyi dbang pos yongs
su gtong bar gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdag dbang ba'i rgyal po'i srid dang spyod pas yongs su bkang ste/ srid kyi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams
[r/ ]na// grangs med pa bran dang las byed pa'i mis yongs su bkang ste/ gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ ma 'dres par gtong ba chen po'i sems la gnas pa//
slong ba re re la yang log su gtong bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yongs su bzung ste// sems can gyi khams thams cad las gcig kyang
ma chud pa med par slong ba gcig la ji lta bar slong ba thams cad la'ang de bzhin du/ sems can der zhing yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par tsham par byed par gyur cig/ 'jig
tsa rtan gyi khams gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mang thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing/'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi
dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi many+dzas gtugs pa thams cad du'ang snying rje chen po yangs pa su yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse
bas sems can thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe/ de'i rgyus bdag gi sems sbyin pa las phyi'i ldog par ma gyur cig/ gtong ba'i sems kyis sa gol gtogs pa tsam yang skyo bar
ma gyur cig/ de yang 'di ltar chags pa med pa'i sems dang/ 'ashin tu gtong ba'i sems dang/ bdaganyide yangs pa2sems dang/ zab pa'i sems dang/ legs par yongs su sdud
bawa/pa'i sems dang/ mngon par ma zhen pa'i sems dang/ chos la srog med pa'i sems dang yang shin tu thul ba'i sems dang/ ma 'khrugs pa'i soms dang/ g.yang bamed pa'i
bams dang/ rin po che'i rigs sna tshogs thob pa'i sems dang/ las kyi rnam par sman pa thams cad la re bamed pa'i sems dang/ chos thams cad m lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya
bar bya ba'i sems dang/ bsngo ba chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang/ don gyi chos shin tu rtogs pa'i sogs dad/ ya shas chen po'i sa rab tu thob pa sems dang/ sems
can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shas la dgod ba'asesams dang/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par bskyod pa'isems dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa
yang dag pa bsgrubs pa'i sems kyis sbyin par gyur cig ces/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi skad cig rar la nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
de dag yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can de dag longs sod kyis 'thos pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yos su bsngo'o// de dag gi bsod nams ma zad pa yang dag par
bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de dag gis bde bar gtogs pa'i bde bathams cad rab tu thob pa ra ba ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de dgag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[s/ ]// chen po' las kyi tshogs kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de dag gis chos thams cad kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de dag theg pa/
thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de dgagis saa rgyas thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de ngag sem/
@# can gyi khams thams cad nums pa med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de dag sems can thams cad lasoms ma'am bsa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de
dag ams can thams cad kyi mi khoms pa rnam par song zhing/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// dultar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe yid
bde zhing sems rab tu dga' bas yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems la
gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la gtang ba'i sems las su rung ba la gnas te yos su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad lagatang ba yang dag par bsdus pa'i
rgyusems la gnas tu yongs su bsngo'o/ sems can thams rud mngon par mgu bar gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi dbul bo bzlog/
sho pa'i phyir gtang ba'asems la gnas tu yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad nor thams cad kyis bsdu ba'i phyir gtang ba'i sems la gnas te ya sa su bsngo'o/ sems can
thams cad la nor grangasamed par gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/ sems can thams cong la gtad ba mtha' yas pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba'i sems
la gnas te yongs bsngo'o// sems can thamasacad la phu ma'amatha'ibaskalapa'i mur thug par rgyun chad pa yod par gotang ba'i soms la rgyun chad pa med par gnas tu yongs
su bsngo'o// sems can thams/rtsad lanor shAmasacang 'gyod pa med par smin pa dang/ mdzod thams cad skyo ba med par gtang ba'asems l gnas te yongs su bsngo'o
sems can thams cad la dngos po thams cad spyane zhing gtang ba'i sems la gnas tu yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems la gnas te
yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yo sa su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la noramang bo rgya chab/ 5/ngas
pa gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad rgyan du mas ma gro bya ba'i phyir gtang pa'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can tham/
bukla// cad la thogs pa med par ga tang ga' soms la gnas tu yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la tha ba med par ga tang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs
su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la stongs chen po shin tu bdo ba rdo rjes gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la nyi ma ltar snyoms pa 'i 'od
zer gyis gtaba'i sems la gnas tu yos su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bslab pa'i re gtang ba'i sems la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o//
sems can thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te sosasu bsngo'o/ sims can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pa'i dge ba'i
rtsal mngon du gyur pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o//sems can thams cad dang bsamang tha dad pa med de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o/ sems can
thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can nyams cad kyi nye ma thams cad bsal zhing dgag pa la gnas
! ta yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad ye shes dang yon tan ma nyam pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bya ba la gnas de yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad
kyi bsod nams thams cad yo/su rdzogs par bya bam 'phrogs pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'od/ sems can thams cad kyis mi g.yo ba'i nga nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa/
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes tha dad pa med pa la yongs su bsngo bar bya ba la gnas pa yongs su
bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems
na thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnas mad pa yang dag par bsgrub pa la gnas tu yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyis 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byungaba'i
sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas pa yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad dgu ba'i rtsa ba dam pa mngon par skyes pas rnam par dag
par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o// sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang/ sgrib pa dang/ bar du gcod nga 'i chos thams cad bsal zhing dgag pa lu gnas te

yang las gnas su yongs su ma bsngo'o// rnam par snyani nga 'i gnas/sum yin no// lus kyi gnas su ma 'dren no// dngos po'i gnas su ma mnan// zhing gi gnas su/
ma yanano// phyogs kyi gnas sam yunan// sems can thams cad kyi gnas su los su mi bso 'o// sems can thams cad kyi gnas las gud du 'phags par ya nga so

gyi dmigs la shin tubyortogs nga// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byang ba'i mthar spen pa/ sa sa rgyus kyi rigasashan tu gsal ba dang ldan pa de yos bsngo ba des

spyod pa la brtson pa yin/ zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang tshogs chung dus mig lam du snang bar mthong ba yan/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams

ba reyang brjod du med par yongs su sbyang ba'i don du sems kyi skad cig re re lamig yong snang ba'i tshuladuskye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
su dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sems kyi skad cigari la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes
kyis mos mi shis pa yin/ soms can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod dumed ba'i yang brjod du med pa mnyam pa nyidi gang la bdag skyodo gnas pa de la yongs su rdzogs bar byed
pa yin/ yongs su sgrub pa yin/ yongs su sbyong ba yin/ b.rol tu phyin pa thams cad la rab tu brtson par byed cing/ sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin/ las ji ltar
rnam par dag pa'i tshul bzhin du yang yang dag par 'byung ba yin/ thogs pa med pa'i rnab mngon bar bsgrub pa yang rab tu 'thob pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
brjod du med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ chos maMtha' yas pa bstanacing brjod pa thos na/ de dag thams cad 'dzin pa yin te/ chos bstan pa de la ring ba'i 'dushes nye
bar ma gzhog go/ sems skad cigagis byung ba dngos po med pa la rab tuganus pa/ rten pa med cing/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ gnas pa med pa'i byang chub

se golagatogs pa tsam yang dus gang du yang thogs pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spradu pa sngodapa'i tsho'ang skal bamanyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtheng ba/
dang ldan pa yin te/ yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag kyang rnam par dag cing mtha' dang dbung mad pa'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa'i sred pa dang ma thun pa/ brjod du
med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang/ zad ma shes pa'i yon tan dang/ legs pa 'thob par 'gyuran/ thun mad pa'i yang dag par rdzogs par byeng chub mngon par 'tshang
rgya ba'i tso/ 'di lta ste/ zhing thams cad rnam par dag pamanyam pa nyid dang/ sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa de dang/ lus thams/
cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ dbang po thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ las kyi rnam par sman pa thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bathams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad kyi
tshul la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegaso pa thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyis rnam par 'khrul dang yang dag par bstan pa rnam par dag pa mayi pa nyid 'thob pa lta ci smos/bam po bzhi

rnams zhing dang 'gal bgam byed de// zhing rnams sems can dpa' gal bar ma byed do// zhing rnams sems can gyi las dang 'gal bar ma byed do// sems can gyi las
rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do// bsam pa sems dang 'gal bar ma byed do// sems bsam ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do//bsam ba dang sems dmigs pa dang/
'gal bar ma byed do// dmigs pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ sems ngang 'ga' bar ma byad do/las kyi rnam par sman pa rten pa dang 'gal bar ma byed do// rten pa la las kyi
rnam par smin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/ las bya ba lam dang 'gal bar mi byed do// lam las byob dang 'gal par m byed do// chos nyid mtshan nyid dang 'gal bar me
byed do// mtshan nyidi chos nyade dang 'gal bar ma byed do// chos rnams skye ba'i rang bzhin dang 'gal bar ma byed do// slu ba'i rang bzhin chos mas dang 'gal bar mi byed do//
nang gam2ma pa nyid sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar ma byed do// sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid zhing gi mnyam ba nyeng 'gal ba mi byung ngo
sems can kyi mnyam
@#@#/ mnyam pa nyid chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'dod chags dang 'bral ba'i mtha'amanyam pa nyid sems can thams cad gyi gnas/
